2508  get_var( "contained_name" ) ) );
2509  }
2510  if( count_by_charges() && !is_food() && !is_medication() &&
2511  parts->test( iteminfo_parts::BASE_AMOUNT ) ) {
2512  info.emplace_back( "BASE", _( "Amount: " ), "<num>", iteminfo::no_flags,
2513  charges * batch );
2514  }
2515 }
2516 
2517 void item::debug_info( std::vector<iteminfo> &info, const iteminfo_query *parts, int /* batch */,
2518  bool debug ) const
2519 {
2520  if( debug && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::BASE_DEBUG ) ) {
2521  if( g != nullptr ) {
2522  info.emplace_back( "BASE", string_format( "itype_id: %s",
2523  typeId().str() ) );
2524  if( !old_owner.is_null() ) {
2525  info.emplace_back( "BASE", string_format( _( "Old owner: %s" ),
2526  _( get_old_owner_name() ) ) );
2527  }
2528  info.emplace_back( "BASE", _( "age (hours): " ), "", iteminfo::lower_is_better,
2529  to_hours<int>( age() ) );
2530  info.emplace_back( "BASE", _( "charges: " ), "", iteminfo::lower_is_better,
2531  charges );
2532  info.emplace_back( "BASE", _( "damage: " ), "", iteminfo::lower_is_better,
2533  damage_ );
2534  info.emplace_back( "BASE", _( "degradation: " ), "", iteminfo::lower_is_better,
2535  degradation_ );
2536  info.emplace_back( "BASE", _( "active: " ), "", iteminfo::lower_is_better,
2537  active );
2538  info.emplace_back( "BASE", _( "burn: " ), "", iteminfo::lower_is_better,
2539  burnt );
2540  if( countdown_point != calendar::turn_max ) {
2541  info.emplace_back( "BASE", _( "countdown: " ), "", iteminfo::lower_is_better,
2542  to_seconds<int>( countdown_point - calendar::turn ) );
2543  }
2544 
2545  const std::string tags_listed = enumerate_as_string( item_tags,
2546  []( const flag_id & f ) {
2547  return f.str();
2548  }, enumeration_conjunction::none );
2549  info.emplace_back( "BASE", string_format( _( "tags: %s" ), tags_listed ) );
2550 
2551  const std::string flags_listed = enumerate_as_string( type->get_flags(),
2552  []( const flag_id & f ) {
2553  return f.str();
2554  }, enumeration_conjunction::none );
2555 
2556  info.emplace_back( "BASE", string_format( _( "flags: %s" ), flags_listed ) );
2557  for( auto const &imap : item_vars ) {
2558  info.emplace_back( "BASE",
2559  string_format( _( "item var: %s, %s" ), imap.first,
2560  imap.second ) );
2561  }
2562 
2563  info.emplace_back( "BASE", _( "wetness: " ),
2564  "", iteminfo::lower_is_better,
2565  wetness );
2566 
2567  const std::string space = " ";
2568  if( goes_bad() ) {
2569  info.emplace_back( "BASE", _( "age (turns): " ),
2570  "", iteminfo::lower_is_better,
2571  to_turns<int>( age() ) );
2572  info.emplace_back( "BASE", _( "rot (turns): " ),
2573  "", iteminfo::lower_is_better,
2574  to_turns<int>( rot ) );
2575  info.emplace_back( "BASE", space + _( "max rot (turns): " ),
2576  "", iteminfo::lower_is_better,
2577  to_turns<int>( get_shelf_life() ) );
2578  }
2579  if( has_temperature() ) {
2580  info.emplace_back( "BASE", _( "last temp: " ),
2581  "", iteminfo::lower_is_better,
2582  to_turn<int>( last_temp_check ) );
2583  info.emplace_back( "BASE", _( "Temp: " ), "", iteminfo::lower_is_better | iteminfo::is_decimal,
2584  units::to_kelvin( temperature ) );
2585  info.emplace_back( "BASE", _( "Spec ener: " ), "",
2586  iteminfo::lower_is_better | iteminfo::is_decimal,
2587  units::to_joule_per_gram( specific_energy ) );
2588  info.emplace_back( "BASE", _( "Spec heat lq: " ), "",
2589  iteminfo::lower_is_better | iteminfo::is_decimal,
2590  get_specific_heat_liquid() );
2591  info.emplace_back( "BASE", _( "Spec heat sld: " ), "",
2592  iteminfo::lower_is_better | iteminfo::is_decimal,
2593  get_specific_heat_solid() );
2594  info.emplace_back( "BASE", _( "latent heat: " ), "",
2595  iteminfo::lower_is_better,
2596  get_latent_heat() );
2597  info.emplace_back( "BASE", _( "Freeze point: " ), "",
2598  iteminfo::lower_is_better | iteminfo::is_decimal,
2599  units::to_kelvin( get_freeze_point() ) );
2600  }
2601  }
2602  }
2603 }
2604 
2605 void item::med_info( const item *med_item, std::vector<iteminfo> &info, const iteminfo_query *parts,
2606  int batch, bool debug ) const
2607 {
2608  const cata::value_ptr<islot_comestible> &med_com = med_item->get_comestible();
2609  if( med_com->quench != 0 && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::MED_QUENCH ) ) {
2610  info.emplace_back( "MED", _( "Quench: " ), med_com->quench );
2611  }
2612 
2613  Character &player_character = get_player_character();
2614  if( med_item->get_comestible_fun() != 0 && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::MED_JOY ) ) {
2615  info.emplace_back( "MED", _( "Enjoyability: " ),
2616  player_character.fun_for( *med_item ).first );
2617  }
2618 
2619  if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::FOOD_HEALTH ) && med_com->healthy != 0 ) {
2620  info.emplace_back( "MED", _( "Health: " ), healthy_bar( med_com->healthy ) );
2621  }
2622 
2623  if( med_com->stim != 0 && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::MED_STIMULATION ) ) {
2624  std::string name = string_format( "%s<stat>%s</stat>", _( "Stimulation: " ),
2625  med_com->stim > 0 ? _( "Upper" ) : _( "Downer" ) );
2626  info.emplace_back( "MED", name );
2627  }
2628 
2629  if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::MED_PORTIONS ) ) {
2630  info.emplace_back( "MED", _( "Portions: " ),
2631  std::abs( static_cast<int>( med_item->count() ) * batch ) );
2632  }
2633 
2634  if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::MED_CONSUME_TIME ) ) {
2635  info.emplace_back( "MED", _( "Consume time: " ),
2636  to_string( player_character.get_consume_time( *med_item ) ) );
2637  }
2638 
2639  bool addictive = false;
2640  for( const std::pair<const addiction_id, int> &add : med_com->addictions ) {
2641  if( add.second > 0 ) {
2642  addictive = true;
2643  break;
2644  }
2645  }
2646  if( addictive && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_MED_ADDICTING ) ) {
2647  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", _( "* Consuming this item is <bad>addicting</bad>." ) );
2648  }
2649 
2650  rot_info( med_item, info, parts, batch, debug );
2651 }
2652 
2653 void item::food_info( const item *food_item, std::vector<iteminfo> &info,
2654  const iteminfo_query *parts, int batch, bool debug ) const
2655 {
2656  nutrients min_nutr;
2657  nutrients max_nutr;
2658 
2659  Character &player_character = get_player_character();
2660  std::string recipe_exemplar = get_var( "recipe_exemplar", "" );
2661  if( recipe_exemplar.empty() ) {
2662  min_nutr = max_nutr = player_character.compute_effective_nutrients( *food_item );
2663  } else {
2664  std::map<recipe_id, std::pair<nutrients, nutrients>> rec_cache;
2665  std::tie( min_nutr, max_nutr ) =
2666  player_character.compute_nutrient_range( *food_item, recipe_id( recipe_exemplar ), rec_cache );
2667  }
2668 
2669  bool show_nutr = parts->test( iteminfo_parts::FOOD_NUTRITION ) ||
2670  parts->test( iteminfo_parts::FOOD_VITAMINS );
2671  if( min_nutr != max_nutr && show_nutr ) {
2672  info.emplace_back(
2673  "FOOD", _( "Nutrition will <color_cyan>vary with chosen ingredients</color>." ) );
2674  if( recipe_dict.is_item_on_loop( food_item->typeId() ) ) {
2675  info.emplace_back(
2676  "FOOD", _( "Nutrition range cannot be calculated accurately due to "
2677  "<color_red>recipe loops</color>." ) );
2678  }
2679  }
2680 
2681  if( max_nutr.kcal() != 0 || food_item->get_comestible()->quench != 0 ) {
2682  if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::FOOD_NUTRITION ) ) {
2683  info.emplace_back( "FOOD", _( "<bold>Calories (kcal)</bold>: " ),
2684  "", iteminfo::no_newline, min_nutr.kcal() );
2685  if( max_nutr.kcal() != min_nutr.kcal() ) {
2686  info.emplace_back( "FOOD", _( "-" ),
2687  "", iteminfo::no_newline, max_nutr.kcal() );
2688  }
2689  }
2690  if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::FOOD_QUENCH ) ) {
2691  const std::string space = " ";
2692  info.emplace_back( "FOOD", space + _( "Quench: " ),
2693  food_item->get_comestible()->quench );
2694  }
2695  if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::FOOD_SATIATION ) ) {
2696 
2697  if( max_nutr.kcal() == min_nutr.kcal() ) {
2698  info.emplace_back( "FOOD", _( "<bold>Satiety: </bold>" ),
2699  satiety_bar( player_character.compute_calories_per_effective_volume( *food_item ) ) );
2700  } else {
2701  info.emplace_back( "FOOD", _( "<bold>Satiety: </bold>" ),
2702  satiety_bar( player_character.compute_calories_per_effective_volume( *food_item, &min_nutr ) ),
2703  iteminfo::no_newline
2704  );
2705  info.emplace_back( "FOOD", _( " - " ),
2706  satiety_bar( player_character.compute_calories_per_effective_volume( *food_item, &max_nutr ) ) );
2707  }
2708  }
2709  }
2710 
2711  const std::pair<int, int> fun_for_food_item = player_character.fun_for( *food_item );
2712  if( fun_for_food_item.first != 0 && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::FOOD_JOY ) ) {
2713  info.emplace_back( "FOOD", _( "Enjoyability: " ), fun_for_food_item.first );
2714  }
2715 
2716  if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::FOOD_HEALTH ) && food_item->get_comestible()->healthy != 0 ) {
2717  info.emplace_back( "MED", _( "Health: " ),
2718  healthy_bar( food_item->get_comestible()->healthy ) );
2719  }
2720 
2721  if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::FOOD_PORTIONS ) ) {
2722  info.emplace_back( "FOOD", _( "Portions: " ),
2723  std::abs( static_cast<int>( food_item->count() ) * batch ) );
2724  }
2725  if( food_item->corpse != nullptr && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::FOOD_SMELL ) &&
2726  ( debug || ( g != nullptr && player_character.has_trait( trait_CARNIVORE ) ) ) ) {
2727  info.emplace_back( "FOOD", _( "Smells like: " ) + food_item->corpse->nname() );
2728  }
2729 
2730  if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::FOOD_CONSUME_TIME ) ) {
2731  info.emplace_back( "FOOD", _( "Consume time: " ),
2732  to_string( player_character.get_consume_time( *food_item ) ) );
2733  }
2734 
2735  auto format_vitamin = [&]( const std::pair<vitamin_id, int> &v, bool display_vitamins ) {
2736  const bool is_vitamin = v.first->type() == vitamin_type::VITAMIN;
2737  // only display vitamins that we actually require
2738  if( player_character.vitamin_rate( v.first ) == 0_turns || v.second == 0 ||
2739  display_vitamins != is_vitamin || v.first->has_flag( flag_NO_DISPLAY ) ) {
2740  return std::string();
2741  }
2742  const int min_value = min_nutr.get_vitamin( v.first );
2743  const int max_value = v.second;
2744  const int min_rda = player_character.vitamin_RDA( v.first, min_value );
2745  const int max_rda = player_character.vitamin_RDA( v.first, max_value );
2746  std::pair<std::string, std::string> weight_and_units = v.first->mass_str_from_units( v.second );
2747  std::string weight_str;
2748  if( !weight_and_units.first.empty() ) {
2749  if( min_value != max_value ) {
2750  std::pair<std::string, std::string> min_weight_and_units = v.first->mass_str_from_units(
2751  min_nutr.get_vitamin( v.first ) );
2752  const bool show_first_unit = ( min_value != 0 ) &&
2753  ( min_weight_and_units.second != weight_and_units.second );
2754  std::string first_string = string_format( !show_first_unit ? "%s" : "%s %s",
2755  min_weight_and_units.first, min_weight_and_units.second );
2756  weight_str = string_format( "%s-%s %s ", first_string, weight_and_units.first,
2757  weight_and_units.second );
2758  } else {
2759  weight_str = string_format( "%s %s ", weight_and_units.first, weight_and_units.second );
2760  }
2761  }
2762  std::string format;
2763  if( is_vitamin ) {
2764  format = min_value == max_value ? "%s%s (%i%%)" : "%s%s (%i-%i%%)";
2765  return string_format( format, weight_str, v.first->name(), min_rda, max_rda );
2766  }
2767  format = min_value == max_value ? "%s%s (%i U)" : "%s%s (%i-%i U)";
2768  return string_format( format, weight_str, v.first->name(), min_value, max_value );
2769  };
2770 
2771  const auto max_nutr_vitamins = sorted_lex( max_nutr.vitamins() );
2772  const std::string required_vits = enumerate_as_string( max_nutr_vitamins,
2773  [&]( const std::pair<vitamin_id, int> &v ) {
2774  return format_vitamin( v, true );
2775  } );
2776 
2777  const std::string effect_vits = enumerate_as_string( max_nutr_vitamins,
2778  [&]( const std::pair<vitamin_id, int> &v ) {
2779  return format_vitamin( v, false );
2780  } );
2781 
2782  if( !required_vits.empty() && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::FOOD_VITAMINS ) ) {
2783  info.emplace_back( "FOOD", _( "Vitamins (RDA): " ), required_vits );
2784  }
2785 
2786  if( !effect_vits.empty() && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::FOOD_VIT_EFFECTS ) ) {
2787  info.emplace_back( "FOOD", _( "Other contents: " ), effect_vits );
2788  }
2789 
2790  insert_separation_line( info );
2791 
2792  if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::FOOD_ALLERGEN )
2793  && player_character.allergy_type( *food_item ) != morale_null ) {
2794  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
2795  _( "* This food will cause an <bad>allergic reaction</bad>." ) );
2796  }
2797 
2798  if( food_item->has_vitamin( vitamin_human_flesh_vitamin ) &&
2799  parts->test( iteminfo_parts::FOOD_CANNIBALISM ) ) {
2800  if( !player_character.has_flag( json_flag_CANNIBAL ) &&
2801  !player_character.has_flag( json_flag_PSYCHOPATH ) &&
2802  !player_character.has_flag( json_flag_SAPIOVORE ) ) {
2803  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
2804  _( "* This food contains <bad>human flesh</bad>." ) );
2805  } else {
2806  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
2807  _( "* This food contains <good>human flesh</good>." ) );
2808  }
2809  }
2810 
2811  if( food_item->is_tainted() && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::FOOD_CANNIBALISM ) ) {
2812  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
2813  _( "* This food is <bad>tainted</bad> and will poison you." ) );
2814  }
2815 
2816  ///\EFFECT_SURVIVAL >=3 allows detection of poisonous food
2817  if( food_item->has_flag( flag_HIDDEN_POISON ) &&
2818  player_character.get_greater_skill_or_knowledge_level( skill_survival ) >= 3 &&
2819  parts->test( iteminfo_parts::FOOD_POISON ) ) {
2820  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
2821  _( "* On closer inspection, this appears to be "
2822  "<bad>poisonous</bad>." ) );
2823  }
2824 
2825  ///\EFFECT_SURVIVAL >=5 allows detection of hallucinogenic food
2826  if( food_item->has_flag( flag_HIDDEN_HALLU ) &&
2827  player_character.get_greater_skill_or_knowledge_level( skill_survival ) >= 5 &&
2828  parts->test( iteminfo_parts::FOOD_HALLUCINOGENIC ) ) {
2829  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
2830  _( "* On closer inspection, this appears to be "
2831  "<neutral>hallucinogenic</neutral>." ) );
2832  }
2833 
2834  rot_info( food_item, info, parts, batch, debug );
2835 }
2836 
2837 void item::rot_info( const item *const food_item, std::vector<iteminfo> &info,
2838  const iteminfo_query *const parts, const int /*batch*/, const bool /*debug*/ ) const
2839 {
2840  Character &player_character = get_player_character();
2841 
2842  if( food_item->goes_bad() && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::FOOD_ROT ) ) {
2843  const std::string rot_time = to_string_clipped( food_item->get_shelf_life() );
2844  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
2845  string_format( _( "* This item is <neutral>perishable</neutral>, "
2846  "and at room temperature has an estimated nominal "
2847  "shelf life of <info>%s</info>." ), rot_time ) );
2848 
2849  if( !food_item->rotten() ) {
2850  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", get_freshness_description( *food_item ) );
2851  }
2852 
2853  if( food_item->has_flag( flag_FREEZERBURN ) && !food_item->rotten() &&
2854  !food_item->has_flag( flag_MUSHY ) ) {
2855  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
2856  _( "* Quality of this food suffers when it's frozen, and it "
2857  "<neutral>will become mushy after thawing out</neutral>." ) );
2858  }
2859  if( food_item->has_flag( flag_MUSHY ) && !food_item->rotten() ) {
2860  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
2861  _( "* It was frozen once and after thawing became <bad>mushy and "
2862  "tasteless</bad>. It will rot quickly if thawed again." ) );
2863  }
2864  if( food_item->has_flag( flag_NO_PARASITES ) &&
2865  player_character.get_greater_skill_or_knowledge_level( skill_cooking ) >= 3 ) {
2866  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
2867  _( "* It seems that deep freezing <good>killed all "
2868  "parasites</good>." ) );
2869  }
2870  if( food_item->rotten() ) {
2871  if( player_character.has_bionic( bio_digestion ) ) {
2872  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
2873  _( "This item has started to <neutral>rot</neutral>, "
2874  "but <info>your bionic digestion can tolerate "
2875  "it</info>." ) );
2876  } else if( player_character.has_flag( json_flag_IMMUNE_SPOIL ) ) {
2877  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
2878  _( "This item has started to <neutral>rot</neutral>, "
2879  "but <info>you can tolerate it</info>." ) );
2880  } else {
2881  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
2882  _( "This item has started to <bad>rot</bad>. "
2883  "<info>Eating</info> it would be a <bad>very bad "
2884  "idea</bad>." ) );
2885  }
2886  }
2887  }
2888 }
2889 
2890 void item::magazine_info( std::vector<iteminfo> &info, const iteminfo_query *parts, int /*batch*/,
2891  bool /*debug*/ ) const
2892 {
2893  if( !is_magazine() || has_flag( flag_NO_RELOAD ) || is_tool() ) {
2894  return;
2895  }
2896 
2897  if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::MAGAZINE_COMPATIBLE_GUNS ) &&
2898  islot_magazine::compatible_guns.find( this->typeId() ) != islot_magazine::compatible_guns.end() ) {
2899  const auto compare = []( const auto & lhs, const auto & rhs ) {
2900  return localized_compare( lhs, rhs );
2901  };
2902  std::set<std::string, decltype( compare )> compatible_guns( compare );
2903 
2904  for( const itype_id &gun_type_id : islot_magazine::compatible_guns[this->typeId()] ) {
2905  const itype &gun_type = gun_type_id.obj();
2906  if( get_option<bool>( "SHOW_GUN_VARIANTS" ) ) {
2907  if( gun_type.variants.empty() ) {
2908  compatible_guns.insert( gun_type.nname( 1 ) );
2909  }
2910  for( const itype_variant_data &variant_type : gun_type.variants ) {
2911  compatible_guns.insert( variant_type.alt_name.translated() );
2912  }
2913  } else {
2914  compatible_guns.insert( gun_type.nname( 1 ) );
2915  }
2916  }
2917 
2918  if( !compatible_guns.empty() ) {
2919  const std::string mag_names = enumerate_as_string( compatible_guns );
2920  info.emplace_back( "MAGAZINE", _( "<bold>Compatible guns</bold>: " ) + mag_names );
2921  insert_separation_line( info );
2922  }
2923  }
2924  if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::MAGAZINE_CAPACITY ) ) {
2925  for( const ammotype &at : ammo_types() ) {
2926  const std::string fmt = string_format( n_gettext( "<num> round of %s",
2927  "<num> rounds of %s", ammo_capacity( at ) ),
2928  at->name() );
2929  info.emplace_back( "MAGAZINE", _( "Capacity: " ), fmt, iteminfo::no_flags,
2930  ammo_capacity( at ) );
2931  }
2932  }
2933  if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::MAGAZINE_COMPATABILITY ) ) {
2934  for( const ammotype &at : ammo_types() ) {
2935  std::string ammo_details = print_ammo( at );
2936  if( !ammo_details.empty() ) {
2937  info.emplace_back( "MAGAZINE", _( "Variants: " ), ammo_details, iteminfo::no_flags );
2938  }
2939 
2940  }
2941  }
2942  if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::MAGAZINE_RELOAD ) && type->magazine ) {
2943  info.emplace_back( "MAGAZINE", _( "Reload time: " ), _( "<num> moves per round" ),
2944  iteminfo::lower_is_better, type->magazine->reload_time );
2945  }
2946  insert_separation_line( info );
2947 }
2948 
2949 void item::ammo_info( std::vector<iteminfo> &info, const iteminfo_query *parts, int /* batch */,
2950  bool /* debug */ ) const
2951 {
2952  // Skip this section for guns and items without ammo data
2953  if( is_gun() || !ammo_data() ||
2954  !parts->test( iteminfo_parts::AMMO_REMAINING_OR_TYPES ) ) {
2955  return;
2956  }
2957 
2958  const islot_ammo &ammo = *ammo_data()->ammo;
2959  if( !ammo.damage.empty() || ammo.force_stat_display ) {
2960  if( is_ammo() ) {
2961  info.emplace_back( "AMMO", _( "<bold>Ammunition type</bold>: " ), ammo_type()->name() );
2962  } else if( ammo_remaining() > 0 ) {
2963  info.emplace_back( "AMMO", _( "<bold>Ammunition</bold>: " ),
2964  ammo_data()->nname( ammo_remaining() ) );
2965  }
2966 
2967  const std::string space = " ";
2968  if( !ammo.damage.empty() && ammo.damage.damage_units.front().amount > 0 ) {
2969  if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::AMMO_DAMAGE_VALUE ) ) {
2970  info.emplace_back( "AMMO", _( "Damage: " ), "",
2971  iteminfo::no_newline, ammo.damage.total_damage() );
2972  }
2973  } else if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::AMMO_DAMAGE_PROPORTIONAL ) ) {
2974  const float multiplier = ammo.damage.empty() ? 1.0f
2975  : ammo.damage.damage_units.front().unconditional_damage_mult;
2976  info.emplace_back( "AMMO", _( "Damage multiplier: " ), "",
2977  iteminfo::no_newline | iteminfo::is_decimal,
2978  multiplier );
2979  }
2980  if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::AMMO_DAMAGE_AP ) ) {
2981  info.emplace_back( "AMMO", space + _( "Armor-pierce: " ), get_ranged_pierce( ammo ) );
2982  }
2983  if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::AMMO_DAMAGE_RANGE ) ) {
2984  info.emplace_back( "AMMO", _( "Range: " ), "<num>" + space,
2985  iteminfo::no_newline, ammo.range );
2986  }
2987  if( ammo.range_multiplier != 1.0f && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::AMMO_DAMAGE_RANGE_MULTIPLIER ) ) {
2988  info.emplace_back( "AMMO", _( "Range Multiplier: " ), "<num>",
2989  iteminfo::is_decimal, ammo.range_multiplier );
2990  }
2991  if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::AMMO_DAMAGE_DISPERSION ) ) {
2992  info.emplace_back( "AMMO", _( "Dispersion: " ), "",
2993  iteminfo::lower_is_better, ammo.dispersion );
2994  }
2995  if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::AMMO_DAMAGE_RECOIL ) ) {
2996  info.emplace_back( "AMMO", _( "Recoil: " ), "",
2997  iteminfo::lower_is_better | iteminfo::no_newline, ammo.recoil );
2998  }
2999  if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::AMMO_DAMAGE_CRIT_MULTIPLIER ) ) {
3000  info.emplace_back( "AMMO", space + _( "Critical multiplier: " ), ammo.critical_multiplier );
3001  }
3002  if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::AMMO_BARREL_DETAILS ) ) {
3003  std::string barrel_details;
3004  const units::length small = 150_mm;
3005  const units::length medium = 400_mm;
3006  const units::length large = 600_mm;
3007  const int small_damage = static_cast<int>( ammo.damage.di_considering_length(
3008  small ).total_damage() );
3009  const int medium_damage = static_cast<int>( ammo.damage.di_considering_length(
3010  medium ).total_damage() );
3011  const int large_damage = static_cast<int>( ammo.damage.di_considering_length(
3012  large ).total_damage() );
3013  const int small_dispersion = static_cast<int>( ammo.dispersion_considering_length( small ) );
3014  const int medium_dispersion = static_cast<int>( ammo.dispersion_considering_length( medium ) );
3015  const int large_dispersion = static_cast<int>( ammo.dispersion_considering_length( large ) );
3016  if( small_damage != medium_damage || medium_damage != large_damage ||
3017  small_dispersion != medium_dispersion || medium_damage != large_dispersion ) {
3018  info.emplace_back( "AMMO", _( "Damage and dispersion by barrel length: " ) );
3019  const std::string small_string = string_format( " <info>%d %s</info>: ",
3020  convert_length( small ),
3021  length_units( small ) );
3022  info.emplace_back( "AMMO", small_string, _( " damage: <num>" ), iteminfo::no_newline,
3023  small_damage );
3024  info.emplace_back( "AMMO", "", _( " dispersion: <num>" ),
3025  iteminfo::no_name | iteminfo::lower_is_better, small_dispersion );
3026  const std::string medium_string = string_format( " <info>%d %s</info>: ",
3027  convert_length( medium ),
3028  length_units( medium ) );
3029  info.emplace_back( "AMMO", medium_string, _( " damage: <num>" ), iteminfo::no_newline,
3030  medium_damage );
3031  info.emplace_back( "AMMO", "", _( " dispersion: <num>" ),
3032  iteminfo::no_name | iteminfo::lower_is_better, medium_dispersion );
3033  const std::string large_string = string_format( " <info>%d %s</info>: ",
3034  convert_length( large ),
3035  length_units( large ) );
3036  info.emplace_back( "AMMO", large_string, _( " damage: <num>" ), iteminfo::no_newline,
3037  large_damage );
3038  info.emplace_back( "AMMO", "", _( " dispersion: <num>" ),
3039  iteminfo::no_name | iteminfo::lower_is_better, large_dispersion );
3040  }
3041  }
3042  }
3043 
3044  std::vector<std::string> fx;
3045  if( ammo.ammo_effects.count( "RECYCLED" ) &&
3046  parts->test( iteminfo_parts::AMMO_FX_RECYCLED ) ) {
3047  fx.emplace_back( _( "This ammo has been <bad>hand-loaded</bad>." ) );
3048  }
3049  if( ammo.ammo_effects.count( "MATCHHEAD" ) &&
3050  parts->test( iteminfo_parts::AMMO_FX_BLACKPOWDER ) ) {
3051  fx.emplace_back(
3052  _( "This ammo has been loaded with <bad>matchhead powder</bad>, and will quickly "
3053  "clog and rust most guns like blackpowder, but will also rarely cause the gun damage from pressure spikes." ) );
3054  } else if( ammo.ammo_effects.count( "BLACKPOWDER" ) &&
3055  parts->test( iteminfo_parts::AMMO_FX_BLACKPOWDER ) ) {
3056  fx.emplace_back(
3057  _( "This ammo has been loaded with <bad>blackpowder</bad>, and will quickly "
3058  "clog up most guns, and cause rust if the gun is not cleaned." ) );
3059  }
3060  if( ammo.ammo_effects.count( "NEVER_MISFIRES" ) &&
3061  parts->test( iteminfo_parts::AMMO_FX_CANTMISSFIRE ) ) {
3062  fx.emplace_back( _( "This ammo <good>never misfires</good>." ) );
3063  }
3064  if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::AMMO_FX_RECOVER ) ) {
3065  for( const std::string &effect : ammo.ammo_effects ) {
3066  if( string_starts_with( effect, "RECOVER_" ) ) {
3067  ret_val<int> try_recover_chance =
3068  try_parse_integer<int>( effect.substr( 8 ), false );
3069  if( !try_recover_chance.success() ) {
3070  debugmsg( "Error parsing ammo RECOVER_ denominator: %s",
3071  try_recover_chance.str() );
3072  break;
3073  }
3074  int recover_chance = try_recover_chance.value();
3075  if( recover_chance <= 5 ) {
3076  fx.emplace_back( _( "Stands a <bad>very low</bad> chance of remaining intact once fired." ) );
3077  } else if( recover_chance <= 10 ) {
3078  fx.emplace_back( _( "Stands a <bad>low</bad> chance of remaining intact once fired." ) );
3079  } else if( recover_chance <= 20 ) {
3080  fx.emplace_back( _( "Stands a <bad>somewhat low</bad> chance of remaining intact once fired." ) );
3081  } else if( recover_chance <= 30 ) {
3082  fx.emplace_back( _( "Stands a <good>decent</good> chance of remaining intact once fired." ) );
3083  } else {
3084  fx.emplace_back( _( "Stands a <good>good</good> chance of remaining intact once fired." ) );
3085  }
3086  break;
3087  }
3088  }
3089  }
3090  if( ( ammo.ammo_effects.count( "INCENDIARY" ) || ammo.ammo_effects.count( "IGNITE" ) ) &&
3091  parts->test( iteminfo_parts::AMMO_FX_INCENDIARY ) ) {
3092  fx.emplace_back( _( "This ammo <neutral>may start fires</neutral>." ) );
3093  }
3094  if( !fx.empty() ) {
3095  insert_separation_line( info );
3096  for( const std::string &e : fx ) {
3097  info.emplace_back( "AMMO", e );
3098  }
3099  }
3100 }
3101 
3102 void item::gun_info( const item *mod, std::vector<iteminfo> &info, const iteminfo_query *parts,
3103  int /* batch */, bool /* debug */ ) const
3104 {
3105  const std::string space = " ";
3106  const islot_gun &gun = *mod->type->gun;
3107  const Skill &skill = *mod->gun_skill();
3108 
3109  // many statistics are dependent upon loaded ammo
3110  // if item is unloaded (or is RELOAD_AND_SHOOT) shows approximate stats using default ammo
3111  const item *loaded_mod = mod;
3112  item tmp;
3113  const itype *curammo = nullptr;
3114  if( mod->ammo_required() && !mod->ammo_remaining() ) {
3115  tmp = *mod;
3116  if( tmp.ammo_types().size() == 1 && *tmp.ammo_types().begin() == ammotype::NULL_ID() ) {
3117  itype_id default_bore_type_id = itype_id::NULL_ID();
3118  for( const itype_id &bore_type_id : type->gun->default_mods ) {
3119  std::map< ammotype, std::set<itype_id> > magazine_adaptor = find_type(
3120  bore_type_id )->mod->magazine_adaptor;
3121  if( !magazine_adaptor.empty() && !magazine_adaptor.begin()->second.empty() ) {
3122  default_bore_type_id = bore_type_id;
3123  item tmp_mod( bore_type_id );
3124  tmp.put_in( tmp_mod, pocket_type::MOD );
3125  item tmp_mag( *magazine_adaptor.begin()->second.begin() );
3126  tmp_mag.ammo_set( magazine_adaptor.begin()->first->default_ammotype() );
3127  tmp.put_in( tmp_mag, pocket_type::MAGAZINE_WELL );
3128  break;
3129  }
3130  }
3131  if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::GUN_DEFAULT_BORE ) ) {
3132  insert_separation_line( info );
3133  if( default_bore_type_id != itype_id::NULL_ID() ) {
3134  info.emplace_back( "GUN",
3135  _( "Weapon is <bad>not attached a bore mod</bad>, so stats below assume the default bore mod: " ),
3136  string_format( "<stat>%s</stat>",
3137  default_bore_type_id->nname( 1 ) ) );
3138  } else {
3139  info.emplace_back( "GUN",
3140  _( "Weapon is <bad>not attached a bore mod</bad>. " ) );
3141  return;
3142  }
3143 
3144  }
3145 
3146  }
3147  itype_id default_ammo = mod->magazine_current() ? tmp.common_ammo_default() : tmp.ammo_default();
3148  if( !default_ammo.is_null() ) {
3149  tmp.ammo_set( default_ammo );
3150  } else if( !tmp.magazine_default().is_null() ) {
3151  // clear out empty magazines so put_in below doesn't error
3152  for( item *i : tmp.contents.all_items_top() ) {
3153  if( i->is_magazine() ) {
3154  tmp.remove_item( *i );
3155  tmp.on_contents_changed();
3156  }
3157  }
3158 
3159  item tmp_mag( tmp.magazine_default() );
3160  tmp_mag.ammo_set( tmp_mag.ammo_default() );
3161  tmp.put_in( tmp_mag, pocket_type::MAGAZINE_WELL );
3162  }
3163  loaded_mod = &tmp;
3164  curammo = loaded_mod->ammo_data();
3165  // TODO: Should this be .is_null(), rather than comparing to "none"?
3166  if( loaded_mod == nullptr || loaded_mod->typeId().str() == "none" ||
3167  curammo == nullptr ) {
3168  if( magazine_current() ) {
3169  const itype_id mag_default = magazine_current()->ammo_default();
3170  if( mag_default.is_null() ) {
3171  debugmsg( "gun %s has magazine %s with no default ammo",
3172  typeId().c_str(), magazine_current()->typeId().c_str() );
3173  return;
3174  }
3175  curammo = &mag_default.obj();
3176  } else {
3177  debugmsg( "loaded a nun or ammo_data() is nullptr" );
3178  return;
3179  }
3180  }
3181  if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::GUN_DEFAULT_AMMO ) ) {
3182  insert_separation_line( info );
3183  info.emplace_back( "GUN",
3184  _( "Weapon is <bad>not loaded</bad>, so stats below assume the default ammo: " ),
3185  string_format( "<stat>%s</stat>",
3186  curammo->nname( 1 ) ) );
3187  }
3188  } else {
3189  curammo = loaded_mod->ammo_data();
3190  }
3191 
3192  if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::GUN_DAMAGE ) ) {
3193  insert_separation_line( info );
3194  info.emplace_back( "GUN", _( "<bold>Ranged damage</bold>: " ), "", iteminfo::no_newline,
3195  mod->gun_damage( false ).total_damage() );
3196  }
3197 
3198  if( mod->ammo_required() ) {
3199  // ammo_damage, sum_of_damage, and ammo_mult not shown so don't need to translate.
3200  float dmg_mult = 1.0f;
3201  for( const damage_unit &dmg : curammo->ammo->damage.damage_units ) {
3202  dmg_mult *= dmg.unconditional_damage_mult;
3203  }
3204  if( dmg_mult != 1.0f ) {
3205  if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::GUN_DAMAGE_AMMOPROP ) ) {
3206  info.emplace_back( "GUN", "ammo_mult", "*",
3207  iteminfo::no_newline | iteminfo::no_name | iteminfo::is_decimal, dmg_mult );
3208  }
3209  } else {
3210  if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::GUN_DAMAGE_LOADEDAMMO ) ) {
3211  damage_instance ammo_dam = curammo->ammo->damage;
3212  int bullet_damage = ammo_dam.total_damage();
3213  if( mod->barrel_length().value() > 0 ) {
3214  bullet_damage = ammo_dam.di_considering_length( mod->barrel_length() ).total_damage();
3215  }
3216  info.emplace_back( "GUN", "ammo_damage", "",
3217  iteminfo::no_newline | iteminfo::no_name |
3218  iteminfo::show_plus, bullet_damage );
3219  }
3220  }
3221 
3222  const int gun_damage = loaded_mod->gun_damage( true ).total_damage();
3223  if( damage() > 0 ) {
3224  item intact_mod( *loaded_mod );
3225  intact_mod.set_degradation( 0 );
3226  intact_mod.set_damage( 0 );
3227  const int intact_damage = intact_mod.gun_damage( true ).total_damage();
3228  if( intact_damage != gun_damage ) {
3229  const int dmg_penalty = gun_damage - intact_damage;
3230  info.emplace_back( "GUN", "damaged_weapon_penalty", "",
3231  iteminfo::no_newline | iteminfo::no_name, dmg_penalty );
3232  }
3233  }
3234 
3235  if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::GUN_DAMAGE_TOTAL ) ) {
3236  info.emplace_back( "GUN", "sum_of_damage", _( " = <num>" ),
3237  iteminfo::no_newline | iteminfo::no_name, gun_damage );
3238  }
3239  }
3240  info.back().bNewLine = true;
3241 
3242  if( mod->barrel_length().value() > 0 ) {
3243  if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::GUN_BARRELLENGTH ) ) {
3244  info.emplace_back( "GUN", string_format( _( "Barrel Length: <info>%d %s</info>" ),
3245  convert_length( mod->barrel_length() ), length_units( mod->barrel_length() ) ),
3246  iteminfo::no_flags );
3247  }
3248  }
3249 
3250  if( mod->ammo_required() && curammo->ammo->critical_multiplier != 1.0 ) {
3251  if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::AMMO_DAMAGE_CRIT_MULTIPLIER ) ) {
3252  info.emplace_back( "GUN", _( "Critical multiplier: " ), "<num>",
3253  iteminfo::no_flags, curammo->ammo->critical_multiplier );
3254  }
3255  }
3256 
3257  avatar &player_character = get_avatar();
3258  int max_gun_range = loaded_mod->gun_range( &player_character );
3259  if( max_gun_range > 0 && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::GUN_MAX_RANGE ) ) {
3260  info.emplace_back( "GUN", _( "Maximum range: " ), "<num>", iteminfo::no_flags,
3261  max_gun_range );
3262  }
3263 
3264  // TODO: This doesn't cover multiple damage types
3265 
3266  if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::GUN_ARMORPIERCE ) ) {
3267  info.emplace_back( "GUN", _( "Armor-pierce: " ), "",
3268  iteminfo::no_newline, get_ranged_pierce( gun ) );
3269  }
3270  if( mod->ammo_required() ) {
3271  int ammo_pierce = get_ranged_pierce( *curammo->ammo );
3272  // ammo_armor_pierce and sum_of_armor_pierce don't need to translate.
3273  if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::GUN_ARMORPIERCE_LOADEDAMMO ) ) {
3274  info.emplace_back( "GUN", "ammo_armor_pierce", "",
3275  iteminfo::no_newline | iteminfo::no_name |
3276  iteminfo::show_plus, ammo_pierce );
3277  }
3278  if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::GUN_ARMORPIERCE_TOTAL ) ) {
3279  info.emplace_back( "GUN", "sum_of_armor_pierce", _( " = <num>" ),
3280  iteminfo::no_name,
3281  get_ranged_pierce( gun ) + ammo_pierce );
3282  }
3283  }
3284  info.back().bNewLine = true;
3285 
3286  if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::GUN_DISPERSION ) ) {
3287  info.emplace_back( "GUN", _( "Dispersion: " ), "",
3288  iteminfo::no_newline | iteminfo::lower_is_better,
3289  mod->gun_dispersion( false, false ) );
3290  }
3291  if( mod->ammo_required() ) {
3292  int ammo_dispersion = curammo->ammo->dispersion_considering_length( barrel_length() );
3293  // ammo_dispersion and sum_of_dispersion don't need to translate.
3294  if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::GUN_DISPERSION_LOADEDAMMO ) ) {
3295  info.emplace_back( "GUN", "ammo_dispersion", "",
3296  iteminfo::no_newline | iteminfo::lower_is_better |
3297  iteminfo::no_name | iteminfo::show_plus,
3298  ammo_dispersion );
3299  }
3300  if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::GUN_DISPERSION_TOTAL ) ) {
3301  info.emplace_back( "GUN", "sum_of_dispersion", _( " = <num>" ),
3302  iteminfo::lower_is_better | iteminfo::no_name,
3303  loaded_mod->gun_dispersion( true, false ) );
3304  }
3305  }
3306  info.back().bNewLine = true;
3307 
3308  // if effective sight dispersion differs from actual sight dispersion display both
3309  std::pair<int, int> disp = mod->sight_dispersion( player_character );
3310  int act_disp = disp.first;
3311  int eff_disp = disp.second;
3312  int adj_disp = eff_disp - act_disp;
3313  int point_shooting_limit = player_character.point_shooting_limit( *mod );
3314 
3315  if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::GUN_DISPERSION_SIGHT ) ) {
3316  if( point_shooting_limit <= eff_disp ) {
3317  info.emplace_back( "GUN", _( "Sight dispersion (point shooting): " ), "",
3318  iteminfo::no_newline | iteminfo::lower_is_better,
3319  point_shooting_limit );
3320  } else {
3321  info.emplace_back( "GUN", _( "Sight dispersion: " ), "",
3322  iteminfo::no_newline | iteminfo::lower_is_better,
3323  act_disp );
3324 
3325  if( adj_disp ) {
3326  info.emplace_back( "GUN", "sight_adj_disp", "",
3327  iteminfo::no_newline | iteminfo::lower_is_better |
3328  iteminfo::no_name | iteminfo::show_plus, adj_disp );
3329  info.emplace_back( "GUN", "sight_eff_disp", _( " = <num>" ),
3330  iteminfo::lower_is_better | iteminfo::no_name,
3331  eff_disp );
3332  }
3333  }
3334  }
3335 
3336  bool bipod = mod->has_flag( flag_BIPOD );
3337  info.back().bNewLine = true;
3338  if( loaded_mod->gun_recoil( player_character ) ) {
3339  if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::GUN_RECOIL ) ) {
3340  info.emplace_back( "GUN", _( "Effective recoil: " ), "",
3341  iteminfo::no_newline | iteminfo::lower_is_better,
3342  loaded_mod->gun_recoil( player_character ) );
3343  }
3344  if( bipod && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::GUN_RECOIL_BIPOD ) ) {
3345  info.emplace_back( "GUN", "bipod_recoil", _( " (with bipod <num>)" ),
3346  iteminfo::lower_is_better | iteminfo::no_name,
3347  loaded_mod->gun_recoil( player_character, true ) );
3348  }
3349 
3350  if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::GUN_RECOIL_THEORETICAL_MINIMUM ) ) {
3351  info.back().bNewLine = true;
3352  info.emplace_back( "GUN", _( "Theoretical minimum recoil: " ), "",
3353  iteminfo::no_newline | iteminfo::lower_is_better, loaded_mod->gun_recoil( player_character, true,
3354  true ) );
3355  }
3356  if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts:: GUN_IDEAL_STRENGTH ) ) {
3357  info.emplace_back( "GUN", "ideal_strength", _( " (when strength reaches: <num>)" ),
3358  iteminfo::lower_is_better | iteminfo::no_name,
3359  loaded_mod->gun_base_weight() / 333.0_gram );
3360  }
3361  }
3362  info.back().bNewLine = true;
3363  std::map<gun_mode_id, gun_mode> fire_modes = mod->gun_all_modes();
3364 
3365  if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::GUN_RELOAD_TIME ) ) {
3366  info.emplace_back( "GUN", _( "Reload time: " ),
3367  has_flag( flag_RELOAD_ONE ) ? _( "<num> moves per round" ) :
3368  _( "<num> moves" ),
3369  iteminfo::lower_is_better, mod->get_reload_time() );
3370  }
3371 
3372  if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::GUN_CURRENT_LOUDNESS ) ) {
3373  const bool is_default_fire_mode = loaded_mod->gun_current_mode().tname() == "DEFAULT";
3374  //if empty, use the temporary gun loaded with default ammo
3375  const item::sound_data data = ( mod->ammo_required() &&
3376  !mod->ammo_remaining() ) ? tmp.gun_noise( is_default_fire_mode ) : loaded_mod->gun_noise(
3377  is_default_fire_mode );
3378  const int loudness = data.volume;
3379  info.emplace_back( "GUN", _( "Loudness with current fire mode: " ), "", iteminfo::lower_is_better,
3380  loudness );
3381  }
3382 
3383  if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::GUN_USEDSKILL ) ) {
3384  info.emplace_back( "GUN", _( "Skill used: " ),
3385  "<info>" + skill.name() + "</info>" );
3386  }
3387 
3388  if( mod->magazine_integral() || mod->magazine_current() ) {
3389  if( mod->magazine_current() && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::GUN_MAGAZINE ) ) {
3390  info.emplace_back( "GUN", _( "Magazine: " ),
3391  string_format( "<stat>%s</stat>",
3392  mod->magazine_current()->tname() ) );
3393  }
3394  if( !mod->ammo_types().empty() && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::GUN_CAPACITY ) ) {
3395  for( const ammotype &at : mod->ammo_types() ) {
3396  const std::string fmt = string_format( n_gettext( "<num> round of %s",
3397  "<num> rounds of %s",
3398  mod->ammo_capacity( at ) ), at->name() );
3399  info.emplace_back( "GUN", _( "Capacity: " ), fmt, iteminfo::no_flags,
3400  mod->ammo_capacity( at ) );
3401  std::string ammo_details = print_ammo( at );
3402  if( !ammo_details.empty() && !magazine_integral() ) {
3403  info.emplace_back( "GUN", _( "Variants: " ), ammo_details, iteminfo::no_flags );
3404  }
3405  }
3406  }
3407  } else if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::GUN_TYPE ) ) {
3408  const std::set<ammotype> types_of_ammo = mod->ammo_types();
3409  if( !types_of_ammo.empty() ) {
3410  info.emplace_back( "GUN", _( "Type: " ), enumerate_as_string( types_of_ammo,
3411  []( const ammotype & at ) {
3412  return at->name();
3413  }, enumeration_conjunction::none ) );
3414  }
3415  }
3416 
3417  if( mod->ammo_data() && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::AMMO_REMAINING ) ) {
3418  info.emplace_back( "AMMO", _( "Ammunition: " ), string_format( "<stat>%s</stat>",
3419  mod->ammo_data()->nname( mod->ammo_remaining() ) ) );
3420  }
3421 
3422  if( mod->ammo_required() > 1 && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::AMMO_TO_FIRE ) ) {
3423  info.emplace_back( "AMMO", _( "Ammunition consumed per shot: " ), "",
3424  iteminfo::lower_is_better, mod->ammo_required() );
3425  }
3426 
3427  if( mod->get_gun_energy_drain() > 0_kJ && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::AMMO_UPSCOST ) ) {
3428  info.emplace_back( "AMMO", _( "Energy per shot: " ), string_format( "<stat>%s</stat>",
3429  units::display( mod->get_gun_energy_drain() ) ) );
3430  }
3431 
3432  if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::GUN_AIMING_STATS ) ) {
3433  insert_separation_line( info );
3434  for( const aim_type &type : player_character.get_aim_types( *mod ) ) {
3435  // Nameless and immediate aim levels don't get an entry.
3436  if( type.name.empty() || type.threshold == static_cast<int>( MAX_RECOIL ) ) {
3437  continue;
3438  }
3439  // For item comparison to work correctly each info object needs a
3440  // distinct tag per aim type.
3441  const std::string tag = "GUN_" + type.name;
3442  info.emplace_back( tag, string_format( "<info>%s</info>", type.name ) );
3443  int max_dispersion = player_character.get_weapon_dispersion( *loaded_mod ).max();
3444  int range = range_with_even_chance_of_good_hit( max_dispersion + type.threshold );
3445  info.emplace_back( tag, _( "Even chance of good hit at range: " ),
3446  _( "<num>" ), iteminfo::no_flags, range );
3447  int aim_mv = player_character.gun_engagement_moves( *mod, type.threshold );
3448  info.emplace_back( tag, _( "Time to reach aim level: " ), _( "<num> moves" ),
3449  iteminfo::lower_is_better, aim_mv );
3450  }
3451  }
3452 
3453  if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::GUN_FIRE_MODES ) ) {
3454  std::vector<std::string> fm;
3455  for( const std::pair<const gun_mode_id, gun_mode> &e : fire_modes ) {
3456  if( e.second.target == this && !e.second.melee() ) {
3457  fm.emplace_back( string_format( "%s (%i)", e.second.tname(), e.second.qty ) );
3458  }
3459  }
3460  if( !fm.empty() ) {
3461  insert_separation_line( info );
3462  info.emplace_back( "GUN", _( "<bold>Fire modes</bold>: " ) + enumerate_as_string( fm ) );
3463  }
3464  }
3465 
3466  if( !magazine_integral() && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::GUN_ALLOWED_MAGAZINES ) ) {
3467  insert_separation_line( info );
3468  if( uses_magazine() ) {
3469  // Keep this identical with tool magazines in item::tool_info
3470  const std::vector<itype_id> compat_sorted = sorted_lex( magazine_compatible() );
3471  const std::string mag_names = enumerate_as_string( compat_sorted,
3472  []( const itype_id & id ) {
3473  return item::nname( id );
3474  } );
3475 
3476  const std::set<flag_id> flag_restrictions = contents.magazine_flag_restrictions();
3477  const std::string flag_names = enumerate_as_string( flag_restrictions,
3478  []( const flag_id & e ) {
3479  return e->name();
3480  } );
3481 
3482  std::string display = _( "<bold>Compatible magazines</bold>:" );
3483  if( !compat_sorted.empty() ) {
3484  display += _( "\n<bold>Types</bold>: " ) + mag_names;
3485  }
3486  if( !flag_restrictions.empty() ) {
3487  display += _( "\n<bold>Form factors</bold>: " ) + flag_names;
3488  }
3489 
3490  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", display );
3491  }
3492  }
3493 
3494  if( !gun.valid_mod_locations.empty() && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_GUN_MODS ) ) {
3495  insert_separation_line( info );
3496 
3497  std::string mod_str = _( "<bold>Mods</bold>:" );
3498 
3499  std::map<gunmod_location, int> mod_locations = get_mod_locations();
3500 
3501  int iternum = 0;
3502  mod_str += "\n";
3503  for( std::pair<const gunmod_location, int> &elem : mod_locations ) {
3504  if( iternum != 0 ) {
3505  mod_str += "\n";
3506  }
3507  const int free_slots = elem.second - get_free_mod_locations( elem.first );
3508  mod_str += string_format( "<color_cyan># </color>%s:", elem.first.name() );
3509 
3510  for( const item *gmod : gunmods() ) {
3511  if( gmod->type->gunmod->location == elem.first ) { // if mod for this location
3512  mod_str +=
3513  string_format( "\n <stat>[</stat><color_light_green> </color><stat>%s]</stat>",
3514  gmod->tname( 1, false ) );
3515  }
3516  }
3517  for( int i = free_slots + 1 ; i <= elem.second ; i++ ) {
3518  if( i == free_slots + 1 && i <= elem.second ) {
3519  mod_str += string_format( "\n " );
3520  }
3521  mod_str += string_format( " <color_dark_gray>[-%s-]</color>", _( "empty" ) );
3522  }
3523  iternum++;
3524  }
3525  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", mod_str );
3526  }
3527 
3528  if( mod->casings_count() && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_GUN_CASINGS ) ) {
3529  insert_separation_line( info );
3530  std::string tmp = n_gettext( "Contains <stat>%i</stat> casing",
3531  "Contains <stat>%i</stat> casings", mod->casings_count() );
3532  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", string_format( tmp, mod->casings_count() ) );
3533  }
3534 
3535  if( is_gun() && has_flag( flag_FIRE_TWOHAND ) &&
3536  parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_TWOHANDED ) ) {
3537  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
3538  _( "This weapon needs <info>two free hands</info> to fire." ) );
3539  }
3540 }
3541 
3542 void item::gunmod_info( std::vector<iteminfo> &info, const iteminfo_query *parts, int /* batch */,
3543  bool /* debug */ ) const
3544 {
3545  if( !is_gunmod() ) {
3546  return;
3547  }
3548  const islot_gunmod &mod = *type->gunmod;
3549 
3550  if( is_gun() && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_GUNMOD ) ) {
3551  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
3552  _( "This mod <info>must be attached to a gun</info>, "
3553  "it can not be fired separately." ) );
3554  }
3555  if( has_flag( flag_REACH_ATTACK ) && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_GUNMOD_REACH ) ) {
3556  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
3557  _( "When attached to a gun, <good>allows</good> making "
3558  "<info>reach melee attacks</info> with it." ) );
3559  }
3560 
3561  if( is_gunmod() && has_flag( flag_DISABLE_SIGHTS ) &&
3562  parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_GUNMOD_DISABLESSIGHTS ) ) {
3563  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
3564  _( "This mod <bad>obscures sights</bad> of the "
3565  "base weapon." ) );
3566  }
3567 
3568  if( is_gunmod() && has_flag( flag_CONSUMABLE ) &&
3569  parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_GUNMOD_CONSUMABLE ) ) {
3570  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
3571  _( "This mod might <bad>suffer wear</bad> when firing "
3572  "the base weapon." ) );
3573  }
3574 
3575  if( mod.dispersion != 0 && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::GUNMOD_DISPERSION ) ) {
3576  info.emplace_back( "GUNMOD", _( "Dispersion modifier: " ), "",
3577  iteminfo::lower_is_better | iteminfo::show_plus,
3578  mod.dispersion );
3579  }
3580  if( mod.sight_dispersion != -1 && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::GUNMOD_DISPERSION_SIGHT ) ) {
3581  info.emplace_back( "GUNMOD", _( "Sight dispersion: " ), "",
3582  iteminfo::lower_is_better, mod.sight_dispersion );
3583  }
3584  if( mod.field_of_view > 0 && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::GUNMOD_FIELD_OF_VIEW ) ) {
3585  if( mod.field_of_view >= MAX_RECOIL ) {
3586  info.emplace_back( "GUNMOD", _( "Field of view: <good>No limit</good>" ) );
3587  } else {
3588  info.emplace_back( "GUNMOD", _( "Field of view: " ), "",
3589  iteminfo::no_flags, mod.field_of_view );
3590  }
3591  }
3592  if( mod.field_of_view > 0 && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::GUNMOD_AIM_SPEED_MODIFIER ) ) {
3593  info.emplace_back( "GUNMOD", _( "Aim speed modifier: " ), "",
3594  iteminfo::no_flags, mod.aim_speed_modifier );
3595  }
3596  int total_damage = static_cast<int>( mod.damage.total_damage() );
3597  if( total_damage != 0 && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::GUNMOD_DAMAGE ) ) {
3598  info.emplace_back( "GUNMOD", _( "Damage: " ), "", iteminfo::show_plus,
3599  total_damage );
3600  }
3601  int pierce = get_ranged_pierce( mod );
3602  if( get_ranged_pierce( mod ) != 0 && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::GUNMOD_ARMORPIERCE ) ) {
3603  info.emplace_back( "GUNMOD", _( "Armor-pierce: " ), "", iteminfo::show_plus,
3604  pierce );
3605  }
3606  if( mod.range != 0 && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::GUNMOD_RANGE ) ) {
3607  info.emplace_back( "GUNMOD", _( "Range: " ), "",
3608  iteminfo::show_plus | iteminfo::no_newline, mod.range );
3609  }
3610  if( mod.range_multiplier != 1.0f && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::GUNMOD_RANGE_MULTIPLIER ) ) {
3611  info.emplace_back( "GUNMOD", _( "Range Multiplier: " ), "",
3612  iteminfo::is_decimal, mod.range_multiplier );
3613  }
3614  if( mod.handling != 0 && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::GUNMOD_HANDLING ) ) {
3615  info.emplace_back( "GUNMOD", _( "Handling modifier: " ), "",
3616  iteminfo::show_plus, mod.handling );
3617  }
3618  if( mod.loudness != 0 && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::GUNMOD_LOUDNESS_MODIFIER ) ) {
3619  info.emplace_back( "GUNMOD", _( "Loudness modifier: " ), "",
3620  iteminfo::lower_is_better | iteminfo::show_plus,
3621  mod.loudness );
3622  }
3623  if( !type->mod->ammo_modifier.empty() && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::GUNMOD_AMMO ) ) {
3624  for( const ammotype &at : type->mod->ammo_modifier ) {
3625  info.emplace_back( "GUNMOD", string_format( _( "Ammo: <stat>%s</stat>" ),
3626  at->name() ) );
3627  }
3628  }
3629  if( mod.reload_modifier != 0 && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::GUNMOD_RELOAD ) ) {
3630  info.emplace_back( "GUNMOD", _( "Reload modifier: " ), _( "<num>%" ),
3631  iteminfo::lower_is_better, mod.reload_modifier );
3632  }
3633  if( mod.min_str_required_mod > 0 && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::GUNMOD_STRENGTH ) ) {
3634  info.emplace_back( "GUNMOD", _( "Minimum strength required modifier: " ),
3635  mod.min_str_required_mod );
3636  }
3637  if( !mod.add_mod.empty() && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::GUNMOD_ADD_MOD ) ) {
3638  insert_separation_line( info );
3639 
3640  std::string mod_loc_str = _( "<bold>Adds mod locations: </bold> " );
3641 
3642  std::map<gunmod_location, int> mod_locations = mod.add_mod;
3643 
3644  int iternum = 0;
3645  for( std::pair<const gunmod_location, int> &elem : mod_locations ) {
3646  if( iternum != 0 ) {
3647  mod_loc_str += "; ";
3648  }
3649  mod_loc_str += string_format( "<bold>%s</bold> %s", elem.second, elem.first.name() );
3650  iternum++;
3651  }
3652  mod_loc_str += ".";
3653  info.emplace_back( "GUNMOD", mod_loc_str );
3654  }
3655 
3656  insert_separation_line( info );
3657 
3658  if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::GUNMOD_USEDON ) ) {
3659  std::set<std::string> used_on_translated; // uses set to prune duplicates
3660  for( const gun_type_type &gtt : mod.usable ) {
3661  used_on_translated.emplace( string_format( "<info>%s</info>", gtt.name() ) );
3662  }
3663  info.emplace_back( "GUNMOD", _( "Used on: " ) + enumerate_as_string( used_on_translated ) );
3664  }
3665 
3666  if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::GUNMOD_LOCATION ) ) {
3667  info.emplace_back( "GUNMOD", string_format( _( "Location: %s" ), mod.location.name() ) );
3668  }
3669 
3670  if( !mod.blacklist_slot.empty() && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::GUNMOD_BLACKLIST_SLOT ) ) {
3671  std::string mod_black_str = _( "<bold>Incompatible with gunmods: </bold> " );
3672 
3673  int iternum = 0;
3674  for( const gunmod_location &black : mod.blacklist_slot ) {
3675  if( iternum != 0 ) {
3676  mod_black_str += ", ";
3677  }
3678  mod_black_str += string_format( "%s", ( black.name() ) );
3679  iternum++;
3680  }
3681  mod_black_str += ".";
3682  info.emplace_back( "GUNMOD", mod_black_str );
3683  }
3684  if( !mod.blacklist_mod.empty() && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::GUNMOD_BLACKLIST_MOD ) ) {
3685  std::string mod_black_str = _( "<bold>Incompatible with slots: </bold> " );
3686 
3687  int iternum = 0;
3688  for( const itype_id &black : mod.blacklist_mod ) {
3689  if( iternum != 0 ) {
3690  mod_black_str += ", ";
3691  }
3692  mod_black_str += string_format( "%s", ( black->nname( 1 ) ) );
3693  iternum++;
3694  }
3695  mod_black_str += ".";
3696  info.emplace_back( "GUNMOD", mod_black_str );
3697  }
3698 }
3699 
3700 static bool armor_encumb_header_info( const item &it, std::vector<iteminfo> &info )
3701 {
3702  std::string format;
3703  Character &player_character = get_player_character();
3704  const bool sizing_matters = it.get_sizing( player_character ) != item::sizing::ignore;
3705 
3706  if( it.has_flag( flag_FIT ) ) {
3707  format = _( " <info>(fits)</info>" );
3708  } else if( it.has_flag( flag_VARSIZE ) && sizing_matters ) {
3709  format = _( " <bad>(poor fit)</bad>" );
3710  }
3711  if( sizing_matters ) {
3712  const item::sizing sizing_level = it.get_sizing( player_character );
3713  //If we have the wrong size, we do not fit so alert the player
3714  if( sizing_level == item::sizing::human_sized_small_char ) {
3715  format = _( " <bad>(too big)</bad>" );
3716  } else if( sizing_level == item::sizing::big_sized_small_char ) {
3717  format = _( " <bad>(huge!)</bad>" );
3718  } else if( sizing_level == item::sizing::small_sized_human_char ||
3719  sizing_level == item::sizing::human_sized_big_char ) {
3720  format = _( " <bad>(too small)</bad>" );
3721  } else if( sizing_level == item::sizing::small_sized_big_char ) {
3722  format = _( " <bad>(tiny!)</bad>" );
3723  }
3724  }
3725  if( format.empty() ) {
3726  return false;
3727  }
3728 
3729  //~ The size or fit of an article of clothing (fits / poor fit)
3730  info.emplace_back( "ARMOR", _( "<bold>Size/Fit</bold>:" ) + format );
3731  return true;
3732 }
3733 
3734 bool item::armor_full_protection_info( std::vector<iteminfo> &info,
3735  const iteminfo_query *parts ) const
3736 {
3737  bool divider_needed = false;
3738  const std::string space = " ";
3739 
3740  bool ret = false;
3741  if( const islot_armor *t = find_armor_data() ) {
3742  if( t->data.empty() ) {
3743  return ret;
3744  }
3745 
3746  for( const armor_portion_data &p : t->sub_data ) {
3747  if( divider_needed ) {
3748  insert_separation_line( info );
3749  }
3750 
3751  std::vector<sub_bodypart_id> covered( p.sub_coverage.size() );
3752  std::transform( p.sub_coverage.begin(), p.sub_coverage.end(),
3753  covered.begin(), []( sub_bodypart_str_id a ) {
3754  return a.id();
3755  } );
3756  std::set<translation, localized_comparator> to_print = body_part_type::consolidate( covered );
3757  std::string coverage = _( "<bold>Protection for</bold>:" );
3758  for( const translation &entry : to_print ) {
3759  coverage += string_format( _( " The <info>%s</info>." ), entry );
3760  }
3761  info.emplace_back( "ARMOR", coverage );
3762 
3763  // the following function need one representative sub limb from which to query data
3764  armor_material_info( info, parts, 0, false, *p.sub_coverage.begin() );
3765  armor_attribute_info( info, parts, 0, false, *p.sub_coverage.begin() );
3766  armor_protection_info( info, parts, 0, false, *p.sub_coverage.begin() );
3767  ret = true;
3768  divider_needed = true;
3769  }
3770  } else if( is_gun() && has_flag( flag_IS_ARMOR ) ) {
3771  if( divider_needed ) {
3772  insert_separation_line( info );
3773  }
3774  //right now all eligible gunmods (shoulder_strap, belt_clip) have the is_armor flag and use the torso
3775  info.emplace_back( "ARMOR", _( "Torso:" ) + space, "",
3776  iteminfo::no_flags | iteminfo::lower_is_better, get_avg_encumber( get_avatar() ) );
3777 
3778  //~ Limb-specific coverage (for guns strapped to torso)
3779  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", _( "<bold>Torso coverage</bold>:" ) );
3780  //~ Regular/Default coverage
3781  info.emplace_back( "ARMOR", space + _( "Default:" ) + space, "",
3782  iteminfo::no_flags, get_coverage( body_part_torso.id() ) );
3783  //~ Melee coverage
3784  info.emplace_back( "ARMOR", space + _( "Melee:" ) + space, "",
3785  iteminfo::no_flags, get_coverage( body_part_torso.id(), cover_type::COVER_MELEE ) );
3786  //~ Ranged coverage
3787  info.emplace_back( "ARMOR", space + _( "Ranged:" ) + space, "",
3788  iteminfo::no_flags, get_coverage( body_part_torso.id(), cover_type::COVER_RANGED ) );
3789  //~ Vitals coverage
3790  info.emplace_back( "ARMOR", space + _( "Vitals:" ) + space, "",
3791  iteminfo::no_flags, get_coverage( body_part_torso.id(), cover_type::COVER_VITALS ) );
3792  }
3793 
3794  return ret;
3795 }
3796 
3797 static void armor_protect_dmg_info( int dmg, std::vector<iteminfo> &info )
3798 {
3799  if( dmg > 0 ) {
3800  info.emplace_back( "ARMOR", _( "Protection values are <bad>reduced by damage</bad> and "
3801  "you may be able to <info>improve them by repairing this "
3802  "item</info>." ) );
3803  }
3804 }
3805 
3806 void item::armor_protection_info( std::vector<iteminfo> &info, const iteminfo_query *parts,
3807  int /*batch*/, bool /*debug*/, const sub_bodypart_id &sbp ) const
3808 {
3809  if( !is_armor() && !is_pet_armor() ) {
3810  return;
3811  }
3812 
3813  if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::ARMOR_PROTECTION ) ) {
3814  const std::string space = " ";
3815  // NOLINTNEXTLINE(cata-translate-string-literal)
3816  std::string bp_cat = string_format( "ARMOR" );
3817  std::string layering;
3818 
3819  // get the layers this bit of the armor covers if its unique compared to the rest of the armor
3820  for( const layer_level &ll : get_layer( sbp ) ) {
3821  switch( ll ) {
3822  case layer_level::PERSONAL:
3823  layering += _( " <stat>Personal aura</stat>." );
3824  break;
3825  case layer_level::SKINTIGHT:
3826  layering += _( " <stat>Close to skin</stat>." );
3827  break;
3828  case layer_level::NORMAL:
3829  layering += _( " <stat>Normal</stat>." );
3830  break;
3831  case layer_level::WAIST:
3832  layering += _( " <stat>Waist</stat>." );
3833  break;
3834  case layer_level::OUTER:
3835  layering += _( " <stat>Outer</stat>." );
3836  break;
3837  case layer_level::BELTED:
3838  layering += _( " <stat>Strapped</stat>." );
3839  break;
3840  case layer_level::AURA:
3841  layering += _( " <stat>Outer aura</stat>." );
3842  break;
3843  default:
3844  layering += _( " Should never see this." );
3845  }
3846  }
3847  //~ Limb-specific coverage (%s = name of limb)
3848  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", string_format( _( "<bold>Coverage</bold>:%s" ), layering ) );
3849  //~ Regular/Default coverage
3850  info.emplace_back( bp_cat, string_format( "%s%s%s", space, _( "Default:" ), space ), "",
3851  iteminfo::no_flags, get_coverage( sbp ) );
3852  if( get_coverage( sbp ) != get_coverage( sbp, item::cover_type::COVER_MELEE ) ) {
3853  //~ Melee coverage
3854  info.emplace_back( bp_cat, string_format( "%s%s%s", space, _( "Melee:" ), space ), "",
3855  iteminfo::no_flags, get_coverage( sbp, item::cover_type::COVER_MELEE ) );
3856  }
3857  if( get_coverage( sbp ) != get_coverage( sbp, item::cover_type::COVER_RANGED ) ) {
3858  //~ Ranged coverage
3859  info.emplace_back( bp_cat, string_format( "%s%s%s", space, _( "Ranged:" ), space ), "",
3860  iteminfo::no_flags, get_coverage( sbp, item::cover_type::COVER_RANGED ) );
3861  }
3862  if( get_coverage( sbp, item::cover_type::COVER_VITALS ) > 0 ) {
3863  //~ Vitals coverage
3864  info.emplace_back( bp_cat, string_format( "%s%s%s", space, _( "Vitals:" ), space ), "",
3865  iteminfo::no_flags, get_coverage( sbp, item::cover_type::COVER_VITALS ) );
3866  }
3867 
3868  bool printed_any = false;
3869 
3870  // gather all the protection data
3871  // the rolls are basically a perfect hit for protection and a
3872  // worst possible
3873  resistances worst_res = resistances( *this, false, 99, sbp );
3874  resistances best_res = resistances( *this, false, 0, sbp );
3875  resistances median_res = resistances( *this, false, 50, sbp );
3876 
3877  int percent_best = 100;
3878  int percent_worst = 0;
3879  const armor_portion_data *portion = portion_for_bodypart( sbp );
3880  // if there isn't a portion this is probably pet armor
3881  if( portion ) {
3882  percent_best = portion->best_protection_chance;
3883  percent_worst = portion->worst_protection_chance;
3884  }
3885 
3886  bool display_median = percent_best < 50 && percent_worst < 50;
3887 
3888  if( display_median ) {
3889  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
3890  string_format( "<bold>%s</bold>: <bad>%d%%</bad>, <color_c_yellow>Median</color>, <good>%d%%</good>",
3891  _( "Protection" ), percent_worst, percent_best ) );
3892  } else if( percent_worst > 0 ) {
3893  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
3894  string_format( "<bold>%s</bold>: <bad>%d%%</bad>, <good>%d%%</good>", _( "Protection" ),
3895  percent_worst, percent_best ) );
3896  } else {
3897  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", string_format( "<bold>%s</bold>:", _( "Protection" ) ) );
3898  }
3899 
3900  for( const damage_info_order &dio : damage_info_order::get_all(
3901  damage_info_order::info_type::PROT ) ) {
3902  if( best_res.resist_vals.count( dio.dmg_type ) <= 0 ||
3903  best_res.type_resist( dio.dmg_type ) < 1.0f ) {
3904  continue;
3905  }
3906  bool skipped_detailed = false;
3907  if( dio.info_display == damage_info_order::info_disp::DETAILED ) {
3908  if( display_median ) {
3909  info.emplace_back( bp_cat,
3910  string_format( "%s%s: <bad>%.2f</bad>, <color_c_yellow>%.2f</color>, <good>%.2f</good>", space,
3911  uppercase_first_letter( dio.dmg_type->name.translated() ), worst_res.type_resist( dio.dmg_type ),
3912  median_res.type_resist( dio.dmg_type ), best_res.type_resist( dio.dmg_type ) ), "",
3913  iteminfo::no_flags );
3914  printed_any = true;
3915  } else if( percent_worst > 0 ) {
3916  info.emplace_back( bp_cat, string_format( "%s%s: <bad>%.2f</bad>, <good>%.2f</good>", space,
3917  uppercase_first_letter( dio.dmg_type->name.translated() ),
3918  worst_res.type_resist( dio.dmg_type ), best_res.type_resist( dio.dmg_type ) ), "",
3919  iteminfo::no_flags );
3920  printed_any = true;
3921  } else {
3922  skipped_detailed = true;
3923  }
3924  }
3925  if( skipped_detailed || dio.info_display == damage_info_order::info_disp::BASIC ) {
3926  info.emplace_back( bp_cat, string_format( "%s%s: ", space,
3927  uppercase_first_letter( dio.dmg_type->name.translated() ) ), "",
3928  iteminfo::is_decimal, best_res.type_resist( dio.dmg_type ) );
3929  printed_any = true;
3930  }
3931  }
3932  if( get_base_env_resist( *this ) >= 1 ) {
3933  info.emplace_back( bp_cat, string_format( "%s%s", space, _( "Environmental: " ) ),
3934  get_base_env_resist( *this ) );
3935  printed_any = true;
3936  }
3937  // if we haven't printed any armor data acknowledge that
3938  if( !printed_any ) {
3939  info.emplace_back( bp_cat, string_format( "%s%s", space, _( "Negligible Protection" ) ) );
3940  }
3941  if( type->can_use( "GASMASK" ) || type->can_use( "DIVE_TANK" ) ) {
3942  info.emplace_back( "ARMOR", string_format( "<bold>%s</bold>:",
3943  _( "Protection when active" ) ) );
3944  info.emplace_back( bp_cat, space + _( "Acid: " ), "",
3945  iteminfo::no_newline | iteminfo::is_decimal,
3946  resist( damage_acid, false, sbp, get_base_env_resist_w_filter() ) );
3947  info.emplace_back( bp_cat, space + _( "Fire: " ), "",
3948  iteminfo::no_newline | iteminfo::is_decimal,
3949  resist( damage_heat, false, sbp, get_base_env_resist_w_filter() ) );
3950  info.emplace_back( bp_cat, space + _( "Environmental: " ),
3951  get_env_resist( get_base_env_resist_w_filter() ) );
3952  }
3953 
3954  if( sbp == sub_bodypart_id() && damage() > 0 ) {
3955  armor_protect_dmg_info( damage(), info );
3956  }
3957  }
3958 }
3959 void item::armor_material_info( std::vector<iteminfo> &info, const iteminfo_query *parts,
3960  int /*batch*/, bool /*debug*/, const sub_bodypart_id &sbp ) const
3961 {
3962  if( !is_armor() && !is_pet_armor() ) {
3963  return;
3964  }
3965 
3966  if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::ARMOR_MATERIALS ) ) {
3967  const std::string space = " ";
3968  // NOLINTNEXTLINE(cata-translate-string-literal)
3969  std::string bp_cat = string_format( "ARMOR" );
3970  std::string materials_list;
3971  std::string units_info = pgettext( "length unit: milimeter", "mm" );
3972  for( const part_material *mat : armor_made_of( sbp ) ) {
3973 
3974  materials_list.append( string_format( " %s %.2f%s (%d%%).", mat->id->name(), mat->thickness,
3975  units_info, mat->cover ) );
3976  }
3977 
3978  info.emplace_back( bp_cat, string_format( "%s%s", _( "<bold>Materials</bold>:" ),
3979  materials_list ), "", iteminfo::no_flags );
3980  }
3981 }
3982 
3983 void item::armor_attribute_info( std::vector<iteminfo> &info, const iteminfo_query *parts,
3984  int /*batch*/, bool /*debug*/, const sub_bodypart_id &sbp ) const
3985 {
3986  if( !is_armor() && !is_pet_armor() ) {
3987  return;
3988  }
3989 
3990  if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::ARMOR_ADDITIONAL_INFO ) ) {
3991  const std::string space = " ";
3992  // NOLINTNEXTLINE(cata-translate-string-literal)
3993  std::string bp_cat = string_format( "ARMOR" );
3994 
3995  if( const armor_portion_data *portion_data = portion_for_bodypart( sbp ) ) {
3996  if( portion_data->rigid_layer_only ) {
3997  info.emplace_back( bp_cat, _( "<info>Rigid items only conflict on shared layers</info>" ),
3998  "", iteminfo::no_flags );
3999  }
4000  }
4001  }
4002 }
4003 
4004 void item::pet_armor_protection_info( std::vector<iteminfo> &info,
4005  const iteminfo_query *parts ) const
4006 {
4007  if( !is_pet_armor() ) {
4008  return;
4009  }
4010 
4011  if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::ARMOR_PROTECTION ) ) {
4012  const std::string space = " ";
4013 
4014  info.emplace_back( "ARMOR", _( "<bold>Protection</bold>:" ), "" );
4015 
4016  for( const damage_info_order &dio : damage_info_order::get_all(
4017  damage_info_order::info_type::PET ) ) {
4018  info.emplace_back( "ARMOR", string_format( "%s%s: ", space,
4019  uppercase_first_letter( dio.dmg_type->name.translated() ) ), "",
4020  iteminfo::is_decimal, resist( dio.dmg_type ) );
4021  }
4022 
4023  info.emplace_back( "ARMOR", space + _( "Environmental: " ),
4024  get_base_env_resist( *this ) );
4025 
4026  if( damage() > 0 ) {
4027  info.emplace_back( "ARMOR",
4028  _( "Protection values are <bad>reduced by damage</bad> and "
4029  "you may be able to <info>improve them by repairing this "
4030  "item</info>." ) );
4031  }
4032  }
4033 }
4034 
4035 // simple struct used for organizing encumberance in an ordered set
4036 struct armor_encumb_data {
4037  int encumb;
4038  int encumb_max;
4039  int encumb_min;
4040 
4041  bool operator==( const armor_encumb_data &a ) const {
4042  return encumb == a.encumb &&
4043  encumb_min == a.encumb_min &&
4044  encumb_max == a.encumb_max;
4045  }
4046 
4047  armor_encumb_data( int in_encumb_min, int in_encumb, int in_encumb_max ) {
4048  encumb = in_encumb;
4049  encumb_min = in_encumb_min;
4050  encumb_max = in_encumb_max;
4051  }
4052 };
4053 
4054 static bool operator<( const armor_encumb_data &lhs, const armor_encumb_data &rhs )
4055 {
4056  return lhs.encumb < rhs.encumb;
4057 }
4058 
4059 void item::armor_info( std::vector<iteminfo> &info, const iteminfo_query *parts, int batch,
4060  bool debug ) const
4061 {
4062  if( !is_armor() ) {
4063  return;
4064  }
4065 
4066  const std::string space = " ";
4067  body_part_set covered_parts = get_covered_body_parts();
4068  bool covers_anything = covered_parts.any();
4069  const bool show_bodygraph = get_option<bool>( "ITEM_BODYGRAPH" ) &&
4070  parts->test( iteminfo_parts::ARMOR_BODYGRAPH );
4071 
4072  if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::ARMOR_BODYPARTS ) ) {
4073  insert_separation_line( info );
4074  std::vector<sub_bodypart_id> covered = get_covered_sub_body_parts();
4075  std::string coverage = _( "<bold>Covers</bold>:" );
4076 
4077  if( !covered.empty() ) {
4078  std::set<translation, localized_comparator> to_print = body_part_type::consolidate( covered );
4079  for( const translation &entry : to_print ) {
4080  coverage += string_format( _( " The <info>%s</info>." ), entry );
4081  }
4082  }
4083 
4084  if( !covers_anything ) {
4085  coverage += _( " <info>Nothing</info>." );
4086  }
4087 
4088  info.emplace_back( "ARMOR", coverage );
4089  }
4090 
4091  if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::ARMOR_RIGIDITY ) && ( is_rigid() || is_ablative() ) ) {
4092  // if the item has no armor data it doesn't cover that part
4093  const islot_armor *armor = find_armor_data();
4094  if( armor != nullptr ) {
4095  if( armor->rigid ) {
4096  std::string coverage = _( "<bold>This armor is rigid</bold>" );
4097  info.emplace_back( "ARMOR", coverage );
4098  } else {
4099  // only some parts are rigid
4100  std::string coverage = _( "<bold>Rigid Locations</bold>:" );
4101  std::set<sub_bodypart_id> covered;
4102  // if ablative check if there are hard plates in locations
4103  if( armor->ablative ) {
4104  // if item has ablative armor we should check those too.
4105  for( const item_pocket *pocket : get_all_contained_pockets() ) {
4106  // if the pocket is ablative and not empty we should use its values
4107  if( pocket->get_pocket_data()->ablative && !pocket->empty() ) {
4108  // get the contained plate
4109  const item &ablative_armor = pocket->front();
4110  for( const armor_portion_data &entry : ablative_armor.find_armor_data()->sub_data ) {
4111  if( entry.rigid ) {
4112  for( const sub_bodypart_str_id &sbp : entry.sub_coverage ) {
4113  covered.emplace( sbp );
4114  }
4115  }
4116  }
4117  }
4118  }
4119  }
4120  for( const armor_portion_data &entry : armor->sub_data ) {
4121  if( entry.rigid ) {
4122  for( const sub_bodypart_str_id &sbp : entry.sub_coverage ) {
4123  covered.emplace( sbp );
4124  }
4125  }
4126  }
4127 
4128  if( !covered.empty() ) {
4129  std::vector<sub_bodypart_id> covered_vec( covered.begin(), covered.end() );
4130  std::set<translation, localized_comparator> to_print = body_part_type::consolidate( covered_vec );
4131  for( const translation &entry : to_print ) {
4132  coverage += string_format( _( " The <info>%s</info>." ), entry );
4133  }
4134  info.emplace_back( "ARMOR", coverage );
4135  }
4136  }
4137  }
4138  }
4139 
4140  if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::ARMOR_RIGIDITY ) && is_comfortable() ) {
4141  // if the item has no armor data it doesn't cover that part
4142  const islot_armor *armor = find_armor_data();
4143  if( armor != nullptr ) {
4144  if( armor->comfortable ) {
4145  std::string coverage = _( "<bold>This armor is comfortable</bold>" );
4146  info.emplace_back( "ARMOR", coverage );
4147  } else {
4148  // only some parts are comfortable
4149  std::string coverage = _( "<bold>Comfortable Locations</bold>:" );
4150  std::vector<sub_bodypart_id> covered;
4151  for( const armor_portion_data &entry : armor->sub_data ) {
4152  if( entry.comfortable ) {
4153  for( const sub_bodypart_str_id &sbp : entry.sub_coverage ) {
4154  covered.emplace_back( sbp );
4155  }
4156  }
4157  }
4158  if( !covered.empty() ) {
4159  std::set<translation, localized_comparator> to_print = body_part_type::consolidate( covered );
4160  for( const translation &entry : to_print ) {
4161  coverage += string_format( _( " The <info>%s</info>." ), entry );
4162  }
4163  info.emplace_back( "ARMOR", coverage );
4164  }
4165  }
4166  }
4167  }
4168 
4169  if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::ARMOR_COVERAGE ) && covers_anything ) {
4170  std::map<int, std::vector<bodypart_id>> limb_groups;
4171  for( const bodypart_str_id &bp : get_covered_body_parts() ) {
4172  const armor_portion_data *portion = portion_for_bodypart( bp );
4173  if( portion ) {
4174  limb_groups[portion->coverage].emplace_back( bp );
4175  }
4176  }
4177  // keep on one line if only 1 entry
4178  if( limb_groups.size() == 1 ) {
4179  info.emplace_back( "ARMOR", _( "<bold>Total Coverage</bold>" ), iteminfo::no_newline );
4180  } else {
4181  info.emplace_back( "ARMOR", _( "<bold>Total Coverage</bold>:" ) );
4182  }
4183 
4184  for( auto &entry : limb_groups ) {
4185  std::set<translation, localized_comparator> to_print = body_part_type::consolidate( entry.second );
4186  std::string coverage;
4187  for( const translation &entry : to_print ) {
4188  coverage += string_format( _( " The <info>%s</info>." ), entry );
4189  }
4190  info.emplace_back( "ARMOR", "", string_format( " <num>%%:%s", coverage ), iteminfo::no_flags,
4191  entry.first );
4192  }
4193  }
4194 
4195  if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::ARMOR_ENCUMBRANCE ) && covers_anything ) {
4196  std::map<armor_encumb_data, std::vector<bodypart_id>> limb_groups;
4197  const Character &c = get_player_character();
4198 
4199  armor_encumb_header_info( *this, info );
4200  for( const bodypart_str_id &bp : get_covered_body_parts() ) {
4201  armor_encumb_data encumbrance( get_encumber( c, bp, item::encumber_flags::assume_empty ),
4202  get_encumber( c, bp ), get_encumber( c, bp, item::encumber_flags::assume_full ) );
4203 
4204  limb_groups[encumbrance].emplace_back( bp );
4205  }
4206  // keep on one line if only 1 entry
4207  if( limb_groups.size() == 1 ) {
4208  info.emplace_back( "ARMOR", _( "<bold>Encumbrance</bold>" ), iteminfo::no_newline );
4209  } else {
4210  info.emplace_back( "ARMOR", _( "<bold>Encumbrance</bold>:" ) );
4211  }
4212  for( auto &entry : limb_groups ) {
4213  std::set<translation, localized_comparator> to_print = body_part_type::consolidate( entry.second );
4214  std::string coverage;
4215  std::string encumbrance_info;
4216  for( const translation &entry : to_print ) {
4217  coverage += string_format( _( " The <info>%s</info>." ), entry );
4218  }
4219 
4220  //encumbrance_info = string_format( "%d", entry.first.encumb );
4221 
4222  // NOLINTNEXTLINE(cata-translate-string-literal)
4223  info.emplace_back( "ARMOR", space, "", iteminfo::no_newline | iteminfo::lower_is_better,
4224  entry.first.encumb );
4225 
4226  // if it has a max value
4227  if( entry.first.encumb != entry.first.encumb_max ) {
4228  std::string when_full_message = _( ", When full" ) + space;
4229  info.emplace_back( "ARMOR", when_full_message, "", iteminfo::no_newline | iteminfo::lower_is_better,
4230  entry.first.encumb_max );
4231  }
4232 
4233  // if it has a min value
4234  if( entry.first.encumb != entry.first.encumb_min ) {
4235  std::string when_empty_message = _( ", When empty" ) + space;
4236  info.emplace_back( "ARMOR", when_empty_message, "",
4237  iteminfo::no_newline | iteminfo::lower_is_better, entry.first.encumb_min );
4238  }
4239  info.emplace_back( "ARMOR", string_format( ":%s", coverage ) );
4240  }
4241  }
4242 
4243  if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::ARMOR_WARMTH ) && covers_anything ) {
4244  // TODO: Make this less inflexible on anatomy
4245  std::map<int, std::vector<bodypart_id>> limb_groups;
4246  for( const bodypart_str_id &bp : get_covered_body_parts() ) {
4247  limb_groups[get_warmth( bp )].emplace_back( bp );
4248  }
4249  // keep on one line if only 1 entry
4250  if( limb_groups.size() == 1 ) {
4251  info.emplace_back( "ARMOR", _( "<bold>Warmth</bold>" ), iteminfo::no_newline );
4252  } else {
4253  info.emplace_back( "ARMOR", _( "<bold>Warmth</bold>:" ) );
4254  }
4255  for( auto &entry : limb_groups ) {
4256  std::set<translation, localized_comparator> to_print = body_part_type::consolidate( entry.second );
4257  std::string coverage;
4258  for( const translation &entry : to_print ) {
4259  coverage += string_format( _( " The <info>%s</info>." ), entry );
4260  }
4261  info.emplace_back( "ARMOR", "", string_format( " <num>:%s", coverage ), iteminfo::no_flags,
4262  entry.first );
4263  }
4264  }
4265 
4266  if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::ARMOR_BREATHABILITY ) && covers_anything ) {
4267 
4268  std::map<int, std::vector<bodypart_id>> limb_groups;
4269  for( const bodypart_str_id &bp : get_covered_body_parts() ) {
4270  const armor_portion_data *portion = portion_for_bodypart( bp );
4271  if( portion ) {
4272  limb_groups[portion->breathability].emplace_back( bp );
4273  }
4274  }
4275  // keep on one line if only 1 entry
4276  if( limb_groups.size() == 1 ) {
4277  info.emplace_back( "ARMOR", _( "<bold>Breathability</bold>" ), iteminfo::no_newline );
4278  } else {
4279  info.emplace_back( "ARMOR", _( "<bold>Breathability</bold>:" ) );
4280  }
4281  for( auto &entry : limb_groups ) {
4282  std::set<translation, localized_comparator> to_print = body_part_type::consolidate( entry.second );
4283  std::string coverage;
4284  for( const translation &entry : to_print ) {
4285  coverage += string_format( _( " The <info>%s</info>." ), entry );
4286  }
4287  info.emplace_back( "ARMOR", "", string_format( " <num>%%:%s", coverage ), iteminfo::no_flags,
4288  entry.first );
4289  }
4290  }
4291 
4292  insert_separation_line( info );
4293 
4294  if( covers_anything ) {
4295 
4296  if( is_power_armor() || type->get_id() == itype_rm13_armor ) {
4297  item tmp = *this;
4298 
4299  //no need to clutter the ui with inactive versions when the armor is already active
4300  if( !( active || ( type->tool && type->tool->power_draw > 0_W ) ) ) {
4301  bool print_prot = true;
4302  if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::ARMOR_PROTECTION ) ) {
4303  print_prot = !tmp.armor_full_protection_info( info, parts );
4304  }
4305  if( print_prot ) {
4306  tmp.armor_protection_info( info, parts, batch, debug );
4307  }
4308  armor_protect_dmg_info( tmp.damage(), info );
4309 
4310  insert_separation_line( info );
4311  info.emplace_back( "ARMOR", _( "<bold>When active</bold>:" ) );
4312  tmp = tmp.convert( itype_id( tmp.typeId().str() + "_on" ) );
4313  }
4314 
4315  bool print_prot = true;
4316  if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::ARMOR_PROTECTION ) ) {
4317  print_prot = !tmp.armor_full_protection_info( info, parts );
4318  }
4319  if( print_prot ) {
4320  tmp.armor_protection_info( info, parts, batch, debug );
4321  }
4322  armor_protect_dmg_info( tmp.damage(), info );
4323  } else {
4324  bool print_prot = true;
4325  if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::ARMOR_PROTECTION ) ) {
4326  print_prot = !armor_full_protection_info( info, parts );
4327  }
4328  if( print_prot ) {
4329  armor_protection_info( info, parts, batch, debug );
4330  }
4331  armor_protect_dmg_info( damage(), info );
4332  }
4333  }
4334 
4335  // Whatever the last entry was, we want a newline at this point
4336  info.back().bNewLine = true;
4337 
4338  if( show_bodygraph ) {
4339  insert_separation_line( info );
4340 
4341  auto bg_cb = [this]( const bodygraph_part * bgp, const std::string & sym ) {
4342  if( !bgp ) {
4343  return colorize( sym, bodygraph_full_body_iteminfo->fill_color );
4344  }
4345  std::set<sub_bodypart_id> grp{ bgp->sub_bodyparts.begin(), bgp->sub_bodyparts.end() };
4346  for( const bodypart_id &bid : bgp->bodyparts ) {
4347  grp.insert( bid->sub_parts.begin(), bid->sub_parts.end() );
4348  }
4349  nc_color clr = c_dark_gray;
4350  int cov_val = 0;
4351  for( const sub_bodypart_id &sid : grp ) {
4352  int tmp = get_coverage( sid );
4353  cov_val = tmp > cov_val ? tmp : cov_val;
4354  }
4355  if( cov_val <= 5 ) {
4356  clr = c_dark_gray;
4357  } else if( cov_val <= 10 ) {
4358  clr = c_light_gray;
4359  } else if( cov_val <= 25 ) {
4360  clr = c_light_red;
4361  } else if( cov_val <= 60 ) {
4362  clr = c_yellow;
4363  } else if( cov_val <= 80 ) {
4364  clr = c_green;
4365  } else {
4366  clr = c_light_green;
4367  }
4368  return colorize( sym, clr );
4369  };
4370  std::vector<std::string> bg_lines = get_bodygraph_lines( get_player_character(), bg_cb,
4371  bodygraph_full_body_iteminfo );
4372  for( const std::string &line : bg_lines ) {
4373  info.emplace_back( "ARMOR", line );
4374  }
4375  insert_separation_line( info );
4376  }
4377 }
4378 
4379 void item::animal_armor_info( std::vector<iteminfo> &info, const iteminfo_query *parts,
4380  int /*batch*/, bool /*debug*/ ) const
4381 {
4382  if( !is_pet_armor() ) {
4383  return;
4384  }
4385  pet_armor_protection_info( info, parts );
4386 }
4387 
4388 void item::armor_fit_info( std::vector<iteminfo> &info, const iteminfo_query *parts, int /*batch*/,
4389  bool /*debug*/ ) const
4390 {
4391  if( !is_armor() ) {
4392  return;
4393  }
4394 
4395  Character &player_character = get_player_character();
4396  const sizing sizing_level = get_sizing( player_character );
4397 
4398  if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_FLAGS_FITS ) ) {
4399  switch( sizing_level ) {
