4400  case sizing::human_sized_human_char:
4401  if( has_flag( flag_FIT ) ) {
4402  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
4403  _( "* This clothing <info>fits</info> you perfectly." ) );
4404  }
4405  break;
4406  case sizing::big_sized_big_char:
4407  if( has_flag( flag_FIT ) ) {
4408  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", _( "* This clothing <info>fits</info> "
4409  "your large frame perfectly." ) );
4410  }
4411  break;
4412  case sizing::small_sized_small_char:
4413  if( has_flag( flag_FIT ) ) {
4414  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", _( "* This clothing <info>fits</info> "
4415  "your small frame perfectly." ) );
4416  }
4417  break;
4418  case sizing::big_sized_human_char:
4419  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", _( "* This clothing is <bad>oversized</bad> "
4420  "and does <bad>not fit</bad> you." ) );
4421  break;
4422  case sizing::big_sized_small_char:
4423  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
4424  _( "* This clothing is hilariously <bad>oversized</bad> "
4425  "and does <bad>not fit</bad> your <info>abnormally "
4426  "small mutated anatomy</info>." ) );
4427  break;
4428  case sizing::human_sized_big_char:
4429  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
4430  _( "* This clothing is <bad>normal sized</bad> and does "
4431  "<bad>not fit</info> your <info>abnormally large "
4432  "mutated anatomy</info>." ) );
4433  break;
4434  case sizing::human_sized_small_char:
4435  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
4436  _( "* This clothing is <bad>normal sized</bad> and does "
4437  "<bad>not fit</bad> your <info>abnormally small "
4438  "mutated anatomy</info>." ) );
4439  break;
4440  case sizing::small_sized_big_char:
4441  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
4442  _( "* This clothing is hilariously <bad>undersized</bad> "
4443  "and does <bad>not fit</bad> your <info>abnormally "
4444  "large mutated anatomy</info>." ) );
4445  break;
4446  case sizing::small_sized_human_char:
4447  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", _( "* This clothing is <bad>undersized</bad> "
4448  "and does <bad>not fit</bad> you." ) );
4449  break;
4450  default:
4451  break;
4452  }
4453  }
4454 
4455  if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_FLAGS_VARSIZE ) ) {
4456  if( has_flag( flag_VARSIZE ) ) {
4457  std::string resize_str;
4458  if( has_flag( flag_FIT ) ) {
4459  switch( sizing_level ) {
4460  case sizing::small_sized_human_char:
4461  resize_str = _( "<info>can be upsized</info>" );
4462  break;
4463  case sizing::human_sized_small_char:
4464  resize_str = _( "<info>can be downsized</info>" );
4465  break;
4466  case sizing::big_sized_human_char:
4467  case sizing::big_sized_small_char:
4468  resize_str = _( "<bad>can not be downsized</bad>" );
4469  break;
4470  case sizing::small_sized_big_char:
4471  case sizing::human_sized_big_char:
4472  resize_str = _( "<bad>can not be upsized</bad>" );
4473  break;
4474  default:
4475  break;
4476  }
4477  if( !resize_str.empty() ) {
4478  std::string info_str = string_format( _( "* This clothing %s." ), resize_str );
4479  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", info_str );
4480  }
4481  } else {
4482  switch( sizing_level ) {
4483  case sizing::small_sized_human_char:
4484  resize_str = _( " and <info>upsized</info>" );
4485  break;
4486  case sizing::human_sized_small_char:
4487  resize_str = _( " and <info>downsized</info>" );
4488  break;
4489  case sizing::big_sized_human_char:
4490  case sizing::big_sized_small_char:
4491  resize_str = _( " but <bad>not downsized</bad>" );
4492  break;
4493  case sizing::small_sized_big_char:
4494  case sizing::human_sized_big_char:
4495  resize_str = _( " but <bad>not upsized</bad>" );
4496  break;
4497  default:
4498  break;
4499  }
4500  std::string info_str = string_format( _( "* This clothing <info>can be "
4501  "refitted</info>%s." ), resize_str );
4502  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", info_str );
4503  }
4504  } else {
4505  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", _( "* This clothing <bad>can not be refitted, "
4506  "upsized, or downsized</bad>." ) );
4507  }
4508  }
4509 
4510  if( is_sided() && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_FLAGS_SIDED ) ) {
4511  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
4512  _( "* This item can be worn on <info>either side</info> of "
4513  "the body." ) );
4514  }
4515  if( is_power_armor() && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_FLAGS_POWERARMOR ) ) {
4516  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
4517  _( "* This gear is a part of power armor." ) );
4518  if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_FLAGS_POWERARMOR_RADIATIONHINT ) ) {
4519  if( covers( bodypart_id( "head" ) ) ) {
4520  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
4521  _( "* When worn with a power armor suit, it will "
4522  "<good>fully protect</good> you from "
4523  "<info>radiation</info>." ) );
4524  } else {
4525  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
4526  _( "* When worn with a power armor helmet, it will "
4527  "<good>fully protect</good> you from "
4528  "<info>radiation</info>." ) );
4529  }
4530  }
4531  }
4532 
4533  if( typeId() == itype_rad_badge && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_IRRADIATION ) ) {
4534  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
4535  string_format( _( "* The film strip on the badge is %s." ),
4536  rad_badge_color( irradiation ).first ) );
4537  }
4538 }
4539 
4540 void item::book_info( std::vector<iteminfo> &info, const iteminfo_query *parts, int /* batch */,
4541  bool /* debug */ ) const
4542 {
4543  if( !is_book() ) {
4544  return;
4545  }
4546 
4547  insert_separation_line( info );
4548  const islot_book &book = *type->book;
4549  avatar &player_character = get_avatar();
4550  // Some things about a book you CAN tell by it's cover.
4551  if( !book.skill && !type->can_use( "MA_MANUAL" ) && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::BOOK_SUMMARY ) &&
4552  player_character.studied_all_recipes( *type ) ) {
4553  info.emplace_back( "BOOK", _( "Just for fun." ) );
4554  }
4555 
4556  if( type->can_use( "MA_MANUAL" ) && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::BOOK_SUMMARY ) ) {
4557  info.emplace_back( "BOOK",
4558  _( "Some sort of <info>martial arts training "
4559  "manual</info>." ) );
4560  if( player_character.has_identified( typeId() ) ) {
4561  const matype_id style_to_learn = martial_art_learned_from( *type );
4562  info.emplace_back( "BOOK",
4563  string_format( _( "You can learn <info>%s</info> style "
4564  "from it." ), style_to_learn->name ) );
4565  info.emplace_back( "BOOK",
4566  string_format( _( "This fighting style is <info>%s</info> "
4567  "to learn." ),
4568  martialart_difficulty( style_to_learn ) ) );
4569  info.emplace_back( "BOOK",
4570  string_format( _( "It'd be easier to master if you'd have "
4571  "skill expertise in <info>%s</info>." ),
4572  style_to_learn->primary_skill->name() ) );
4573  }
4574  }
4575  if( book.req == 0 && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::BOOK_REQUIREMENTS_BEGINNER ) ) {
4576  info.emplace_back( "BOOK", _( "It can be <info>understood by "
4577  "beginners</info>." ) );
4578  }
4579  if( player_character.has_identified( typeId() ) ) {
4580  if( book.skill ) {
4581  const SkillLevel &skill = player_character.get_skill_level_object( book.skill );
4582  if( skill.can_train() && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::BOOK_SKILLRANGE_MAX ) ) {
4583  const std::string skill_name = book.skill->name();
4584  std::string fmt;
4585  if( book.level != 0 ) {
4586  fmt = string_format( _( "Can bring your <info>%s skill to</info> "
4587  "<num>." ), skill_name );
4588  info.emplace_back( "BOOK", "", fmt, iteminfo::no_flags, book.level );
4589  }
4590  fmt = string_format( _( "Your current <stat>%s skill</stat> is <num>." ),
4591  skill_name );
4592  info.emplace_back( "BOOK", "", fmt, iteminfo::no_flags, skill.knowledgeLevel() );
4593  }
4594 
4595  if( book.req != 0 && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::BOOK_SKILLRANGE_MIN ) ) {
4596  const std::string fmt = string_format(
4597  _( "<info>Requires %s level</info> <num> to "
4598  "understand." ), book.skill.obj().name() );
4599  info.emplace_back( "BOOK", "", fmt,
4600  iteminfo::lower_is_better, book.req );
4601  }
4602  }
4603 
4604  if( book.intel != 0 && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::BOOK_REQUIREMENTS_INT ) ) {
4605  info.emplace_back( "BOOK", "",
4606  _( "Requires <info>intelligence of</info> <num> to easily "
4607  "read." ), iteminfo::lower_is_better, book.intel );
4608  }
4609  if( player_character.book_fun_for( *this, player_character ) != 0 &&
4610  parts->test( iteminfo_parts::BOOK_MORALECHANGE ) ) {
4611  info.emplace_back( "BOOK", "",
4612  _( "Reading this book affects your morale by <num>" ),
4613  iteminfo::show_plus, player_character.book_fun_for( *this, player_character ) );
4614  }
4615  if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::BOOK_TIMEPERCHAPTER ) ) {
4616  std::string fmt = n_gettext(
4617  "A chapter of this book takes <num> <info>minute to "
4618  "read</info>.",
4619  "A chapter of this book takes <num> <info>minutes to "
4620  "read</info>.", to_minutes<int>( book.time ) );
4621  if( type->use_methods.count( "MA_MANUAL" ) ) {
4622  fmt = n_gettext(
4623  "<info>A training session</info> with this book takes "
4624  "<num> <info>minute</info>.",
4625  "<info>A training session</info> with this book takes "
4626  "<num> <info>minutes</info>.", to_minutes<int>( book.time ) );
4627  }
4628  info.emplace_back( "BOOK", "", fmt,
4629  iteminfo::lower_is_better, to_minutes<int>( book.time ) );
4630  }
4631 
4632  if( book.chapters > 0 && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::BOOK_NUMUNREADCHAPTERS ) ) {
4633  const int unread = get_remaining_chapters( player_character );
4634  std::string fmt = n_gettext( "This book has <num> <info>unread chapter</info>.",
4635  "This book has <num> <info>unread chapters</info>.",
4636  unread );
4637  info.emplace_back( "BOOK", "", fmt, iteminfo::no_flags, unread );
4638  }
4639 
4640  if( !book.proficiencies.empty() ) {
4641  const auto enumerate_profs = []( const book_proficiency_bonus & prof ) {
4642  return prof.id->name();
4643  };
4644  const std::string profs = string_format(
4645  _( "This book can help with the following proficiencies: %s" ),
4646  enumerate_as_string( book.proficiencies, enumerate_profs ) );
4647  info.emplace_back( "BOOK", profs );
4648  }
4649 
4650  if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::BOOK_INCLUDED_RECIPES ) ) {
4651  std::vector<std::string> known_recipe_list;
4652  std::vector<std::string> learnable_recipe_list;
4653  std::vector<std::string> practice_recipe_list;
4654  std::vector<std::string> unlearnable_recipe_list;
4655  for( const islot_book::recipe_with_description_t &elem : book.recipes ) {
4656  const bool knows_it = player_character.knows_recipe( elem.recipe );
4657  // If the player knows it, they recognize it even if it's not clearly stated.
4658  if( elem.is_hidden() && !knows_it ) {
4659  continue;
4660  }
4661  const bool can_learn = player_character.get_knowledge_level( elem.recipe->skill_used ) >=
4662  elem.skill_level;
4663  if( elem.recipe->is_practice() ) {
4664  const char *const format = can_learn ? "<dark>%s</dark>" : "<color_brown>%s</color>";
4665  practice_recipe_list.emplace_back( string_format( format, elem.recipe->result_name() ) );
4666  } else if( knows_it ) {
4667  // In case the recipe is known, but has a different name in the book, use the
4668  // real name to avoid confusing the player.
4669  known_recipe_list.emplace_back( string_format( "<bold>%s</bold>", elem.recipe->result_name() ) );
4670  } else if( !can_learn ) {
4671  unlearnable_recipe_list.emplace_back( string_format( "<color_brown>%s</color>", elem.name() ) );
4672  } else {
4673  learnable_recipe_list.emplace_back( string_format( "<dark>%s</dark>", elem.name() ) );
4674  }
4675  }
4676 
4677  const std::size_t num_crafting_recipes = known_recipe_list.size() + learnable_recipe_list.size() +
4678  unlearnable_recipe_list.size();
4679  const std::size_t num_total_recipes = num_crafting_recipes + practice_recipe_list.size();
4680  if( num_total_recipes > 0 && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_BOOK_RECIPES ) ) {
4681  std::vector<std::string> lines;
4682  if( num_crafting_recipes > 0 ) {
4683  lines.emplace_back(
4684  string_format( n_gettext( "This book contains %u crafting recipe.",
4685  "This book contains %u crafting recipes.",
4686  num_crafting_recipes ), num_crafting_recipes ) );
4687  }
4688  if( !known_recipe_list.empty() ) {
4689  lines.emplace_back( _( "You already know how to craft:" ) );
4690  lines.emplace_back( enumerate_lcsorted_with_limit( known_recipe_list ) );
4691  }
4692  if( !learnable_recipe_list.empty() ) {
4693  lines.emplace_back( _( "You understand how to craft:" ) );
4694  lines.emplace_back( enumerate_lcsorted_with_limit( learnable_recipe_list ) );
4695  }
4696  if( !unlearnable_recipe_list.empty() ) {
4697  lines.emplace_back( _( "You lack the skills to understand:" ) );
4698  lines.emplace_back( enumerate_lcsorted_with_limit( unlearnable_recipe_list ) );
4699  }
4700  if( !practice_recipe_list.empty() ) {
4701  lines.emplace_back( _( "This book can help you practice:" ) );
4702  lines.emplace_back( enumerate_lcsorted_with_limit( practice_recipe_list ) );
4703  }
4704  insert_separation_line( info );
4705  for( const std::string &recipe_line : lines ) {
4706  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", recipe_line );
4707  }
4708  }
4709 
4710  if( num_total_recipes < book.recipes.size() &&
4711  parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_BOOK_ADDITIONAL_RECIPES ) ) {
4712  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
4713  _( "It might help you figuring out some <good>more recipes</good>." ) );
4714  }
4715  }
4716 
4717  } else {
4718  if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::BOOK_UNREAD ) ) {
4719  info.emplace_back( "BOOK", _( "You need to <info>read this book to see its contents</info>." ) );
4720  }
4721  }
4722 }
4723 
4724 void item::battery_info( std::vector<iteminfo> &info, const iteminfo_query * /*parts*/,
4725  int /*batch*/, bool /*debug*/ ) const
4726 {
4727  if( !is_vehicle_battery() ) {
4728  return;
4729  }
4730 
4731  std::string info_string;
4732  if( type->battery->max_capacity < 1_J ) {
4733  info_string = string_format( _( "<bold>Capacity</bold>: %dmJ" ),
4734  to_millijoule( type->battery->max_capacity ) );
4735  } else if( type->battery->max_capacity < 1_kJ ) {
4736  info_string = string_format( _( "<bold>Capacity</bold>: %dJ" ),
4737  to_joule( type->battery->max_capacity ) );
4738  } else if( type->battery->max_capacity >= 1_kJ ) {
4739  info_string = string_format( _( "<bold>Capacity</bold>: %dkJ" ),
4740  to_kilojoule( type->battery->max_capacity ) );
4741  }
4742  insert_separation_line( info );
4743  info.emplace_back( "BATTERY", info_string );
4744 }
4745 
4746 void item::tool_info( std::vector<iteminfo> &info, const iteminfo_query *parts, int /*batch*/,
4747  bool /*debug*/ ) const
4748 {
4749  avatar &player_character = get_avatar();
4750 
4751  if( !is_tool() ) {
4752  return;
4753  }
4754 
4755  insert_separation_line( info );
4756  if( !ammo_types().empty() && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::TOOL_CHARGES ) ) {
4757  info.emplace_back( "TOOL", string_format( _( "<bold>Charges</bold>: %d" ),
4758  ammo_remaining() ) );
4759  }
4760 
4761  if( !magazine_integral() ) {
4762  if( magazine_current() && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::TOOL_MAGAZINE_CURRENT ) ) {
4763  info.emplace_back( "TOOL", _( "Magazine: " ),
4764  string_format( "<stat>%s</stat>", magazine_current()->tname() ) );
4765  }
4766 
4767  if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::TOOL_MAGAZINE_COMPATIBLE ) ) {
4768  if( uses_magazine() ) {
4769  // Keep this identical with gun magazines in item::gun_info
4770  const std::vector<itype_id> compat_sorted = sorted_lex( magazine_compatible() );
4771  const std::string mag_names = enumerate_as_string( compat_sorted,
4772  []( const itype_id & id ) {
4773  return item::nname( id );
4774  } );
4775 
4776  const std::set<flag_id> flag_restrictions = contents.magazine_flag_restrictions();
4777  const std::string flag_names = enumerate_as_string( flag_restrictions,
4778  []( const flag_id & e ) {
4779  return e->name();
4780  } );
4781 
4782  std::string display = _( "<bold>Compatible magazines</bold>:" );
4783  if( !compat_sorted.empty() ) {
4784  display += _( "\n<bold>Types</bold>: " ) + mag_names;
4785  }
4786  if( !flag_restrictions.empty() ) {
4787  display += _( "\n<bold>Form factors</bold>: " ) + flag_names;
4788  }
4789 
4790  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", display );
4791  }
4792  }
4793  } else if( !ammo_types().empty() && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::TOOL_CAPACITY ) ) {
4794  for( const ammotype &at : ammo_types() ) {
4795  info.emplace_back(
4796  "TOOL",
4797  "",
4798  string_format(
4799  n_gettext(
4800  "Maximum <num> charge of %s.",
4801  "Maximum <num> charges of %s.",
4802  ammo_capacity( at ) ),
4803  at->name() ),
4804  iteminfo::no_flags,
4805  ammo_capacity( at ) );
4806  }
4807  }
4808 
4809  // UPS, rechargeable power cells, and bionic power
4810  if( has_flag( flag_USE_UPS ) && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_RECHARGE_UPSMODDED ) ) {
4811  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
4812  _( "* This tool has been modified to use a <info>universal "
4813  "power supply</info> and is <neutral>not compatible"
4814  "</neutral> with <info>standard batteries</info>." ) );
4815  } else if( has_flag( flag_RECHARGE ) && has_flag( flag_NO_RELOAD ) &&
4816  parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_RECHARGE_NORELOAD ) ) {
4817  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
4818  _( "* This tool has a <info>rechargeable power cell</info> "
4819  "and is <neutral>not compatible</neutral> with "
4820  "<info>standard batteries</info>." ) );
4821  } else if( has_flag( flag_RECHARGE ) &&
4822  parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_RECHARGE_UPSCAPABLE ) ) {
4823  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
4824  _( "* This tool has a <info>rechargeable power cell</info> "
4825  "and can be recharged in any <neutral>UPS-compatible "
4826  "recharging station</neutral>. You could charge it with "
4827  "<info>standard batteries</info>, but unloading it is "
4828  "impossible." ) );
4829  } else if( has_flag( flag_USES_BIONIC_POWER ) ) {
4830  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
4831  _( "* This tool <info>runs on bionic power</info>." ) );
4832  } else if( has_flag( flag_BURNOUT ) && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::TOOL_BURNOUT ) ) {
4833  int percent_left = 0;
4834  if( ammo_data() != nullptr ) {
4835  // Candle items that use ammo instead of charges
4836  // The capacity should never be zero but clang complains about it
4837  percent_left = 100 * ammo_remaining() / std::max( ammo_capacity( ammo_data()->ammo->type ), 1 );
4838  } else if( type->maximum_charges() > 0 ) {
4839  // Candle items that use charges instead of ammo
4840  percent_left = 100 * ammo_remaining() / type->maximum_charges();
4841  }
4842 
4843  std::string feedback;
4844  if( percent_left == 100 ) {
4845  feedback = _( "It's new, and ready to burn." );
4846  } else if( percent_left >= 75 ) {
4847  feedback = _( "Almost new, with much material to burn." );
4848  } else if( percent_left >= 50 ) {
4849  feedback = _( "More than a quarter has burned away." );
4850  } else if( percent_left >= 25 ) {
4851  feedback = _( "More than half has burned away." );
4852  } else if( percent_left >= 10 ) {
4853  feedback = _( "Less than a quarter left to burn." );
4854  } else {
4855  feedback = _( "Almost completely burned out." );
4856  }
4857  feedback = _( "<bold>Fuel</bold>: " ) + feedback;
4858  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", feedback );
4859  }
4860 
4861  // Display e-ink tablet copied recipes from SD cards
4862  const std::set<recipe_id> saved_recipes = get_saved_recipes();
4863  if( !saved_recipes.empty() ) {
4864  std::vector<std::string> known_recipe_list;
4865  std::vector<std::string> learnable_recipe_list;
4866  std::vector<std::string> unlearnable_recipe_list;
4867 
4868  for( const recipe_id &rid : saved_recipes ) {
4869  const recipe *r = &rid.obj();
4870 
4871  const bool knows_it = player_character.knows_recipe( r );
4872  const bool can_learn = player_character.get_skill_level( r->skill_used ) >= r->difficulty;
4873 
4874  // In case the recipe is known, but has a different name in the item, use the
4875  // real name to avoid confusing the player.
4876  const std::string name = r->result_name();
4877 
4878  if( knows_it ) {
4879  known_recipe_list.emplace_back( "<bold>" + name + "</bold>" );
4880  } else if( !can_learn ) {
4881  unlearnable_recipe_list.emplace_back( "<color_brown>" + name + "</color>" );
4882  } else {
4883  learnable_recipe_list.emplace_back( "<dark>" + name + "</dark>" );
4884  }
4885  }
4886 
4887  int total_recipes = known_recipe_list.size() + learnable_recipe_list.size() +
4888  unlearnable_recipe_list.size();
4889 
4890  if( ( !known_recipe_list.empty() || !learnable_recipe_list.empty() ||
4891  !unlearnable_recipe_list.empty() ) &&
4892  parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_BOOK_RECIPES ) ) {
4893  const std::string recipe_line =
4894  string_format( n_gettext( "Contains %1$d copied crafting recipe:",
4895  "Contains %1$d copied crafting recipes:",
4896  total_recipes ), total_recipes );
4897 
4898  insert_separation_line( info );
4899  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", recipe_line );
4900 
4901  if( !known_recipe_list.empty() ) {
4902  const std::string recipe_line =
4903  string_format( n_gettext( "\nYou already know %1$d recipe:\n%2$s",
4904  "\nYou already know %1$d recipes:\n%2$s",
4905  known_recipe_list.size() ),
4906  known_recipe_list.size(), enumerate_lcsorted_with_limit( known_recipe_list ) );
4907 
4908  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", recipe_line );
4909  }
4910 
4911  if( !learnable_recipe_list.empty() ) {
4912  const std::string recipe_line =
4913  string_format( n_gettext( "\nYou have the skills to craft %1$d recipe:\n%2$s",
4914  "\nYou have the skills to craft %1$d recipes:\n%2$s",
4915  learnable_recipe_list.size() ),
4916  learnable_recipe_list.size(), enumerate_lcsorted_with_limit( learnable_recipe_list ) );
4917 
4918  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", recipe_line );
4919  }
4920 
4921  if( !unlearnable_recipe_list.empty() ) {
4922  const std::string recipe_line =
4923  string_format( n_gettext( "\nYou lack the skills to craft %1$d recipe:\n%2$s",
4924  "\nYou lack the skills to craft %1$d recipes:\n%2$s",
4925  unlearnable_recipe_list.size() ),
4926  unlearnable_recipe_list.size(), enumerate_lcsorted_with_limit( unlearnable_recipe_list ) );
4927 
4928  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", recipe_line );
4929  }
4930  }
4931  }
4932 
4933  // Display e-ink tablet ebook recipes
4934  if( is_ebook_storage() && !is_broken_on_active() ) {
4935  std::vector<std::string> known_recipe_list;
4936  std::vector<std::string> learnable_recipe_list;
4937  std::vector<std::string> unlearnable_recipe_list;
4938  std::vector<const item *> book_list = ebooks();
4939  int total_ebooks = book_list.size();
4940 
4941  for( const item *ebook : book_list ) {
4942  const islot_book &book = *ebook->type->book;
4943  for( const islot_book::recipe_with_description_t &elem : book.recipes ) {
4944  const bool knows_it = player_character.knows_recipe( elem.recipe );
4945  const bool can_learn = player_character.get_skill_level( elem.recipe->skill_used ) >=
4946  elem.skill_level;
4947  // If the player knows it, they recognize it even if it's not clearly stated.
4948  if( elem.is_hidden() && !knows_it ) {
4949  continue;
4950  }
4951 
4952  // In case the recipe is known, but has a different name in the book, use the
4953  // real name to avoid confusing the player.
4954  const std::string name = elem.recipe->result_name( /*decorated=*/true );
4955 
4956  if( knows_it ) {
4957  std::string recipe_formated = "<bold>" + name + "</bold>";
4958  if( known_recipe_list.end() == std::find( known_recipe_list.begin(), known_recipe_list.end(),
4959  name ) ) {
4960  known_recipe_list.emplace_back( "<bold>" + name + "</bold>" );
4961  }
4962  } else if( !can_learn ) {
4963  std::string recipe_formated = "<color_brown>" + elem.name() + "</color>";
4964  if( unlearnable_recipe_list.end() == std::find( unlearnable_recipe_list.begin(),
4965  unlearnable_recipe_list.end(), recipe_formated ) ) {
4966  unlearnable_recipe_list.emplace_back( recipe_formated );
4967  }
4968  } else {
4969  std::string recipe_formated = "<dark>" + elem.name() + "</dark>";
4970  if( learnable_recipe_list.end() == std::find( learnable_recipe_list.begin(),
4971  learnable_recipe_list.end(), recipe_formated ) ) {
4972  learnable_recipe_list.emplace_back( "<dark>" + elem.name() + "</dark>" );
4973  }
4974  }
4975  }
4976  }
4977 
4978  int total_recipes = known_recipe_list.size() + learnable_recipe_list.size() +
4979  unlearnable_recipe_list.size();
4980 
4981  if( ( !known_recipe_list.empty() || !learnable_recipe_list.empty() ||
4982  !unlearnable_recipe_list.empty() ) &&
4983  parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_BOOK_RECIPES ) ) {
4984  std::string recipe_line =
4985  string_format( n_gettext( "Contains %1$d unique crafting recipe,",
4986  "Contains %1$d unique crafting recipes,",
4987  total_recipes ), total_recipes );
4988  std::string source_line =
4989  string_format( n_gettext( "from %1$d stored e-book:",
4990  "from %1$d stored e-books:",
4991  total_ebooks ), total_ebooks );
4992 
4993  insert_separation_line( info );
4994  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", recipe_line );
4995  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", source_line );
4996 
4997  if( !known_recipe_list.empty() ) {
4998  const std::string recipe_line =
4999  string_format( n_gettext( "\nYou already know %1$d recipe:\n%2$s",
5000  "\nYou already know %1$d recipes:\n%2$s",
5001  known_recipe_list.size() ),
5002  known_recipe_list.size(), enumerate_lcsorted_with_limit( known_recipe_list ) );
5003 
5004  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", recipe_line );
5005  }
5006 
5007  if( !learnable_recipe_list.empty() ) {
5008  std::string recipe_line =
5009  string_format( n_gettext( "\nYou have the skills to craft %1$d recipe:\n%2$s",
5010  "\nYou have the skills to craft %1$d recipes:\n%2$s",
5011  learnable_recipe_list.size() ),
5012  learnable_recipe_list.size(), enumerate_lcsorted_with_limit( learnable_recipe_list ) );
5013 
5014  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", recipe_line );
5015  }
5016 
5017  if( !unlearnable_recipe_list.empty() ) {
5018  std::string recipe_line =
5019  string_format( n_gettext( "\nYou lack the skills to craft %1$d recipe:\n%2$s",
5020  "\nYou lack the skills to craft %1$d recipes:\n%2$s",
5021  unlearnable_recipe_list.size() ),
5022  unlearnable_recipe_list.size(), enumerate_lcsorted_with_limit( unlearnable_recipe_list ) );
5023 
5024  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", recipe_line );
5025  }
5026  }
5027  }
5028 }
5029 
5030 void item::actions_info( std::vector<iteminfo> &info, const iteminfo_query *parts,
5031  int /*batch*/, bool /*debug*/ ) const
5032 {
5033 
5034  const std::map<std::string, use_function> &use_methods = type->use_methods;
5035  if( use_methods.empty() || !parts->test( iteminfo_parts::ACTIONS ) ) {
5036  return;
5037  }
5038  insert_separation_line( info );
5039  std::string actions = enumerate_as_string( use_methods,
5040  []( const std::pair<std::string, use_function> &val ) {
5041  return string_format( "<info>%s</info>", val.second.get_name() );
5042  } );
5043  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", string_format( _( "<bold>Actions</bold>: %s" ), actions ) );
5044 }
5045 
5046 void item::component_info( std::vector<iteminfo> &info, const iteminfo_query *parts, int /*batch*/,
5047  bool /*debug*/ ) const
5048 {
5049  if( components.empty() || !parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_COMPONENTS_MADEFROM ) ) {
5050  return;
5051  }
5052  if( is_craft() ) {
5053  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", string_format( _( "Using: %s" ),
5054  components_to_string() ) );
5055  } else {
5056  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", string_format( _( "Made from: %s" ),
5057  components_to_string() ) );
5058  }
5059 }
5060 
5061 static void enchantment_info_helper( const item &it,
5062  enchantment::has type,
5063  std::vector<std::string> &always,
5064  std::vector<std::string> &active,
5065  std::vector<std::string> &inactive )
5066 {
5067  for( const enchantment &ench : it.get_defined_enchantments() ) {
5068  // only check conditions matching the given type
5069  if( ench.active_conditions.first == type ) {
5070  // if a description is provided use that
5071  if( !ench.description.empty() ) {
5072  std::string info;
5073  if( !ench.name.empty() ) {
5074  info = string_format( "<info>%s</info>: %s", ench.name.translated(),
5075  ench.description.translated() );
5076  } else {
5077  info = string_format( _( "<info>Description</info>: %s" ), ench.description.translated() );
5078  }
5079  switch( ench.active_conditions.second ) {
5080  case enchantment::condition::ALWAYS:
5081  always.push_back( info );
5082  break;
5083  case enchantment::condition::ACTIVE:
5084  active.push_back( info );
5085  break;
5086  case enchantment::condition::INACTIVE:
5087  inactive.push_back( info );
5088  break;
5089  case enchantment::condition::DIALOG_CONDITION:
5090  case enchantment::condition::NUM_CONDITION:
5091  // skip for dialog conditions
5092  break;
5093  }
5094  }
5095  }
5096  }
5097  for( const enchant_cache &ench : it.get_proc_enchantments() ) {
5098  // only check conditions matching the given type
5099  if( ench.active_conditions.first == type ) {
5100  // if a description is provided use that
5101  if( !ench.description.empty() ) {
5102  std::string info;
5103  if( !ench.name.empty() ) {
5104  info = string_format( "<info>%s</info>: %s", ench.name.translated(),
5105  ench.description.translated() );
5106  } else {
5107  info = string_format( _( "<info>Description</info>: %s" ), ench.description.translated() );
5108  }
5109  switch( ench.active_conditions.second ) {
5110  case enchantment::condition::ALWAYS:
5111  always.push_back( info );
5112  break;
5113  case enchantment::condition::ACTIVE:
5114  active.push_back( info );
5115  break;
5116  case enchantment::condition::INACTIVE:
5117  inactive.push_back( info );
5118  break;
5119  case enchantment::condition::DIALOG_CONDITION:
5120  case enchantment::condition::NUM_CONDITION:
5121  // skip for dialog conditions
5122  break;
5123  }
5124  }
5125  }
5126  }
5127 }
5128 
5129 static void enchantment_info_printer( std::vector<iteminfo> &info,
5130  std::vector<std::string> &always,
5131  std::vector<std::string> &active,
5132  std::vector<std::string> &inactive )
5133 {
5134  if( !always.empty() ) {
5135  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", string_format( _( "<bold>Always</bold>:" ) ) );
5136  for( const std::string &entry : always ) {
5137  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", string_format( "* %s", entry ) );
5138  }
5139  }
5140  if( !active.empty() ) {
5141  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", string_format( _( "<bold>When Active</bold>:" ) ) );
5142  for( const std::string &entry : active ) {
5143  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", string_format( "* %s", entry ) );
5144  }
5145  }
5146  if( !inactive.empty() ) {
5147  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", string_format( _( "<bold>When Inactive</bold>:" ) ) );
5148  for( const std::string &entry : inactive ) {
5149  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", string_format( "* %s", entry ) );
5150  }
5151  }
5152 }
5153 
5154 void item::enchantment_info( std::vector<iteminfo> &info, const iteminfo_query *parts,
5155  int /*batch*/, bool /*debug*/ ) const
5156 {
5157  if( !parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_ENCHANTMENTS ) ) {
5158  return;
5159  }
5160  insert_separation_line( info );
5161  // if the item has relic data and the item is mundane show some details
5162  if( type->relic_data ) {
5163  // check WIELD
5164  std::vector<std::string> always;
5165  std::vector<std::string> active;
5166  std::vector<std::string> inactive;
5167  enchantment_info_helper( *this, enchantment::has::WIELD, always, active, inactive );
5168  if( !always.empty() || !active.empty() || !inactive.empty() ) {
5169  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
5170  string_format( _( "When <bold>wielded</bold> this item provides:" ) ) );
5171  enchantment_info_printer( info, always, active, inactive );
5172  }
5173  always.clear();
5174  active.clear();
5175  inactive.clear();
5176  enchantment_info_helper( *this, enchantment::has::WORN, always, active, inactive );
5177  if( !always.empty() || !active.empty() || !inactive.empty() ) {
5178  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
5179  string_format( _( "When <bold>worn</bold> this item provides:" ) ) );
5180  enchantment_info_printer( info, always, active, inactive );
5181  }
5182  always.clear();
5183  active.clear();
5184  inactive.clear();
5185  enchantment_info_helper( *this, enchantment::has::HELD, always, active, inactive );
5186  if( !always.empty() || !active.empty() || !inactive.empty() ) {
5187  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
5188  string_format( _( "When <bold>carried</bold> this item provides:" ) ) );
5189  enchantment_info_printer( info, always, active, inactive );
5190  }
5191  }
5192 }
5193 
5194 void item::repair_info( std::vector<iteminfo> &info, const iteminfo_query *parts,
5195  int /*batch*/, bool /*debug*/ ) const
5196 {
5197  if( !parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_REPAIREDWITH ) ) {
5198  return;
5199  }
5200  insert_separation_line( info );
5201  const std::vector<itype_id> rep = sorted_lex( repaired_with() );
5202  if( !rep.empty() ) {
5203  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", string_format( _( "<bold>Repair</bold> using %s." ),
5204  enumerate_as_string( rep,
5205  []( const itype_id & e ) {
5206  return nname( e );
5207  }, enumeration_conjunction::or_ ) ) );
5208 
5209  const std::string repairs_with = enumerate_as_string( type->repairs_with,
5210  []( const material_id & e ) {
5211  return string_format( "<info>%s</info>", e->name() );
5212  } );
5213  if( !repairs_with.empty() ) {
5214  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", string_format( _( "<bold>With</bold> %s." ), repairs_with ) );
5215  }
5216  } else {
5217  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", _( "* This item is <bad>not repairable</bad>." ) );
5218  }
5219 }
5220 
5221 void item::disassembly_info( std::vector<iteminfo> &info, const iteminfo_query *parts,
5222  int /*batch*/, bool /*debug*/ ) const
5223 {
5224  if( !components.empty() && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_COMPONENTS_MADEFROM ) ) {
5225  return;
5226  }
5227  if( !parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_COMPONENTS_DISASSEMBLE ) ) {
5228  return;
5229  }
5230 
5231  const recipe &dis = ( typeId() == itype_disassembly ) ? get_making() :
5232  recipe_dictionary::get_uncraft( typeId() );
5233  const requirement_data &req = dis.disassembly_requirements();
5234  if( !req.is_empty() ) {
5235  const std::string approx_time = to_string_approx( dis.time_to_craft( get_player_character(),
5236  recipe_time_flag::ignore_proficiencies ) );
5237 
5238  const requirement_data::alter_item_comp_vector &comps_list = req.get_components();
5239  const std::string comps_str = enumerate_as_string( comps_list,
5240  []( const std::vector<item_comp> &comp_opts ) {
5241  return comp_opts.front().to_string();
5242  } );
5243 
5244  std::vector<std::string> reqs_list;
5245  const requirement_data::alter_tool_comp_vector &tools_list = req.get_tools();
5246  for( const std::vector<tool_comp> &it : tools_list ) {
5247  if( !it.empty() ) {
5248  reqs_list.push_back( it.front().to_string() );
5249  }
5250  }
5251  const requirement_data::alter_quali_req_vector &quals_list = req.get_qualities();
5252  for( const std::vector<quality_requirement> &it : quals_list ) {
5253  if( !it.empty() ) {
5254  reqs_list.push_back( it.front().to_colored_string() );
5255  }
5256  }
5257 
5258  std::string descr;
5259  if( reqs_list.empty() ) {
5260  //~ 1 is approx. time (e.g. 'about 5 minutes'), 2 is a list of items
5261  descr = string_format( _( "<bold>Disassembly</bold> takes %1$s and might yield: %2$s." ),
5262  approx_time, comps_str );
5263  } else {
5264  descr = string_format(
5265  //~ 1 is approx. time, 2 is a list of items and tools with qualities, 3 is a list of items.
5266  //~ Bold text in the middle makes it easier to see where the second list starts.
5267  _( "<bold>Disassembly</bold> takes %1$s, requires %2$s and <bold>might yield</bold>: %3$s." ),
5268  approx_time, enumerate_as_string( reqs_list ), comps_str );
5269  }
5270 
5271  insert_separation_line( info );
5272  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", descr );
5273  }
5274 }
5275 
5276 void item::qualities_info( std::vector<iteminfo> &info, const iteminfo_query *parts, int /*batch*/,
5277  bool /*debug*/ ) const
5278 {
5279  // Inline function to emplace a given quality (and its level) onto the info vector
5280  auto name_quality = [&info]( const std::pair<quality_id, int> &q ) {
5281  std::string str;
5282  if( q.first == qual_JACK || q.first == qual_LIFT ) {
5283  //~ %1$d is the numeric quality level, and %2$s is the name of the quality.
5284  //~ %3$d is the amount of weight the jack can lift, and %4$s is the units of that weight.
5285  str = string_format( _( "Level <info>%1$d %2$s</info> quality, "
5286  "rated at <info>%3$d</info> %4$s" ),
5287  q.second, q.first.obj().name,
5288  static_cast<int>( convert_weight( lifting_quality_to_mass( q.second ) ) ),
5289  weight_units() );
5290  } else {
5291  //~ %1$d is the numeric quality level, and %2$s is the name of the quality
5292  str = string_format( _( "Level <info>%1$d %2$s</info> quality" ),
5293  q.second, q.first.obj().name );
5294  }
5295  info.emplace_back( "QUALITIES", "", str );
5296  };
5297 
5298  // List all qualities of this item granted by its item type
5299  const bool has_any_qualities = !type->qualities.empty() || !type->charged_qualities.empty();
5300  if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::QUALITIES ) && has_any_qualities ) {
5301  insert_separation_line( info );
5302  // List all inherent (unconditional) qualities
5303  if( !type->qualities.empty() ) {
5304  info.emplace_back( "QUALITIES", "", _( "<bold>Has qualities</bold>:" ) );
5305  for( const std::pair<quality_id, int> &q : sorted_lex( type->qualities ) ) {
5306  name_quality( q );
5307  }
5308  }
5309  // Tools with "charged_qualities" defined may have additional qualities when charged.
5310  // List them, and show whether there is enough charge to use those qualities.
5311  if( !type->charged_qualities.empty() && type->charges_to_use() > 0 ) {
5312  // Use ammo_sufficient() with player character to include bionic/UPS power
5313  if( ammo_sufficient( &get_player_character() ) ) {
5314  info.emplace_back( "QUALITIES", "", _( "<good>Has enough charges</good> for qualities:" ) );
5315  } else {
5316  info.emplace_back( "QUALITIES", "",
5317  string_format( _( "<bad>Needs %d or more charges</bad> for qualities:" ),
5318  type->charges_to_use() ) );
5319  }
5320  for( const std::pair<quality_id, int> &q : sorted_lex( type->charged_qualities ) ) {
5321  name_quality( q );
5322  }
5323  }
5324  }
5325 
5326  // Accumulate and list all qualities of items contained within this item
5327  if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::QUALITIES_CONTAINED ) &&
5328  contents.has_any_with( []( const item & e ) {
5329  return !e.type->qualities.empty();
5330  }, pocket_type::CONTAINER ) ) {
5331 
5332  info.emplace_back( "QUALITIES", "", _( "Contains items with qualities:" ) );
5333  std::map<quality_id, int, quality_id::LexCmp> most_quality;
5334  for( const item *e : contents.all_items_top() ) {
5335  for( const std::pair<const quality_id, int> &q : e->type->qualities ) {
5336  auto emplace_result = most_quality.emplace( q );
5337  if( !emplace_result.second &&
5338  most_quality.at( emplace_result.first->first ) < q.second ) {
5339  most_quality[ q.first ] = q.second;
5340  }
5341  }
5342  }
5343  for( const std::pair<const quality_id, int> &q : most_quality ) {
5344  name_quality( q );
5345  }
5346  }
5347 }
5348 
5349 void item::bionic_info( std::vector<iteminfo> &info, const iteminfo_query *parts, int /*batch*/,
5350  bool /*debug*/ ) const
5351 {
5352  if( !is_bionic() ) {
5353  return;
5354  }
5355 
5356  insert_separation_line( info );
5357 
5358  // TODO: Unhide when enforcing limits
5359  if( get_option < bool >( "CBM_SLOTS_ENABLED" )
5360  && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_CBM_SLOTS ) ) {
5361  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", list_occupied_bps( type->bionic->id,
5362  _( "This bionic is installed in the following body "
5363  "part(s):" ) ) );
5364  }
5365 
5366  if( is_bionic() && has_flag( flag_NO_STERILE ) ) {
5367  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
5368  _( "* This bionic is <bad>not sterile</bad>, use an <info>autoclave</info> and an <info>autoclave pouch</info> to sterilize it. " ) );
5369  }
5370  insert_separation_line( info );
5371 
5372  const bionic_id bid = type->bionic->id;
5373  const std::vector<material_id> &fuels = bid->fuel_opts;
5374  if( !fuels.empty() ) {
5375  const std::string fuels_str = enumerate_as_string( fuels,
5376  []( const material_id & id ) {
5377  return "<info>" + id->name() + "</info>";
5378  } );
5379 
5380  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
5381  n_gettext( "* This bionic can produce power from the following fuel: ",
5382  "* This bionic can produce power from the following fuels: ", fuels.size() )
5383  + fuels_str );
5384  }
5385 
5386  insert_separation_line( info );
5387 
5388  if( bid->capacity > 0_mJ ) {
5389  info.emplace_back( "CBM", _( "<bold>Power Capacity</bold>:" ), _( " <num> mJ" ),
5390  iteminfo::no_newline,
5391  static_cast<double>( units::to_millijoule( bid->capacity ) ) );
5392  }
5393 
5394  insert_separation_line( info );
5395 
5396  if( bid->required_bionic ) {
5397  info.emplace_back( "CBM", string_format( "* This CBM requires another CBM to also be installed: %s",
5398  bid->required_bionic->name ) );
5399  }
5400  insert_separation_line( info );
5401 
5402  // TODO refactor these almost identical blocks
5403  if( !bid->encumbrance.empty() ) {
5404  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", _( "<bold>Encumbrance</bold>:" ),
5405  iteminfo::no_newline );
5406  for( const std::pair<bodypart_str_id, int> &element : sorted_lex( bid->encumbrance ) ) {
5407  info.emplace_back( "CBM", " " + body_part_name_as_heading( element.first.id(), 1 ),
5408  " <num>", iteminfo::no_newline, element.second );
5409  }
5410  }
5411 
5412  if( !bid->env_protec.empty() ) {
5413  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
5414  _( "<bold>Environmental Protection</bold>:" ),
5415  iteminfo::no_newline );
5416  for( const std::pair< bodypart_str_id, size_t > &element : sorted_lex( bid->env_protec ) ) {
5417  info.emplace_back( "CBM", " " + body_part_name_as_heading( element.first, 1 ),
5418  " <num>", iteminfo::no_newline, static_cast<double>( element.second ) );
5419  }
5420  }
5421 
5422  for( const damage_info_order &dio : damage_info_order::get_all(
5423  damage_info_order::info_type::BIO ) ) {
5424  std::map<bodypart_str_id, float> dt_protec;
5425  for( const std::pair<const bodypart_str_id, resistances> &prot : bid->protec ) {
5426  float res = prot.second.type_resist( dio.dmg_type );
5427  if( res >= 0.f ) {
5428  dt_protec.emplace( prot.first, res );
5429  }
5430  }
5431  if( !dt_protec.empty() ) {
5432  //~ Type of protection (ex: "Bash Protection")
5433  std::string label = string_format( _( "<bold>%s Protection</bold>:" ),
5434  uppercase_first_letter( dio.dmg_type->name.translated() ) );
5435  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", label, iteminfo::no_newline );
5436  for( const std::pair<bodypart_str_id, float> &element : sorted_lex( dt_protec ) ) {
5437  info.emplace_back( "CBM", " " + body_part_name_as_heading( element.first, 1 ),
5438  " <num>", iteminfo::no_newline, element.second );
5439  }
5440  }
5441  }
5442 
5443 }
5444 
5445 void item::melee_combat_info( std::vector<iteminfo> &info, const iteminfo_query *parts,
5446  int /*batch*/,
5447  bool /*debug*/ ) const
5448 {
5449  const std::string space = " ";
5450 
5451  std::map<damage_type_id, int> dmg_types;
5452  for( const damage_type &dt : damage_type::get_all() ) {
5453  if( dt.physical && dt.melee_only ) {
5454  int val = damage_melee( dt.id );
5455  if( val ) {
5456  dmg_types.emplace( dt.id, val );
5457  }
5458  }
5459  }
5460 
5461  Character &player_character = get_player_character();
5462  if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::BASE_DAMAGE ) ) {
5463  insert_separation_line( info );
5464  std::string sep;
5465  if( !dmg_types.empty() ) {
5466  info.emplace_back( "BASE", _( "<bold>Melee damage</bold>: " ), "", iteminfo::no_newline );
5467  }
5468  for( const auto &dmg_type : dmg_types ) {
5469  if( !dmg_type.first->melee_only ) {
5470  continue;
5471  }
5472  info.emplace_back( "BASE", sep + uppercase_first_letter( dmg_type.first->name.translated() ) + ": ",
5473  "", iteminfo::no_newline, dmg_type.second );
5474  sep = space;
5475  }
5476  }
5477 
5478  if( !dmg_types.empty() ) {
5479  int stam = 0;
5480  float stam_pct = 0.0f;
5481  std::map<std::string, double> dps_data;
5482 
5483  bool base_tohit = parts->test( iteminfo_parts::BASE_TOHIT );
5484  bool base_moves = parts->test( iteminfo_parts::BASE_MOVES );
5485  bool base_dps = parts->test( iteminfo_parts::BASE_DPS );
5486  bool base_stamina = parts->test( iteminfo_parts::BASE_STAMINA );
5487  bool base_dpstam = parts->test( iteminfo_parts::BASE_DPSTAM );
5488 
5489  if( base_stamina || base_dpstam ) {
5490  stam = player_character.get_total_melee_stamina_cost( this ) * -1;
5491  stam_pct = std::truncf( stam * 1000.0 / player_character.get_stamina_max() ) / 10;
5492  }
5493 
5494  if( base_dps || base_dpstam ) {
5495  dps_data = dps( true, false );
5496  }
5497 
5498  if( base_tohit ) {
5499  info.emplace_back( "BASE", space + _( "To-hit bonus: " ), "",
5500  iteminfo::show_plus, type->m_to_hit );
5501  }
5502 
5503  if( base_moves ) {
5504  info.emplace_back( "BASE", _( "Base moves per attack: " ), "",
5505  iteminfo::lower_is_better, attack_time( player_character ) );
5506  }
5507 
5508  if( base_dps ) {
5509  info.emplace_back( "BASE", _( "Typical damage per second:" ), "" );
5510  std::string sep;
5511  for( const std::pair<const std::string, double> &dps_entry : dps_data ) {
5512  info.emplace_back( "BASE", sep + dps_entry.first + ": ", "",
5513  iteminfo::no_newline | iteminfo::is_decimal,
5514  dps_entry.second );
5515  sep = space;
5516  }
5517  info.emplace_back( "BASE", "" );
5518  }
5519 
5520  if( base_stamina ) {
5521  info.emplace_back( "BASE", _( "<bold>Stamina use</bold>: Costs " ), "", iteminfo::no_newline );
5522  info.emplace_back( "BASE", ( stam_pct ? _( "about " ) : _( "less than " ) ), "",
5523  iteminfo::no_newline | iteminfo::is_decimal | iteminfo::lower_is_better,
5524  ( stam_pct > 0.1 ? stam_pct : 0.1 ) );
5525  info.emplace_back( "BASE", _( "% stamina to swing." ), "" );
5526  }
5527 
5528  if( base_dpstam ) {
5529  info.emplace_back( "BASE", _( "Typical damage per stamina:" ), "" );
5530  std::string sep;
5531  for( const std::pair<const std::string, double> &dps_entry : dps_data ) {
5532  info.emplace_back( "BASE", sep + dps_entry.first + ": ", "",
5533  iteminfo::no_newline | iteminfo::is_decimal,
5534  100 * dps_entry.second / stam );
5535  sep = space;
5536  }
5537  info.emplace_back( "BASE", "" );
5538  }
5539  }
5540 
5541  if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_TECHNIQUES ) ) {
5542  std::set<matec_id> all_techniques = type->techniques;
5543  all_techniques.insert( techniques.begin(), techniques.end() );
5544 
5545  if( !all_techniques.empty() ) {
5546  const std::vector<matec_id> all_tec_sorted = sorted_lex( all_techniques );
5547  insert_separation_line( info );
5548  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", _( "<bold>Techniques when wielded</bold>: " ) +
5549  enumerate_as_string( all_tec_sorted, []( const matec_id & tid ) {
5550  return string_format( "<stat>%s</stat>: <info>%s</info> <info>%s</info>", tid.obj().name,
5551  tid.obj().description, tid.obj().condition_desc );
5552  } ) );
5553  }
5554  }
5555 
5556  // display which martial arts styles character can use with this weapon
5557  if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_APPLICABLEMARTIALARTS ) ) {
5558  const std::string valid_styles = player_character.martial_arts_data->enumerate_known_styles(
5559  typeId() );
5560  if( !valid_styles.empty() ) {
5561  insert_separation_line( info );
5562  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
5563  _( "You know how to use this with these martial arts "
5564  "styles: " ) + valid_styles );
5565  }
5566  }
5567 
5568  if( !is_gunmod() && has_flag( flag_REACH_ATTACK ) &&
5569  parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_GUNMOD_ADDREACHATTACK ) ) {
5570  insert_separation_line( info );
5571  if( has_flag( flag_REACH3 ) ) {
5572  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
5573  _( "* This item can be used to make <stat>long reach "
5574  "attacks</stat>." ) );
5575  } else {
5576  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
5577  _( "* This item can be used to make <stat>reach "
5578  "attacks</stat>." ) );
5579  }
5580  }
5581 
5582  ///\EFFECT_MELEE >2 allows seeing melee damage stats on weapons
5583  if( ( player_character.get_skill_level( skill_melee ) >= 3 &&
5584  ( !dmg_types.empty() || type->m_to_hit > 0 ) ) || debug_mode ) {
5585  bodypart_id bp = bodypart_id( "torso" );
5586  damage_instance non_crit;
5587  player_character.roll_all_damage( false, non_crit, true, *this, "WEAPON", nullptr, bp );
5588  damage_instance crit;
5589  player_character.roll_all_damage( true, crit, true, *this, "WEAPON", nullptr, bp );
5590  int attack_cost = player_character.attack_speed( *this );
5591  insert_separation_line( info );
5592  if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_MELEEDMG ) ) {
5593  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", _( "<bold>Average melee damage</bold>:" ) );
5594  }
5595  // Chance of critical hit
5596  if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_MELEEDMG_CRIT ) ) {
5597  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
5598  string_format( _( "Critical hit chance <neutral>%d%% - %d%%</neutral>" ),
5599  static_cast<int>( player_character.crit_chance( 0, 100, *this ) *
5600  100 ),
5601  static_cast<int>( player_character.crit_chance( 100, 0, *this ) *
5602  100 ) ) );
5603  }
5604  if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_MELEEDMG_TYPES ) ) {
5605  for( const damage_info_order &dio : damage_info_order::get_all(
5606  damage_info_order::info_type::MELEE ) ) {
5607  // NOTE: Using "BASE" instead of "DESCRIPTION", so numerical formatting will work
5608  // (output.cpp:format_item_info does not interpolate <num> for DESCRIPTION info)
5609  info.emplace_back( "BASE", string_format( "%s: ", uppercase_first_letter( dio.verb.translated() ) ),
5610  "<num>", iteminfo::no_newline, non_crit.type_damage( dio.dmg_type ) );
5611  //~ Label used in the melee damage section in the item info screen (ex: " Critical bash: ")
5612  //~ %1$s = a prepended space, %2$s = the name of the damage type (bash, cut, pierce, etc.)
5613  info.emplace_back( "BASE", string_format( _( "%1$sCritical %2$s: " ), space,
5614  dio.dmg_type->name.translated() ),
5615  "<num>", iteminfo::no_flags, crit.type_damage( dio.dmg_type ) );
5616  }
5617  }
5618  // Moves
5619  if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_MELEEDMG_MOVES ) ) {
5620  info.emplace_back( "BASE", _( "Adjusted moves per attack: " ), "<num>",
5621  iteminfo::lower_is_better, attack_cost );
5622  }
5623  insert_separation_line( info );
5624  } else if( player_character.get_skill_level( skill_melee ) < 3 &&
5625  ( !dmg_types.empty() || type->m_to_hit > 0 ) ) {
5626  insert_separation_line( info );
5627  if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_MELEEDMG ) ) {
5628  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", _( "<bold>Average melee damage</bold>:" ) );
5629  info.emplace_back( "BASE",
5630  _( "You don't know enough about fighting to know how effectively you could use this." ) );
5631  }
5632  }
5633 }
5634 
5635 void item::contents_info( std::vector<iteminfo> &info, const iteminfo_query *parts, int batch,
5636  bool /*debug*/ ) const
5637 {
5638  if( ( toolmods().empty() && gunmods().empty() && contents.empty() ) ||
5639  !parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_CONTENTS ) ) {
5640  return;
5641  }
5642  const std::string space = " ";
5643 
5644  for( const item *mod : is_gun() ? gunmods() : toolmods() ) {
5645  // mod_str = "(Integrated) Mod: %mod_name% (%mod_location%) "
5646  std::string mod_str;
5647  if( mod->is_irremovable() ) {
5648  mod_str = _( "Integrated mod: " );
5649  } else {
5650  mod_str = _( "Mod: " );
5651  }
5652  mod_str += string_format( "<bold>%s</bold>", mod->tname() );
5653  if( mod->type->gunmod ) {
5654  mod_str += string_format( " (%s) ", mod->type->gunmod->location.name() );
5655  }
5656  insert_separation_line( info );
5657  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", mod_str );
5658  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", mod->type->description.translated() );
5659  }
5660  bool contents_header = false;
5661  for( const item *contents_item : contents.all_items_top() ) {
5662  if( !contents_header ) {
5663  insert_separation_line( info );
5664  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", _( "<bold>Contents of this item</bold>:" ) );
5665  contents_header = true;
5666  } else {
5667  // Separate items with a blank line
5668  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", space );
5669  }
5670 
5671  const translation &description = contents_item->type->description;
5672 
5673  if( contents_item->made_of_from_type( phase_id::LIQUID ) ) {
5674  units::volume contents_volume = contents_item->volume() * batch;
5675  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", colorize( contents_item->display_name(),
5676  contents_item->color_in_inventory() ) );
5677  info.emplace_back( vol_to_info( "CONTAINER", description + space, contents_volume ) );
5678  } else {
5679  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", colorize( contents_item->display_name(),
5680  contents_item->color_in_inventory() ) );
5681  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", description.translated() );
5682  }
5683  }
5684 }
5685 
5686 void item::properties_info( std::vector<iteminfo> &info, const iteminfo_query *parts, int batch,
5687  bool debug ) const
5688 {
5689  if( is_null() ) {
5690  return;
5691  }
5692 
5693  insert_separation_line( info );
5694 
5695  if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::BASE_RIGIDITY ) ) {
5696  bool not_rigid = false;
5697  if( const islot_armor *t = find_armor_data() ) {
5698  bool any_encumb_increase = std::any_of( t->data.begin(), t->data.end(),
5699  []( const armor_portion_data & data ) {
5700  return data.encumber != data.max_encumber;
5701  } );
5702  if( any_encumb_increase ) {
5703  info.emplace_back( "BASE",
5704  _( "* This item's pockets are <info>not rigid</info>. Its"
5705  " volume and encumbrance increase with contents." ) );
5706  not_rigid = true;
5707  }
5708  }
5709  if( !not_rigid && !all_pockets_rigid() && !is_corpse() ) {
5710  info.emplace_back( "BASE",
5711  _( "* This item's pockets are <info>not rigid</info>. Its"
5712  " volume increases with contents." ) );
5713  }
5714  }
5715 
5716  if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_CONDUCTIVITY ) ) {
5717  if( !conductive() ) {
5718  info.emplace_back( "BASE", _( "* This item <good>does not "
5719  "conduct</good> electricity." ) );
5720  } else if( has_flag( flag_CONDUCTIVE ) ) {
5721  info.emplace_back( "BASE",
5722  _( "* This item effectively <bad>conducts</bad> "
5723  "electricity, as it has no guard." ) );
5724  } else {
5725  info.emplace_back( "BASE", _( "* This item <bad>conducts</bad> electricity." ) );
5726  }
5727  }
5728 
5729  if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_FLAGS ) ) {
5730  // concatenate base and acquired flags...
5731  cata::flat_set<flag_id> flags;
5732  flags.insert( get_flags().begin(), get_flags().end() );
5733  flags.insert( type->get_flags().begin(), type->get_flags().end() );
5734  flags.insert( inherited_tags_cache.begin(), inherited_tags_cache.end() );
5735 
5736  // ...and display those which have an info description
5737  for( const flag_id &e : sorted_lex( flags ) ) {
5738  const json_flag &f = e.obj();
5739  if( !f.info().empty() ) {
5740  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", string_format( "* %s", f.info() ) );
5741  }
5742  }
5743  }
5744 
5745  armor_fit_info( info, parts, batch, debug );
5746 
5747  if( ethereal ) {
5748  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
5749  _( "This item disappears as soon as its timer runs out, unless it is permanent or a comestible." ) );
5750  }
5751 
5752  if( has_flag( flag_RADIO_ACTIVATION ) &&
5753  parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_RADIO_ACTIVATION ) ) {
5754  if( has_flag( flag_RADIO_MOD ) ) {
5755  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
5756  _( "* This item has been modified to listen to <info>radio "
5757  "signals</info>. It can still be activated manually." ) );
5758  } else {
5759  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
5760  _( "* This item can only be activated by a <info>radio "
5761  "signal</info>." ) );
5762  }
5763 
5764  std::string signame;
5765  if( has_flag( flag_RADIOSIGNAL_1 ) ) {
5766  signame = _( "<color_c_red>red</color> radio signal" );
5767  } else if( has_flag( flag_RADIOSIGNAL_2 ) ) {
5768  signame = _( "<color_c_blue>blue</color> radio signal" );
5769  } else if( has_flag( flag_RADIOSIGNAL_3 ) ) {
5770  signame = _( "<color_c_green>green</color> radio signal" );
5771  }
5772  if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_RADIO_ACTIVATION_CHANNEL ) ) {
5773  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
5774  string_format( _( "* It will be activated by the %s." ),
5775  signame ) );
5776  }
5777 
5778  if( has_flag( flag_BOMB ) && has_flag( flag_RADIO_INVOKE_PROC ) &&
5779  parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_RADIO_ACTIVATION_PROC ) ) {
5780  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
5781  _( "* Activating this item with a <info>radio signal</info> will "
5782  "<neutral>detonate</neutral> it immediately." ) );
5783  }
5784  }
5785 
5786  if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_DIE ) && this->get_var( "die_num_sides", 0 ) != 0 ) {
5787  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
5788  string_format( _( "* This item can be used as a <info>die</info>, "
5789  "and has <info>%d</info> sides." ),
5790  static_cast<int>( this->get_var( "die_num_sides",
5791  0 ) ) ) );
5792  }
5793 
5794 }
5795 
5796 void item::final_info( std::vector<iteminfo> &info, const iteminfo_query *parts, int batch,
5797  bool /* debug */ ) const
5798 {
5799  if( is_null() ) {
5800  return;
5801  }
5802 
5803  avatar &player_character = get_avatar();
5804 
5805  if( has_flag( flag_LEAK_DAM ) && has_flag( flag_RADIOACTIVE ) && damage() > 0
5806  && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_RADIOACTIVITY_DAMAGED ) ) {
5807  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
5808  _( "* The casing of this item has <neutral>cracked</neutral>, "
5809  "revealing an <info>ominous green glow</info>." ) );
5810  }
5811 
5812  if( has_flag( flag_LEAK_ALWAYS ) && has_flag( flag_RADIOACTIVE ) &&
5813  parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_RADIOACTIVITY_ALWAYS ) ) {
5814  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
5815  _( "* This object is <neutral>surrounded</neutral> by a "
5816  "<info>sickly green glow</info>." ) );
5817  }
5818 
5819  if( type->milling_data && !type->milling_data->into_.is_null() ) {
5820  if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_MILLEABLE ) ) {
5821 
5822  const islot_milling &mdata = *type->milling_data;
5823  const recipe rec = *mdata.recipe_;
5824 
5825  if( rec.is_null() ) {
5826  debugmsg( _( "Failed to find milling recipe for %s." ),
5827  this->tname( 1, false ) );
5828  } else {
5829  const int product_size = rec.makes_amount();
5830  const requirement_data::alter_item_comp_vector &components =
5831  rec.simple_requirements().get_components();
5832  int lot_size = 0;
5833 
5834  // Making the assumption that milling only uses a single type of input product. Support for mixed products would require additional logic.
5835  // We also make the assumption that this is the only relevant input, so if lubricants etc. was to be added more logic would be needed.
5836  for( const std::vector<item_comp> &component : components ) {
5837  for( const item_comp &comp : component ) {
5838  if( comp.type == this->typeId() ) {
5839  lot_size = comp.count;
5840  break;
5841  }
5842  }
5843 
5844  if( lot_size > 0 ) {
5845  break;
5846  }
5847  }
5848 
5849  if( lot_size == 0 ) {
5850  debugmsg( _( "Failed to find milling recipe for %s. It can't be milled." ),
5851  this->display_name().c_str() );
5852  } else {
5853  std::string rate_info = string_format(
5854  _( "* <neutral>%d %s</neutral> can be turned into <neutral>%d %s</neutral>." ),
5855  lot_size,
5856  type->nname( lot_size ), product_size,
5857  mdata.into_->nname( product_size ) );
5858 
5859  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
5860  string_format( _( "* This item can be <info>milled</info>." ) ) );
5861  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", rate_info );
5862  }
5863  }
5864  }
5865  }
5866 
5867  if( is_brewable() ) {
5868  const item &brewed = *this;
5869  if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_BREWABLE_DURATION ) ) {
5870  const time_duration btime = brewed.brewing_time();
5871  int btime_i = to_days<int>( btime );
5872  if( btime <= 2_days ) {
5873  btime_i = to_hours<int>( btime );
5874  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
5875  string_format( n_gettext( "* Once set in a vat, this "
5876  "will ferment in around %d hour.",
5877  "* Once set in a vat, this will ferment in "
5878  "around %d hours.", btime_i ), btime_i ) );
5879  } else {
5880  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
5881  string_format( n_gettext( "* Once set in a vat, this "
5882  "will ferment in around %d day.",
5883  "* Once set in a vat, this will ferment in "
5884  "around %d days.", btime_i ), btime_i ) );
5885  }
5886  }
5887  if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_BREWABLE_PRODUCTS ) ) {
5888  for( const std::pair<const itype_id, int> &res : brewed.brewing_results() ) {
5889  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
5890  string_format( _( "* Fermenting this will produce "
5891  "<neutral>%s</neutral>." ),
5892  res.first->nname( res.second ) ) );
5893  }
5894  }
5895  }
5896 
5897  if( is_compostable() ) {
5898  const item &composted = *this;
5899  if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_COMPOSTABLE_DURATION ) ) {
5900  const time_duration btime = composted.composting_time();
5901  int btime_i = to_days<int>( btime );
5902  if( btime <= 2_days ) {
5903  btime_i = to_hours<int>( btime );
5904  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
5905  string_format( n_gettext( "* Once set in an anaerobic digester, this "
5906  "will ferment in around %d hour.",
5907  "* Once set in an anaerobic digester, this will ferment in "
5908  "around %d hours.", btime_i ), btime_i ) );
5909  } else {
5910  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
5911  string_format( n_gettext( "* Once set in an anaerobic digester, this "
5912  "will ferment in around %d day.",
5913  "* Once set in an anaerobic digester, this will ferment in "
5914  "around %d days.", btime_i ), btime_i ) );
5915  }
5916  }
5917  if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_COMPOSTABLE_PRODUCTS ) ) {
5918  for( const std::pair<const itype_id, int> &res : composted.composting_results() ) {
5919  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
5920  string_format( _( "* Fermenting this will produce "
5921  "<neutral>%s</neutral>." ),
5922  res.first->nname( res.second ) ) );
5923  }
5924  }
5925  }
5926 
5927  if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_FAULTS ) ) {
5928  for( const fault_id &e : faults ) {
5929  //~ %1$s is the name of a fault and %2$s is the description of the fault
5930  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", string_format( _( "* <bad>%1$s</bad>. %2$s" ),
5931  e.obj().name(), e.obj().description() ) );
5932  }
5933  }
5934 
5935  // does the item fit in any holsters?
5936  std::vector<const itype *> holsters = Item_factory::find( [this]( const itype & e ) {
5937  if( !e.can_use( "holster" ) ) {
5938  return false;
5939  }
5940  const holster_actor *ptr = dynamic_cast<const holster_actor *>
5941  ( e.get_use( "holster" )->get_actor_ptr() );
5942  const item holster_item( &e );
5943  return ptr->can_holster( holster_item, *this ) && !item_is_blacklisted( holster_item.typeId() );
5944  } );
5945 
5946  if( !holsters.empty() && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_HOLSTERS ) ) {
5947  insert_separation_line( info );
5948  std::vector<std::string> holsters_str;
5949  holsters_str.reserve( holsters.size() );
5950  for( const itype *e : holsters ) {
5951  holsters_str.emplace_back( player_character.is_wearing( e->get_id() )
5952  ? string_format( "<good>%s</good>", e->nname( 1 ) )
5953  : e->nname( 1 ) );
5954  }
5955  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", _( "<bold>Can be stored in</bold>: " ) +
5956  enumerate_lcsorted_with_limit( holsters_str, 30 ) );
5957  info.back().sName += ".";
5958  }
5959 
5960  if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_ACTIVATABLE_TRANSFORMATION ) ) {
5961  insert_separation_line( info );
5962  for( const auto &u : type->use_methods ) {
5963  const delayed_transform_iuse *tt = dynamic_cast<const delayed_transform_iuse *>
5964  ( u.second.get_actor_ptr() );
5965  if( tt == nullptr ) {
5966  continue;
5967  }
5968  const int time_to_do = tt->time_to_do( *this );
5969  if( time_to_do <= 0 ) {
5970  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
5971  _( "It's done and <info>can be activated</info>." ) );
5972  } else {
5973  const std::string time = to_string_clipped( time_duration::from_turns( time_to_do ) );
5974  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
5975  string_format( _( "It will be done in %s." ),
5976  time.c_str() ) );
5977  }
5978  }
5979  }
5980 
5981  std::map<std::string, std::string>::const_iterator item_note = item_vars.find( "item_note" );
5982 
5983  if( item_note != item_vars.end() && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_NOTES ) ) {
5984  insert_separation_line( info );
5985  std::string ntext;
5986  std::map<std::string, std::string>::const_iterator item_note_tool =
5987  item_vars.find( "item_note_tool" );
5988  const use_function *use_func =
5989  item_note_tool != item_vars.end() ?
5990  item_controller->find_template(
5991  itype_id( item_note_tool->second ) )->get_use( "inscribe" ) :
5992  nullptr;
5993  const inscribe_actor *use_actor =
5994  use_func ? dynamic_cast<const inscribe_actor *>( use_func->get_actor_ptr() ) : nullptr;
5995  if( use_actor ) {
5996  //~ %1$s: gerund (e.g. carved), %2$s: item name, %3$s: inscription text
5997  ntext = string_format( pgettext( "carving", "%1$s on the %2$s is: %3$s" ),
5998  use_actor->gerund, tname(), item_note->second );
5999  } else {
6000  //~ %1$s: inscription text
6001  ntext = string_format( pgettext( "carving", "Note: %1$s" ), item_note->second );
6002  }
6003  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", ntext );
6004  }
6005 
6006  // Price and barter value
6007  const int price_preapoc = price( false ) * batch;
6008  const int price_postapoc = price( true ) * batch;
6009  if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::BASE_PRICE ) ) {
6010  insert_separation_line( info );
6011  info.emplace_back( "BASE", _( "Price: " ), _( "$<num>" ),
6012  iteminfo::is_decimal | iteminfo::no_newline,
6013  static_cast<double>( price_preapoc ) / 100 );
6014  }
6015  if( price_preapoc != price_postapoc && parts->test( iteminfo_parts::BASE_BARTER ) ) {
6016  const std::string space = " ";
6017  info.emplace_back( "BASE", space + _( "Barter value: " ), _( "$<num>" ),
6018  iteminfo::is_decimal,
6019  static_cast<double>( price_postapoc ) / 100 );
6020  }
6021 
6022  // Recipes using this item as an ingredient
6023  if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_APPLICABLE_RECIPES ) ) {
6024  // with the inventory display allowing you to select items, showing the things you could make with contained items could be confusing.
6025  const itype_id &tid = typeId();
6026  const inventory &crafting_inv = player_character.crafting_inventory();
6027  const recipe_subset available_recipe_subset = player_character.get_group_available_recipes();
6028  const std::set<const recipe *> &item_recipes = available_recipe_subset.of_component( tid );
6029 
6030  insert_separation_line( info );
6031  if( item_recipes.empty() ) {
6032  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", _( "You know of nothing you could craft with it." ) );
6033  } else {
6034  std::vector<std::string> crafts;
6035  for( const recipe *r : item_recipes ) {
6036  const bool can_make = r->deduped_requirements()
6037  .can_make_with_inventory( crafting_inv, r->get_component_filter() );
6038 
6039  // Endarken recipes that can't be constructed with the survivor's inventory
6040  const std::string name = r->result_name( /* decorated = */ true );
6041  crafts.emplace_back( can_make ? name : string_format( "<dark>%s</dark>", name ) );
6042  }
6043  const std::string recipes = enumerate_lcsorted_with_limit( crafts, 15 );
6044  info.emplace_back( " DESCRIPTION", string_format( _( "You could use it to craft: %s" ), recipes ) );
6045  }
6046  }
6047 
6048  if( is_armor() ) {
6049  const ret_val<void> can_wear = player_character.can_wear( *this, true );
6050  if( !can_wear.success() ) {
6051  insert_separation_line( info );
6052  // can_wear returns a translated string
6053  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", string_format( "<bad>%s</bad>", can_wear.str() ) );
6054  }
6055  }
6056 
6057  // Vehicle parts or appliances using this item as a component
6058  if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_VEHICLE_PARTS ) ) {
6059  const itype_id tid = typeId();
6060  std::vector<vpart_info> vparts;
6061 
6062  for( const vpart_info &vpi : vehicles::parts::get_all() ) {
6063  if( vpi.base_item == tid ) {
6064  vparts.push_back( vpi );
6065  }
6066  }
6067 
6068  const auto print_parts = [&info, &player_character](
6069  const std::vector<vpart_info> &vparts,
6070  const std::string_view install_where,
6071  const std::function<bool( const vpart_info & )> &predicate
6072  ) {
6073  std::vector<std::string> result_parts;
6074  for( const vpart_info &vp : vparts ) {
6075  const bool is_duplicate = std::any_of( result_parts.begin(), result_parts.end(),
6076  [name = vp.name()]( const std::string & r ) {
6077  return r == name;
6078  } );
6079 
6080  if( is_duplicate || !predicate( vp ) ) {
6081  continue; // skip part variants, they have same part names
6082  }
6083 
6084  const bool can_install = player_character.meets_skill_requirements( vp.install_skills );
6085  const std::string name = vp.name();
6086 
6087  // Endarken parts that can't be installed with the character's skills
6088  result_parts.emplace_back( can_install ? name : string_format( "<dark>%s</dark>", name ) );
6089  }
6090 
6091  if( result_parts.empty() ) {
6092  return;
6093  }
6094 
6095  const std::string installable_parts = enumerate_lcsorted_with_limit( result_parts, 15 );
6096 
6097  insert_separation_line( info );
6098  info.emplace_back( " DESCRIPTION", string_format( install_where, installable_parts ) );
6099  };
6100 
6101  print_parts( vparts, _( "You could install it in a vehicle: %s" ),
6102  []( const vpart_info & vp ) {
6103  return !vp.has_flag( vpart_bitflags::VPFLAG_APPLIANCE );
6104  } );
6105 
6106  print_parts( vparts, _( "You could install it as an appliance: %s" ),
6107  []( const vpart_info & vp ) {
6108  return vp.has_flag( vpart_bitflags::VPFLAG_APPLIANCE );
6109  } );
6110  }
6111 }
6112 
6113 void item::ascii_art_info( std::vector<iteminfo> &info, const iteminfo_query * /* parts */,
6114  int /* batch */,
6115  bool /* debug */ ) const
6116 {
6117  if( is_null() ) {
6118  return;
6119  }
6120 
6121  if( get_option<bool>( "ENABLE_ASCII_ART" ) ) {
6122  ascii_art_id art = type->picture_id;
6123  if( has_itype_variant() && itype_variant().art.is_valid() ) {
6124  art = itype_variant().art;
6125  }
6126  if( art.is_valid() ) {
6127  insert_separation_line( info );
6128  for( const std::string &line : art->picture ) {
6129  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", line );
6130  }
6131  }
6132  }
6133 }
6134 
6135 std::string item::info( std::vector<iteminfo> &info, const iteminfo_query *parts, int batch ) const
6136 {
6137  const bool debug = g != nullptr && debug_mode;
6138 
6139  if( parts == nullptr ) {
6140  parts = &iteminfo_query::all;
6141  }
6142 
6143  info.clear();
6144 
6145  if( !is_null() ) {
6146  basic_info( info, parts, batch, debug );
6147  debug_info( info, parts, batch, debug );
6148  }
6149 
6150  // Different items might want to present the info blocks in different order, depending on what
6151  // they consider more relevant.
6152  std::vector<std::string> all_info_blocks = {"big_block_of_stuff", "contents", "melee_combat_info", "footer"};
6153  std::vector<std::string> prio_info_blocks = { };
6154  item_category_id my_cat_id = get_category_shallow().id;
6155  if( is_maybe_melee_weapon() ) {
6156  prio_info_blocks.emplace_back( "melee_combat_info" );
6157  } else if( my_cat_id == item_category_container ) {
6158  prio_info_blocks.emplace_back( "contents" );
6159  }
6160  std::vector<std::string> info_block_ordered = prio_info_blocks;
6161  for( const std::string &blockname : all_info_blocks ) {
6162  if( std::find( info_block_ordered.begin(), info_block_ordered.end(),
6163  blockname ) == info_block_ordered.end() ) {
6164  info_block_ordered.push_back( blockname );
6165  }
6166  }
6167 
6168  for( const auto &blockname : info_block_ordered ) {
6169  if( blockname == "melee_combat_info" ) {
6170 
6171  melee_combat_info( info, parts, batch, debug );
6172 
6173  } else if( blockname == "big_block_of_stuff" ) {
6174 
6175  if( is_medication() ) {
6176  med_info( this, info, parts, batch, debug );
6177  }
6178 
6179  if( is_food() ) {
6180  food_info( this, info, parts, batch, debug );
6181  }
6182 
6183  magazine_info( info, parts, batch, debug );
6184  ammo_info( info, parts, batch, debug );
6185 
6186  const item *gun = nullptr;
6187  if( is_gun() ) {
6188  gun = this;
6189  const gun_mode aux = gun_current_mode();
6190  // if we have an active auxiliary gunmod display stats for this instead
6191  if( aux && aux->is_gunmod() && aux->is_gun() &&
6192  parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_AUX_GUNMOD_HEADER ) ) {
6193  gun = &*aux;
6194  info.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
6195  string_format( _( "Stats of the active <info>gunmod (%s)</info> "
6196  "are shown." ), gun->tname() ) );
6197  }
6198  }
6199  if( gun != nullptr ) {
6200  gun_info( gun, info, parts, batch, debug );
6201  }
6202 
6203  gunmod_info( info, parts, batch, debug );
6204  armor_info( info, parts, batch, debug );
6205  animal_armor_info( info, parts, batch, debug );
6206  book_info( info, parts, batch, debug );
6207  battery_info( info, parts, batch, debug );
6208  tool_info( info, parts, batch, debug );
6209  actions_info( info, parts, batch, debug );
6210  component_info( info, parts, batch, debug );
6211  qualities_info( info, parts, batch, debug );
6212 
6213  // Uses for item (bandaging quality, holster capacity, grenade activation)
6214  if( parts->test( iteminfo_parts::DESCRIPTION_USE_METHODS ) ) {
6215  for( const std::pair<const std::string, use_function> &method : type->use_methods ) {
6216  insert_separation_line( info );
6217  method.second.dump_info( *this, info );
6218  }
6219  }
6220 
6221  repair_info( info, parts, batch, debug );
6222  enchantment_info( info, parts, batch, debug );
6223  disassembly_info( info, parts, batch, debug );
6224  properties_info( info, parts, batch, debug );
6225  bionic_info( info, parts, batch, debug );
6226 
6227  } else if( blockname == "contents" ) {
6228 
6229  contents.info( info, parts );
6230  contents_info( info, parts, batch, debug );
6231 
6232  } else if( blockname == "footer" ) {
6233 
6234  final_info( info, parts, batch, debug );
6235  ascii_art_info( info, parts, batch, debug );
6236 
6237  } else {
6238 
6239  debugmsg( "Trying to show info block named %s which is not valid.", blockname );
6240 
6241  }
6242  }
6243 
6244  if( !info.empty() && info.back().sName == "--" ) {
6245  info.pop_back();
6246  }
6247 
6248  return format_item_info( info, {} );
6249 }
6250 
6251 std::map<gunmod_location, int> item::get_mod_locations() const
6252 {
6253  std::map<gunmod_location, int> mod_locations = type->gun->valid_mod_locations;
6254 
6255  for( const item *mod : gunmods() ) {
6256  if( !mod->type->gunmod->add_mod.empty() ) {
6257  std::map<gunmod_location, int> add_locations = mod->type->gunmod->add_mod;
6258 
6259  for( const std::pair<const gunmod_location, int> &add_location : add_locations ) {
6260  mod_locations[add_location.first] += add_location.second;
6261  }
6262  }
6263  }
6264 
6265  return mod_locations;
6266 }
6267 
6268 int item::get_free_mod_locations( const gunmod_location &location ) const
6269 {
6270  if( !is_gun() ) {
6271  return 0;
6272  }
6273 
6274  std::map<gunmod_location, int> mod_locations = get_mod_locations();
6275 
6276  const auto loc = mod_locations.find( location );
6277  if( loc == mod_locations.end() ) {
6278  return 0;
6279  }
6280  int result = loc->second;
6281  for( const item *elem : contents.all_items_top( pocket_type::MOD ) ) {
6282  const cata::value_ptr<islot_gunmod> &mod = elem->type->gunmod;
6283  if( mod && mod->location == location ) {
6284  result--;
6285  }
6286  }
6287  return result;
6288 }
6289 
6290 const std::string &item::symbol() const
6291 {
6292  if( has_itype_variant() && _itype_variant->alt_sym ) {
6293  return *_itype_variant->alt_sym;
6294  }
6295  return type->sym;
6296 }
6297 
6298 nc_color item::color_in_inventory( const Character *const ch ) const
6299 {
6300  const Character &player_character = ch ? *ch : get_player_character();
6301 
6302  // Only item not otherwise colored gets colored as favorite
6303  nc_color ret = is_favorite ? c_white : c_light_gray;
6304  if( type->can_use( "learn_spell" ) ) {
6305  const use_function *iuse = get_use( "learn_spell" );
6306  const learn_spell_actor *actor_ptr =
6307  static_cast<const learn_spell_actor *>( iuse->get_actor_ptr() );
6308  for( const std::string &spell_id_str : actor_ptr->spells ) {
6309  const spell_id sp_id( spell_id_str );
6310  if( player_character.magic->knows_spell( sp_id ) &&
6311  !player_character.magic->get_spell( sp_id ).is_max_level( player_character ) ) {
6312  ret = c_yellow;
6313  }
6314  if( !player_character.magic->knows_spell( sp_id ) &&
6315  player_character.magic->can_learn_spell( player_character, sp_id ) ) {
6316  return c_light_blue;
6317  }
6318  }
6319  } else if( has_flag( flag_WET ) ) {
6320  ret = c_cyan;
6321  } else if( has_flag( flag_LITCIG ) ) { // NOLINT(bugprone-branch-clone)
6322  ret = c_red;
6323  } else if( is_armor() && player_character.has_trait( trait_WOOLALLERGY ) &&
6324  ( made_of( material_wool ) || has_own_flag( flag_wooled ) ) ) {
6325  ret = c_red;
6326  } else if( is_filthy() || has_own_flag( flag_DIRTY ) ) {
6327  ret = c_brown;
6328  } else if( is_relic() && !has_flag( flag_MUNDANE ) ) {
6329  ret = c_pink;
6330  } else if( is_bionic() ) {
6331  if( player_character.is_installable( this, false ).success() &&
6332  ( !player_character.has_bionic( type->bionic->id ) || type->bionic->id->dupes_allowed ) ) {
6333  ret = player_character.bionic_installation_issues( type->bionic->id ).empty() ? c_green : c_red;
6334  } else if( !has_flag( flag_NO_STERILE ) ) {
6335  ret = c_dark_gray;
6336  }
6337  } else if( has_flag( flag_LEAK_DAM ) && has_flag( flag_RADIOACTIVE ) && damage() > 0 ) {
6338  ret = c_light_green;
6339  } else if( ( active && !has_temperature() ) || ( is_corpse() && can_revive() ) ) {
6340  // Active items show up as yellow (corpses only if reviving)
6341  ret = c_yellow;
6342  } else if( is_medication() || is_medical_tool() ) {
6343  ret = c_light_blue;
6344  } else if( is_food() ) {
6345  // Give color priority to allergy (allergy > inedible by freeze or other conditions)
6346  // TODO: refactor u.will_eat to let this section handle coloring priority without duplicating code.
6347  if( player_character.allergy_type( *this ) != morale_null ) {
6348  return c_red;
6349  }
6350 
6351  // Default: permafood, drugs
6352  // Brown: rotten (for non-saprophages) or non-rotten (for saprophages)
6353  // Dark gray: inedible
6354  // Red: morale penalty
6355  // Yellow: will rot soon
6356  // Cyan: edible
6357  // Light Cyan: will rot eventually
6358  const ret_val<edible_rating> rating = player_character.will_eat( *this );
6359  // TODO: More colors
