14263 bool item::is_rigid() const
14264 {
14265  // overrides for the item overall
14266  if( has_flag( flag_SOFT ) ) {
14267  return false;
14268  } else if( has_flag( flag_HARD ) ) {
14269  return true;
14270  }
14271 
14272  // if the item has no armor data it isn't rigid
14273  const islot_armor *armor = find_armor_data();
14274  if( armor == nullptr ) {
14275  return false;
14276  }
14277 
14278  bool is_rigid = false;
14279 
14280  for( const armor_portion_data &portion : armor->sub_data ) {
14281  is_rigid |= portion.rigid;
14282  }
14283 
14284  // check if ablative pieces are rigid too
14285  if( is_ablative() ) {
14286  for( const item_pocket *pocket : contents.get_all_ablative_pockets() ) {
14287  if( !pocket->empty() ) {
14288  // get the contained plate
14289  const item &ablative_armor = pocket->front();
14290  is_rigid |= ablative_armor.is_rigid();
14291  }
14292  }
14293  }
14294 
14295  return is_rigid;
14296 }
14297 
14298 bool item::is_comfortable() const
14299 {
14300  // overrides for the item overall
14301  // NO_WEAR_EFFECT is there for jewelry and the like which is too small to be considered
14302  if( has_flag( flag_SOFT ) || has_flag( flag_PADDED ) || has_flag( flag_NO_WEAR_EFFECT ) ) {
14303  return true;
14304  } else if( has_flag( flag_HARD ) ) {
14305  return false;
14306  }
14307 
14308  // if the item has no armor data it isn't rigid
14309  const islot_armor *armor = find_armor_data();
14310  if( armor == nullptr ) {
14311  return true;
14312  }
14313 
14314  for( const armor_portion_data &portion : armor->sub_data ) {
14315  if( portion.comfortable ) {
14316  return true;
14317  }
14318  }
14319 
14320  return false;
14321 }
14322 
14323 template <typename T>
14324 bool item::is_bp_rigid( const T &bp ) const
14325 {
14326  // overrides for the item overall
14327  if( has_flag( flag_SOFT ) ) {
14328  return false;
14329  } else if( has_flag( flag_HARD ) ) {
14330  return true;
14331  }
14332 
14333  const armor_portion_data *portion = portion_for_bodypart( bp );
14334 
14335  bool is_rigid = false;
14336 
14337  if( portion ) {
14338  is_rigid |= portion->rigid;
14339  }
14340 
14341  // check if ablative pieces are rigid too
14342  if( is_ablative() ) {
14343  for( const item_pocket *pocket : contents.get_all_ablative_pockets() ) {
14344  if( !pocket->empty() ) {
14345  // get the contained plate
14346  const item &ablative_armor = pocket->front();
14347  is_rigid |= ablative_armor.is_bp_rigid( bp );
14348  }
14349  }
14350  }
14351 
14352  return is_rigid;
14353 }
14354 
14355 // initialize for sub_bodyparts and body parts
14356 template bool item::is_bp_rigid<sub_bodypart_id>( const sub_bodypart_id &bp ) const;
14357 
14358 template bool item::is_bp_rigid<bodypart_id>( const bodypart_id &bp ) const;
14359 
14360 template <typename T>
14361 bool item::is_bp_rigid_selective( const T &bp ) const
14362 {
14363  bool is_rigid;
14364 
14365  const armor_portion_data *portion = portion_for_bodypart( bp );
14366 
14367  if( !portion ) {
14368  return false;
14369  }
14370 
14371  // overrides for the item overall
14372  if( has_flag( flag_SOFT ) ) {
14373  is_rigid = false;
14374  } else if( has_flag( flag_HARD ) ) {
14375  is_rigid = true;
14376  } else {
14377  is_rigid = portion->rigid;
14378  }
14379 
14380  return is_rigid && portion->rigid_layer_only;
14381 }
14382 
14383 // initialize for sub_bodyparts and body parts
14384 template bool item::is_bp_rigid_selective<sub_bodypart_id>( const sub_bodypart_id &bp ) const;
14385 
14386 template bool item::is_bp_rigid_selective<bodypart_id>( const bodypart_id &bp ) const;
14387 
14388 template <typename T>
14389 bool item::is_bp_comfortable( const T &bp ) const
14390 {
14391  // overrides for the item overall
14392  // NO_WEAR_EFFECT is there for jewelry and the like which is too small to be considered
14393  if( has_flag( flag_SOFT ) || has_flag( flag_PADDED ) || has_flag( flag_NO_WEAR_EFFECT ) ) {
14394  return true;
14395  } else if( has_flag( flag_HARD ) ) {
14396  return false;
14397  }
14398 
14399  const armor_portion_data *portion = portion_for_bodypart( bp );
14400 
14401  if( !portion ) {
14402  return false;
14403  }
14404 
14405  return portion->comfortable;
14406 }
14407 
14408 // initialize for sub_bodyparts and body parts
14409 template bool item::is_bp_comfortable<sub_bodypart_id>( const sub_bodypart_id &bp ) const;
14410 
14411 template bool item::is_bp_comfortable<bodypart_id>( const bodypart_id &bp ) const;
14412 
14413 bool item::is_reloadable() const
14414 {
14415  if( has_flag( flag_NO_RELOAD ) && !has_flag( flag_VEHICLE ) ) {
14416  return false; // turrets ignore NO_RELOAD flag
14417 
14418  }
14419 
14420  for( const item_pocket *pocket : contents.get_all_reloadable_pockets() ) {
14421  if( pocket->is_type( pocket_type::MAGAZINE_WELL ) ) {
14422  if( pocket->empty() || !pocket->front().is_magazine_full() ) {
14423  return true;
14424  }
14425  } else if( pocket->is_type( pocket_type::MAGAZINE ) ) {
14426  if( remaining_ammo_capacity() > 0 ) {
14427  return true;
14428  }
14429  } else if( pocket->is_type( pocket_type::CONTAINER ) ) {
14430  // Container pockets are reloadable only if they are watertight, not full and do not contain non-liquid item
14431  if( pocket->full( false ) || !pocket->watertight() ) {
14432  continue;
14433  }
14434  if( pocket->empty() || pocket->front().made_of( phase_id::LIQUID ) ) {
14435  return true;
14436  }
14437  }
14438  }
14439 
14440  for( const item *gunmod : gunmods() ) {
14441  if( gunmod->is_reloadable() ) {
14442  return true;
14443  }
14444  }
14445 
14446  return false;
14447 }
14448 
14449 std::string item::type_name( unsigned int quantity, bool use_variant, bool use_cond_name,
14450  bool use_corpse ) const
14451 {
14452  const auto iter = item_vars.find( "name" );
14453  std::string ret_name;
14454  if( typeId() == itype_blood ) {
14455  if( corpse == nullptr || corpse->id.is_null() ) {
14456  return npgettext( "item name", "human blood", "human blood", quantity );
14457  } else {
14458  return string_format( npgettext( "item name", "%s blood",
14459  "%s blood", quantity ),
14460  corpse->nname() );
14461  }
14462  } else if( iter != item_vars.end() ) {
14463  return iter->second;
14464  } else if( use_variant && has_itype_variant() ) {
14465  ret_name = itype_variant().alt_name.translated( quantity );
14466  } else {
14467  ret_name = type->nname( quantity );
14468  }
14469 
14470  // Apply conditional names, in order.
14471  std::vector<conditional_name> const &cond_names =
14472  use_cond_name ? type->conditional_names : std::vector<conditional_name> {};
14473  for( const conditional_name &cname : cond_names ) {
14474  // Lambda for searching for a item ID among all components.
14475  std::function<bool( const item_components & )> component_id_equals =
14476  [&]( const item_components & components ) {
14477  for( const item_components::type_vector_pair &tvp : components ) {
14478  for( const item &component : tvp.second ) {
14479  if( component.typeId().str() == cname.condition ) {
14480  return true;
14481  }
14482  }
14483  }
14484  return false;
14485  };
14486  // Lambda for recursively searching for a item ID substring among all components.
14487  std::function<bool ( const item_components & )> component_id_contains =
14488  [&]( const item_components & components ) {
14489  for( const item_components::type_vector_pair &tvp : components ) {
14490  for( const item &component : tvp.second ) {
14491  if( component.typeId().str().find( cname.condition ) != std::string::npos ||
14492  component_id_contains( component.components ) ) {
14493  return true;
14494  }
14495  }
14496  }
14497  return false;
14498  };
14499  switch( cname.type ) {
14500  case condition_type::FLAG:
14501  if( has_flag( flag_id( cname.condition ) ) ) {
14502  ret_name = string_format( cname.name.translated( quantity ), ret_name );
14503  }
14504  break;
14505  case condition_type::VITAMIN:
14506  if( has_vitamin( vitamin_id( cname.condition ) ) ) {
14507  ret_name = string_format( cname.name.translated( quantity ), ret_name );
14508  }
14509  break;
14510  case condition_type::COMPONENT_ID:
14511  if( component_id_equals( components ) ) {
14512  ret_name = string_format( cname.name.translated( quantity ), ret_name );
14513  }
14514  break;
14515  case condition_type::COMPONENT_ID_SUBSTRING:
14516  if( component_id_contains( components ) ) {
14517  ret_name = string_format( cname.name.translated( quantity ), ret_name );
14518  }
14519  break;
14520  case condition_type::VAR:
14521  if( has_var( cname.condition ) && get_var( cname.condition ) == cname.value ) {
14522  ret_name = string_format( cname.name.translated( quantity ), ret_name );
14523  }
14524  break;
14525  case condition_type::SNIPPET_ID:
14526  if( has_var( cname.condition + "_snippet_id" ) &&
14527  get_var( cname.condition + "_snippet_id" ) == cname.value ) {
14528  ret_name = string_format( cname.name.translated( quantity ), ret_name );
14529  }
14530  break;
14531  case condition_type::num_condition_types:
14532  break;
14533  }
14534  }
14535 
14536  // Identify who this corpse belonged to, if applicable.
14537  if( corpse != nullptr && use_corpse && has_flag( flag_CORPSE ) ) {
14538  if( corpse_name.empty() ) {
14539  //~ %1$s: name of corpse with modifiers; %2$s: species name
14540  ret_name = string_format( pgettext( "corpse ownership qualifier", "%1$s of a %2$s" ),
14541  ret_name, corpse->nname() );
14542  } else {
14543  //~ %1$s: name of corpse with modifiers; %2$s: proper name; %3$s: species name
14544  ret_name = string_format( pgettext( "corpse ownership qualifier", "%1$s of %2$s, %3$s" ),
14545  ret_name, corpse_name, corpse->nname() );
14546  }
14547  }
14548 
14549  return ret_name;
14550 }
14551 
14552 std::string item::get_corpse_name() const
14553 {
14554  return corpse_name;
14555 }
14556 
14557 std::string item::nname( const itype_id &id, unsigned int quantity )
14558 {
14559  const itype *t = find_type( id );
14560  return t->nname( quantity );
14561 }
14562 
14563 std::string item::tname( const itype_id &id, unsigned int quantity,
14564  const tname::segment_bitset &segments )
14565 {
14566  item item_temp( id );
14567  return item_temp.tname( quantity, segments );
14568 }
14569 
14570 bool item::count_by_charges( const itype_id &id )
14571 {
14572  const itype *t = find_type( id );
14573  return t->count_by_charges();
14574 }
14575 
14576 bool item::type_is_defined( const itype_id &id )
14577 {
14578  return item_controller->has_template( id );
14579 }
14580 
14581 const itype *item::find_type( const itype_id &type )
14582 {
14583  return item_controller->find_template( type );
14584 }
14585 
14586 units::energy item::get_gun_energy_drain() const
14587 {
14588  units::energy draincount = 0_kJ;
14589  if( type->gun ) {
14590  units::energy modifier = 0_kJ;
14591  float multiplier = 1.0f;
14592  for( const item *mod : gunmods() ) {
14593  modifier += mod->type->gunmod->energy_drain_modifier;
14594  multiplier *= mod->type->gunmod->energy_drain_multiplier;
14595  }
14596  draincount = ( type->gun->energy_drain * multiplier ) + modifier;
14597  }
14598  return draincount;
14599 }
14600 
14601 units::energy item::get_gun_ups_drain() const
14602 {
14603  if( has_flag( flag_USE_UPS ) ) {
14604  return get_gun_energy_drain();
14605  }
14606  return 0_kJ;
14607 }
14608 
14609 units::energy item::get_gun_bionic_drain() const
14610 {
14611  if( has_flag( flag_USES_BIONIC_POWER ) ) {
14612  return get_gun_energy_drain();
14613  }
14614  return 0_kJ;
14615 }
14616 
14617 bool item::has_label() const
14618 {
14619  return has_var( "item_label" );
14620 }
14621 
14622 std::string item::label( unsigned int quantity, bool use_variant,
14623  bool use_cond_name, bool use_corpse ) const
14624 {
14625  if( has_label() ) {
14626  return get_var( "item_label" );
14627  }
14628 
14629  return type_name( quantity, use_variant, use_cond_name, use_corpse );
14630 }
14631 
14632 bool item::has_infinite_charges() const
14633 {
14634  return charges == INFINITE_CHARGES;
14635 }
14636 
14637 skill_id item::contextualize_skill( const skill_id &id ) const
14638 {
14639  if( id->is_contextual_skill() ) {
14640  if( id == skill_weapon ) {
14641  if( is_gun() ) {
14642  return gun_skill();
14643  } else if( is_melee() ) {
14644  return melee_skill();
14645  }
14646  }
14647  }
14648 
14649  return id;
14650 }
14651 
14652 bool item::is_filthy() const
14653 {
14654  return has_flag( flag_FILTHY );
14655 }
14656 
14657 bool item::on_drop( const tripoint &pos )
14658 {
14659  return on_drop( pos, get_map() );
14660 }
14661 
14662 bool item::on_drop( const tripoint &pos, map &m )
14663 {
14664  // dropping liquids, even currently frozen ones, on the ground makes them
14665  // dirty
14666  if( made_of_from_type( phase_id::LIQUID ) && !m.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_LIQUIDCONT, pos ) &&
14667  !has_own_flag( flag_DIRTY ) ) {
14668  set_flag( flag_DIRTY );
14669  }
14670 
14671  avatar &player_character = get_avatar();
14672 
14673  return type->drop_action && type->drop_action.call( &player_character, *this, pos );
14674 }
14675 
14676 time_duration item::age() const
14677 {
14678  return calendar::turn - birthday();
14679 }
14680 
14681 void item::set_age( const time_duration &age )
14682 {
14683  set_birthday( time_point( calendar::turn ) - age );
14684 }
14685 
14686 time_point item::birthday() const
14687 {
14688  return bday;
14689 }
14690 
14691 void item::set_birthday( const time_point &bday )
14692 {
14693  this->bday = std::max( calendar::turn_zero, bday );
14694 }
14695 
14696 bool item::is_upgrade() const
14697 {
14698  if( !type->bionic ) {
14699  return false;
14700  }
14701  return type->bionic->is_upgrade;
14702 }
14703 
14704 int item::get_min_str() const
14705 {
14706  const Character &p = get_player_character();
14707  if( type->gun ) {
14708  int min_str = type->min_str;
14709  min_str -= p.get_proficiency_bonus( "archery", proficiency_bonus_type::strength );
14710 
14711  for( const item *mod : gunmods() ) {
14712  min_str += mod->type->gunmod->min_str_required_mod;
14713  }
14714  return min_str > 0 ? min_str : 0;
14715  } else {
14716  return type->min_str;
14717  }
14718 }
14719 
14720 std::vector<item_comp> item::get_uncraft_components() const
14721 {
14722  std::vector<item_comp> ret;
14723  if( components.empty() ) {
14724  //If item wasn't crafted with specific components use default recipe
14725  std::vector<std::vector<item_comp>> recipe = recipe_dictionary::get_uncraft(
14726  typeId() ).disassembly_requirements().get_components();
14727  for( std::vector<item_comp> &component : recipe ) {
14728  ret.push_back( component.front() );
14729  }
14730  } else {
14731  //Make a new vector of components from the registered components
14732  for( const item_components::type_vector_pair &tvp : components ) {
14733  for( const item &component : tvp.second ) {
14734  if( component.has_flag( flag_UNRECOVERABLE ) ) {
14735  continue;
14736  }
14737  // NOLINTNEXTLINE(clang-analyzer-cplusplus.NewDeleteLeaks)
14738  auto iter = std::find_if( ret.begin(), ret.end(), [component]( item_comp & obj ) {
14739  return obj.type == component.typeId();
14740  } );
14741 
14742  if( iter != ret.end() ) {
14743  iter->count += component.count();
14744  } else {
14745  ret.emplace_back( component.typeId(), component.count() );
14746  }
14747  }
14748  }
14749  }
14750  return ret;
14751 }
14752 
14753 void item::set_favorite( const bool favorite )
14754 {
14755  is_favorite = favorite;
14756 }
14757 
14758 const recipe &item::get_making() const
14759 {
14760  if( !craft_data_ ) {
14761  debugmsg( "'%s' is not a craft or has a null recipe", tname() );
14762  static const recipe dummy{};
14763  return dummy;
14764  }
14765  cata_assert( craft_data_->making );
14766  return *craft_data_->making;
14767 }
14768 
14769 int item::get_making_batch_size() const
14770 {
14771  if( !craft_data_ ) {
14772  debugmsg( "'%s' is not a craft or has a null recipe", tname() );
14773  return 0;
14774  }
14775  cata_assert( craft_data_->batch_size );
14776  return craft_data_->batch_size;
14777 }

14803 const cata::value_ptr<islot_comestible> &item::get_comestible() const
14804 {
14805  if( is_craft() && !craft_data_->disassembly ) {
14806  return find_type( craft_data_->making->result() )->comestible;
14807  } else {
14808  return type->comestible;
14809  }
14810 }
14811 
14812 bool item::has_clothing_mod() const
14813 {
14814  for( const clothing_mod &cm : clothing_mods::get_all() ) {
14815  if( has_own_flag( cm.flag ) ) {
14816  return true;
14817  }
14818  }
14819  return false;
14820 }
14821 
14822 static const std::string &get_clothing_mod_val_key( clothing_mod_type type )
14823 {
14824  const static auto cache = ( []() {
14825  std::array<std::string, clothing_mods::all_clothing_mod_types.size()> res;
14826  for( const clothing_mod_type &type : clothing_mods::all_clothing_mod_types ) {
14827  res[type] = CLOTHING_MOD_VAR_PREFIX + clothing_mods::string_from_clothing_mod_type(
14828  clothing_mods::all_clothing_mod_types[type]
14829  );
14830  }
14831  return res;
14832  } )();
14833 
14834  return cache[ type ];
14835 }
14836 
14837 float item::get_clothing_mod_val( clothing_mod_type type ) const
14838 {
14839  return get_var( get_clothing_mod_val_key( type ), 0.0f );
14840 }
14841 
14842 void item::update_clothing_mod_val()
14843 {
14844  for( const clothing_mod_type &type : clothing_mods::all_clothing_mod_types ) {
14845  float tmp = 0.0f;
14846  for( const clothing_mod &cm : clothing_mods::get_all_with( type ) ) {
14847  if( has_own_flag( cm.flag ) ) {
14848  tmp += cm.get_mod_val( type, *this );
14849  }
14850  }
14851  set_var( get_clothing_mod_val_key( type ), tmp );
14852  }
14853 }
14854 
14855 units::volume item::check_for_free_space() const
14856 {
14857  units::volume volume;
14858 
14859  for( const item *container : contents.all_items_top( pocket_type::CONTAINER ) ) {
14860  std::vector<const item_pocket *> containedPockets =
14861  container->contents.get_all_contained_pockets();
14862  if( !containedPockets.empty() ) {
14863  volume += container->check_for_free_space();
14864 
14865  for( const item_pocket *pocket : containedPockets ) {
14866  if( pocket->rigid() && ( pocket->empty() || pocket->contains_phase( phase_id::SOLID ) ) &&
14867  pocket->get_pocket_data()->ammo_restriction.empty() ) {
14868  volume += pocket->remaining_volume();
14869  }
14870  }
14871  }
14872  }
14873  return volume;
14874 }
14875 
14876 int item::get_pocket_size() const
14877 {
14878  // set the amount of space that will be used on the vest based on the size of the item
14879  if( has_flag( flag_PALS_SMALL ) ) {
14880  return 1;
14881  } else if( has_flag( flag_PALS_MEDIUM ) ) {
14882  return 2;
14883  } else {
14884  return 3;
14885  }
14886 }
14887 
14888 bool item::can_attach_as_pocket() const
14889 {
14890  return has_flag( flag_PALS_SMALL ) || has_flag( flag_PALS_MEDIUM ) || has_flag( flag_PALS_LARGE );
14891 }
14892 
14893 units::volume item::get_selected_stack_volume( const std::map<const item *, int> &without ) const
14894 {
14895  auto stack = without.find( this );
14896  if( stack != without.end() ) {
14897  int selected = stack->second;
14898  item copy = *this;
14899  copy.charges = selected;
14900  return copy.volume();
14901  }
14902 
14903  return 0_ml;
14904 }
14905 
14906 bool item::has_unrestricted_pockets() const
14907 {
14908  return contents.has_unrestricted_pockets();
14909 }

14911 units::volume item::get_contents_volume_with_tweaks( const std::map<const item *, int> &without )
14912 const
14913 {
14914  return contents.get_contents_volume_with_tweaks( without );
14915 }
14916 
14917 units::volume item::get_nested_content_volume_recursive( const std::map<const item *, int>
14918  &without )
14919 const
14920 {
14921  return contents.get_nested_content_volume_recursive( without );
14922 }
14923 
14924 int item::get_recursive_disassemble_moves( const Character &guy ) const
14925 {
14926  int moves = recipe_dictionary::get_uncraft( type->get_id() ).time_to_craft_moves( guy,
14927  recipe_time_flag::ignore_proficiencies );
14928  std::vector<item_comp> to_be_disassembled = get_uncraft_components();
14929  while( !to_be_disassembled.empty() ) {
14930  item_comp current_comp = to_be_disassembled.back();
14931  to_be_disassembled.pop_back();
14932  const recipe &r = recipe_dictionary::get_uncraft( current_comp.type->get_id() );
14933  if( r.ident() != recipe_id::NULL_ID() ) {
14934  moves += r.time_to_craft_moves( guy ) * current_comp.count;
14935  std::vector<item_comp> components = item( current_comp.type->get_id() ).get_uncraft_components();
14936  for( item_comp &component : components ) {
14937  component.count *= current_comp.count;
14938  to_be_disassembled.push_back( component );
14939  }
14940  }
14941  }
14942  return moves;
14943 }
14944 
14945 void item::remove_internal( const std::function<bool( item & )> &filter,
14946  int &count, std::list<item> &res )
14947 {
14948  contents.remove_internal( filter, count, res );
14949 }
14950 
14951 std::list<const item *> item::all_items_top() const
14952 {
14953  return contents.all_items_top();
14954 }
14955 
14956 std::list<item *> item::all_items_top()
14957 {
14958  return contents.all_items_top();
14959 }
14960 
14961 std::list<const item *> item::all_items_top( pocket_type pk_type ) const
14962 {
14963  return contents.all_items_top( pk_type );
14964 }
14965 
14966 std::list<item *> item::all_items_top( pocket_type pk_type, bool unloading )
14967 {
14968  return contents.all_items_top( pk_type, unloading );
14969 }
14970 
14971 item const *item::this_or_single_content() const
14972 {
14973  return type->category_force == item_category_container && contents_only_one_type()
14974  ? &contents.first_item()
14975  : this;
14976 }
14977 
14978 bool item::contents_only_one_type() const
14979 {
14980  std::list<const item *> const items = contents.all_items_top( []( item_pocket const & pkt ) {
14981  return pkt.is_type( pocket_type::CONTAINER ) ||
14982  pkt.is_type( pocket_type::SOFTWARE );
14983  } );
14984  return items.size() == 1 ||
14985  ( items.size() > 1 &&
14986  std::all_of( ++items.begin(), items.end(), [&items]( item const * e ) {
14987  return e->stacks_with( *items.front() );
14988  } ) );
14989 }
14990 
14991 namespace
14992 {
14993 template <class C>
14994 void _aggregate( C &container, typename C::key_type const &key, item const *it,
14995  item::aggregate_t *&running_max, item::aggregate_t *&max_type, int depth,
14996  int maxdepth )
14997 {
14998  auto const [iter, emplaced] = container.emplace( key, it );
14999  if( emplaced && running_max == nullptr ) {
15000  running_max = &iter->second;
15001  max_type = running_max;
15002  } else if( !emplaced ) {
15003  iter->second.info.bits &=
15004  iter->second.header->stacks_with( *it, false, false, true, depth, maxdepth ).bits;
15005  ++iter->second.count;
15006 
15007  if constexpr( std::is_same_v<itype_id, typename C::key_type> ) {
15008  max_type = max_type->count < iter->second.count ? &iter->second : max_type;
15009  } else {
15010  iter->second.info.bits.reset( tname::segments::TYPE );
15011  }
15012 
15013  running_max = running_max->count < iter->second.count ? &iter->second : running_max;
15014  }
15015 }
15016 } // namespace
15017 
15018 item::aggregate_t item::aggregated_contents( int depth, int maxdepth ) const
15019 {
15020  constexpr double cutoff = 0.5;
15021 
15022  std::unordered_map<itype_id, aggregate_t> types;
15023  std::unordered_map<item_category_id, aggregate_t> cats;
15024  unsigned int total{};
15025  aggregate_t *running_max{};
15026  aggregate_t *max_type{};
15027  auto const cont_and_soft = []( item_pocket const & pkt ) {
15028  return pkt.is_type( pocket_type::CONTAINER ) || pkt.is_type( pocket_type::SOFTWARE );
15029  };
15030 
15031  for( item_pocket const *pk : contents.get_pockets( cont_and_soft ) ) {
15032  for( item const *pkit : pk->all_items_top() ) {
15033  total++;
15034  item_category_id const cat = pkit->get_category_of_contents( depth, maxdepth ).get_id();
15035  bool const type_ok = pkit->type->category_force != item_category_container ||
15036  cat == item_category_container;
15037  if( type_ok ) {
15038  _aggregate( types, pkit->typeId(), pkit, running_max, max_type, depth, maxdepth );
15039  }
15040  _aggregate( cats, cat, pkit, running_max, max_type, depth, maxdepth );
15041  }
15042  }
15043  if( running_max == nullptr ) {
15044  return {};
15045  }
15046 
15047  unsigned int const cutoff_check =
15048  total < 3 ? total - 1 : static_cast<int>( std::floor( total * cutoff ) );
15049 
15050  // alow a type to still dominate over its own category
15051  if( max_type->count > cutoff_check &&
15052  max_type->header->type->category_force != item_category_container &&
15053  max_type->header->cached_category.id == running_max->header->cached_category.id ) {
15054 
15055  max_type->info.bits.set( tname::segments::TYPE );
15056  return *max_type;
15057  }
15058 
15059  return running_max->count > cutoff_check ? *running_max : aggregate_t{};
15060 }
15061 
15062 std::list<const item *> item::all_items_ptr() const
15063 {
15064  std::list<const item *> all_items_internal;
15065  for( int i = static_cast<int>( pocket_type::CONTAINER );
15066  i < static_cast<int>( pocket_type::LAST ); i++ ) {
15067  std::list<const item *> inserted{ all_items_top_recursive( static_cast<pocket_type>( i ) ) };
15068  all_items_internal.insert( all_items_internal.end(), inserted.begin(), inserted.end() );
15069  }
15070  return all_items_internal;
15071 }
15072 
15073 std::list<const item *> item::all_items_ptr( pocket_type pk_type ) const
15074 {
15075  return all_items_top_recursive( pk_type );
15076 }
15077 
15078 std::list<item *> item::all_items_ptr( pocket_type pk_type )
15079 {
15080  return all_items_top_recursive( pk_type );
15081 }
15082 
15083 std::list<const item *> item::all_items_top_recursive( pocket_type pk_type )
15084 const
15085 {
15086  std::list<const item *> contained = contents.all_items_top( pk_type );
15087  std::list<const item *> all_items_internal{ contained };
15088  for( const item *it : contained ) {
15089  std::list<const item *> recursion_items = it->all_items_top_recursive( pk_type );
15090  all_items_internal.insert( all_items_internal.end(), recursion_items.begin(),
15091  recursion_items.end() );
15092  }
15093 
15094  return all_items_internal;
15095 }
15096 
15097 std::list<item *> item::all_items_top_recursive( pocket_type pk_type )
15098 {
15099  std::list<item *> contained = contents.all_items_top( pk_type );
15100  std::list<item *> all_items_internal{ contained };
15101  for( item *it : contained ) {
15102  std::list<item *> recursion_items = it->all_items_top_recursive( pk_type );
15103  all_items_internal.insert( all_items_internal.end(), recursion_items.begin(),
15104  recursion_items.end() );
15105  }
15106 
15107  return all_items_internal;
15108 }
15109 
15110 std::list<item *> item::all_known_contents()
15111 {
15112  return contents.all_known_contents();
15113 }
15114 
15115 std::list<const item *> item::all_known_contents() const
15116 {
15117  return contents.all_known_contents();
15118 }
15119 
15120 std::list<item *> item::all_ablative_armor()
15121 {
15122  return contents.all_ablative_armor();
15123 }
15124 
15125 std::list<const item *> item::all_ablative_armor() const
15126 {
15127  return contents.all_ablative_armor();
15128 }
15129

15189 
15190 bool is_preferred_component( const item &component )
15191 {
15192  return component.is_container_empty() && !component.has_flag( flag_HIDDEN_POISON ) &&
15193  !component.has_flag( flag_HIDDEN_HALLU );
15194 }
15195 
15196 disp_mod_by_barrel::disp_mod_by_barrel() = default;
15197 void disp_mod_by_barrel::deserialize( const JsonObject &jo )
15198 {
15199  mandatory( jo, false, "barrel_length", barrel_length );
15200  mandatory( jo, false, "dispersion", dispersion_modifier );
15201 }
